Title: Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo bakoze mu rurimi rw’Ikirashi
Body:
Abahanzi babiri bavuka mu Karere ka Kirehe aribo Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo iririmbwe mu rurimi shami ruzwi nk’Ikirashi mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha uru rurimi banarurinda kuzimira.
Abahanzi babiri bavuka mu Karere ka Kirehe aribo Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo iririmbwe mu rurimi shami ruzwi nk’Ikirashi mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha uru rurimi banarurinda kuzimira.
Iyi ndirimbo bayisohoye kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21Gashyantare 2020 ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ururimi kavukire. Uyu munsi ukaba warizihirijwe mu Karere ka Kirehe ahahawe umwanya ururimi shami rw’ikinyarwanda rukoreshwa na bamwe mu baturage bo mu Karere ka Kirehe ruzwi nk’Ikirashi.
Abaturage bakoresha uru rurimi bahawe umwanya baganira banabyina imbyino zitandukanye ziririmbwe muri uru rurimi rw’ururashi. Abaturage bahimbawe cyane nyuma yo kumva ko abahanzi babiri bakomoka muri aka Karere babakoreye indirimbo bise Ikirashi aho bafatanyije nabo mu kuyibyina.
Senderi yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo bayikoze bagira ngo bashimire leta ku iterambere imaze kugeza ku baturage bavuga ikirashi.
Yagize ati “Mbere 1994 abaturage bavuga Ikirashi bari babayeho nabi bamwe barwaye imvunja ibirenge bikitambika none ubu batujwe mu midugudu bahabwa agaciro ntabwo bakibayeho nka mbere.”
Yongeyeho ati “Ikindi twayikoze kubera uyu munsi mpuzamahanga w’ururimi kavukire kugira ngo abantu bareke kwibagirwa indimi zacu gakondo.”
Yavuze ko gufata amafaranga yabo bakayasohoramo indirimbo ari ukugira ngo bakomeze guteza imbere uru rurimi kugira ngo rwoye kuzima ahubwo abantu bakomeze baruvuge.
Intore Tuyisenge we yavuze ko bakimara kumenya ko uyu munsi mpuzamahanga uzizihirizwa mu Karere ka Kirehe barebye umusanzu batanga bagasanga bakwiye gukora indirimbo ishishikariza abantu gukomeza kwibuka ururimi rw’Ikirashi.
Ati “Iyo ururimi rutabungabunzwe rurazimira, njye na Senderi twahisemo rero gukora iyi ndirimbo kugira ngo turusigasire. Iyo tuvuze Ikirashi bimfasha kwibuka abakurambere bacu muri aka Karere tuvukamo kuko nirwo bavugaga nubwo twe tutagize amahirwe yo kurumenya neza.”
Tuyisenge yavuze ko bagiye kongera imbaraga mu kurusakaza kugira ngo rumenyekane cyane. Yavuze ko kuri ubu inyinshi mu ndirimbo ze azajya agerageza agashyiramo amagambo make y’ururimi rw’Ikirashi.
Abakuze bakoresha ururimi rw’Ikirashi bafite agahinda baterwa nuko abato batagishaka kurumenya ngo kuko ku ishuri batarukoresha bakibaza uburyo nibasaza ruzakendera bikabababaza.
IGIHE yaganiriye na bamwe mu barukoresha batubwira amagambo amwe namwe n’ibisobanuro byayo mu Kinyarwanda.
Gusuhuzanya mu Kirashi iyo ari mu gitondo bakoresha ‘Murayire ge, haba hacyeye bagakoresha ‘Aganda’ cyangwa ‘Musibire ge’ kubwira umuntu uti “Amakuru ki uvuga Agandi shi, Mwiriwe mute bavuga Mwasiba kurungi. Iyo ushaka kubwira umuntu uti uvuye he bakoresha Waruga hi, muryoherwe ni Munuriwe.
Ibice by’umubiri nk’izuru ryitwa Enyindo, ukutwi ni ugutwi, irisho ni ijisho, urutoki rw’insina ni Engemu, amasaka yitwa umugusha, amashaza akitwa ubushaza, ibishyimbo byitwa ibiharage, ibitoki ni ibitiki ihene ni Embuzi, inka ni Ente.

Title: Young Grace yavuze impamvu yabatirishije umwana we muri Kiliziya Gatolika kandi asengera mu rindi dini
Body:
Abayizera Marie Grace wamenyekanye nka Young Grace muri Hip Hop y’u Rwanda, mu minsi ishize yabatirishije umwana we mu Kiliziya Gatolika bitera urujijo abasanzwe bakurikira uyu muraperikazi uzwiho kuba asengera mu itorero ryitwa “River of Joy and Hope Ministries”.
Abayizera Marie Grace wamenyekanye nka Young Grace muri Hip Hop y’u Rwanda, mu minsi ishize yabatirishije umwana we mu Kiliziya Gatolika bitera urujijo abasanzwe bakurikira uyu muraperikazi uzwiho kuba asengera mu itorero ryitwa “River of Joy and Hope Ministries”.
Ku Cyumweru tariki 23 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo Young Grace yabatirishije umwana we Amata Anca Ae’eedah Ai ‘Diamante’ muri Kiliziya Gatolika mu Karere ka Rubavu.
Uku kubatirisha uyu mwana muri Kiliziya Gatolika kwa Young Grace kwateye urujijo abasanzwe bakurikirana uyu muhanzikazi cyane ko asanzwe ari umukirisitu usengera mu itorero riyoborwa n’umushumba Sultan Eric.
Ibi bigaragazwa n’uko mu Ukwakira 2019 uyu muhanzikazi yari yagiye guhesha umugisha umwana we mu itorero asengeramo.
Mu kiganiro na Young Grace yabwiye IGIHE ko we yahisemo kubatirisha umwana we muri Kiliziya Gatolika kuko nawe ariho yaherewe amasakaramentu.
Ati "Namubatirishije muri Kiliziya Gatolika kuko mu rugo bose ni abakirisitu bo muri kiliziya kandi nanjye ndi umugatolika, muri “River of Joy and Hope Ministries” nsengerayo kuko ahantu hose bavuga Imana bemera Yezu nahasengera ariko ndi umugatolika wemewe.”
Mu Ukwakira 2012 Young Grace yari yinjiye muri Islam, ahita ahabwa izina rya Housna. Icyo gihe yatangaje ko yinjiye muri Islam nyuma y’inyigisho yahawe na bamwe mu nshuti ze bo muri iri dini akumva ziramunyuze akemera guhinduka.
Guhera mu 2016 uyu muraperikazi yaje kuva muri Islam ajya muri “River of Joy and Hope Ministries”.

Title: USA: Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi yahamijwe ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu
Body:
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, rwahamije Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi muri Hollywood ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu abagore n’abakobwa yakinishaga filimi.
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, rwahamije Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi muri Hollywood ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu abagore n’abakobwa yakinishaga filimi.
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York rwamuhamije icyaha cyo mu rwego rwa mbere cyo guhatira imibonano yo mu kanwa, Miriam Harey wari umwungirije mu bijyanye no gutunganya filimi mu 2006.
Ni icyaha gihanishwa igihano kuva ku myaka itanu kugeza kuri 25 y’igifungo. Hari ikindi cyaha yahamijwe cy’umugore yafatiye muri Hotel y’i New York mu 2013 gihanishwa igihano kitari munsi y’imyaka ine.
Icyakora Weinstein w’imyaka 67 y’amavuko yahanaguweho ibindi byaha bitatu birimo bibiri bikomeye byo mu rwego rwa mbere byashoboraga gutuma afungwa burundu. Nyuma y’urubanza uwo mugabo yasubijwe mu buroko gufungwa by’agateganyo mu gihe ategereje isomwa ry’urubanza ku Itariki 11 Werurwe 2020.
Aracyakurikiranyweho ibyaha by’abagore babiri bo muri leta ya Los Angeles yafashe ku ngufu mu 2013. Abagore barenga 80 barimo ibyamamare mu gukina filimi n’abana bamusabaga ubufasha ngo abagire ibyamamare bashinja uyu mugabo kubakorera ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.
Gukurikiranwa k’uyu mugabo byatijwe umurindi n’ubukangurambaga bwiswe MeToo bukangurira abagore kujyana mu butabera abagabo bakomeye bitwaza icyo bari cyo bagahohotera abagore.
Weinstein yamenyakanye cyane muri filimi yiswe Pulp Fiction yo mu 1994 ivuga ku byaha by’ubujura, iyitwa The English Patient yo mu 1996 na Shakespeare in Love 1998 zombi zivuga ku rukundo.
Haleyi, wakoraga kuri imwe mu mateleviziyo Weinstein yavuze ko yamuhohoteye ubwo yamutumiraga mu nzu ye iri Manhattan. Yatanze ubuhamya avuga ko yamujyanye ku buriri akamwikubaho. Ni mu gihe Mann yavuze ko yamusuzuguraga cyane mu mubano wabo utarimo imibonano mpuzabitsina kugeza ubwo amufashe ku ngufu mu 2013.
Michelle Simpson Tuegel uhagarariye abahohotewe, mu rukiko yavuze ko yizeye ko n’abandi bagore barakomeza kuzana abakora ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina mu nkiko.
Ati "Imbaraga umuntu yaba afite zose turi mu bihe bishya. igihe cya #MeToo kije gutamaza abakoresha imbaraga bafite mu guhohotera abagore."
Miriam Haley ubu ufite imyaka 42 y’amavuko avuga ko yahohotewe na Harvey ytwaje kumufasha kuguma mu kazi ke ko kumwungiriza. Yamufashe ku ngufu ku itariki 10 Nyakanga 2006.

Title: U Butaliyani: Umuntu wa karindwi yishwe na Coronavirus
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’u Butaliyani bwatangaje ko abantu barindwi aribo bamaze guhitanwa n’icyorezo cya Cronavirus, gikomeje guhitana benshi mu Bushinwa ariko cyageze no mu Burayi.
Ubuyobozi bw’u Butaliyani bwatangaje ko abantu barindwi aribo bamaze guhitanwa n’icyorezo cya Cronavirus, gikomeje guhitana benshi mu Bushinwa ariko cyageze no mu Burayi.
Ubuyobozi bw’u Butaliyani bwatangaje kuri uyu wa Mbere ko bwahagaritse amashuri, za kaminuza, inzu ndangamurage n’ibindi bikorwa bihuriza abantu hamwe nk’imikino y’umupira w’amaguru n’ibikorwa ndangamuco.
Ibiro ntaramakuru by’u Butaliyani, Ansa byatangaje ko umuntu wa karindwi yazize iyi ndwara, ikomeje kwibasira u Butaliyani bw’amajyaruguru.
Byatangajwe ko umuntu witabye Imana ari umugabo w’imyaka 80, wajyanwe mu bitaro mu cyumweru gishize mu mujyi wa Lodi, kubera indwara y’umutima nk’uko Reuters yabitangaje. Abaganga bavuga ko ashobora kuba yarandujwe Coronavirus n’undi murwayi.
Umubare w’abarimo guhitanwa n’iyi ndwara ukomeje kwiyongera, mu gihe umuntu wa mbere wahitanwe na Cornavirus mu Butaliyani yapfuye ku wa Gatanu.
Abayobozi bavuga ko mu Bushinwa abantu bamaze kwandura ari 77 269 naho abanduye hanze yabwo ni 2 271. Abamaze guhitanbwa nayo ni 2 596, barimo 33 bamaze kugwa mu mahanga.
Kugeza ubu abantu bamaze gukira ni 24 854.

Title: Itorero ry’igihugu Urukerereza ryakiriye abanyempano 100 bashya
Body:
Nyuma yo kuzenguruka igihugu hashakishwa abanyempano bashya bo kwinjira mu itorero ry’Igihugu Urukerereza bikarangira habonetse 151, kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 23 Gashyantare 2020 i Kabuga aho bari gukorera umwiherero, hatoranyirijwe 100 bamaze kwinjizwa muri iri torero.
Nyuma yo kuzenguruka igihugu hashakishwa abanyempano bashya bo kwinjira mu itorero ry’Igihugu Urukerereza bikarangira habonetse 151, kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 23 Gashyantare 2020 i Kabuga aho bari gukorera umwiherero, hatoranyirijwe 100 bamaze kwinjizwa muri iri torero.
Ijonjora ry’abanyempano ijana bazajya mu mwiherero w’Itorero Urukerereza ryabaye kuri iki Cyumweru i Kabuga aho bari bamaze iminsi mu mwiherero.
Bitunguranye umusaza w’imyaka 51 witwa Ntahontuye Jean Marie wo mu Murenge wa Cyumba mu karere ka Gicumbi ucuranga umuduri, yagaragaye mu bahataniraga kwinjira mu itorero ry’igihugu Urukerereza ndetse birangira anatsinze.
Mu itorero ry’Igihugu Urukerereza bashakaga abanyempano mu byiciro bitanu aribyo abakaraza, intore, abaririmbyi, abacurangisha ibikoresho gakondo n’imbyino z’abakobwa.
Aba banyempano 100 binjiye mu itorero ry’igihugu Urukerereza bari mu mwiherero w’iminsi itanu ugamije kubafasha gusobanukirwa icyerekezo cy’Itorero binjiyemo n’icy’Igihugu muri rusange, ukazasozwa ku wa Gatatu tariki 26 Gashyantare 2020.
Kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 24 Gashyantare 2020 bari kumwe na Mutangana Steven uyobora ishami ry’Umuco muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, basuye Urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ku Gisozi, banasura Ingoro y’amateka y’urugamba rwo guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.

Title: Ibidasanzwe byaranze Miss Nishimwe Naomie ubwo yigaga mu mashuri yisumbuye
Body:
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020, izina ry’uyu mukobwa ryabaye ikimenyabose ritera ibyishimo abo mu muryango we inshuti n’abamumenyeye mu irushanwa, ku ishuri aho uyu mukobwa yize ho biba ibindi.
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020, izina ry’uyu mukobwa ryabaye ikimenyabose ritera ibyishimo abo mu muryango we inshuti n’abamumenyeye mu irushanwa, ku ishuri aho uyu mukobwa yize ho biba ibindi.
Nyuma yuko hamenyekanye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020, twifuje kumenya uyu mukobwa guhera mu bwana maze biba ngombwa ko tujya ku ishuri aho yarangirije amashuri yisumbuye tugirana ikiganiro n’ubuyobozi bw’ikigo ndetse n’abanyeshuri babanye nawe.
Sibomana Alphonse, umuyobozi w’ishuri rya Glory Secondary School aho Nishimwe Naomie yize kuva mu wa kabiri w’amashuri yisumbuye kugeza arangije muri MEG (Maths-Economics-Geography) mu mwaka wa 2019, yabwiye IGIHE ko batatunguwe nuko uyu mukobwa yegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda cyane ko ari umukobwa mwiza, uzi ubwenge kandi w’intangarugero mu myitwarire.
Yavuze ko Nishimwe ari umukobwa uzi kuvugira mu ruhame, bikaba imwe mu ndangagaciro zigishwa abanyeshuri babo kugira ngo bazagire icyo bigezaho mu buzima.
Yagize ati”Twe tugira Ministeri zitandukanye, harimo iy’umuco na siporo kenshi rero bakunda kugira amarushanwa y’abanyempano atuma abana bitinyuka bakagaragaza impano zabo, ishinzwe gutegura abanyeshuri kuzavamo abayobozi beza b’ejo hazaza iyi ikaba urebye ifasha abanyeshuri gutinyuka kuvugira mu ruhame, n’izindi. ”
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko ubumenyi Nishimwe Naomie yakuye muri iri shuri aribwo bwamufashije no mu rugendo rwe rwo kuba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda.
Sibomana yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu mukobwa ubusanzwe imico ye yari nta makemwa ku ishuri cyane ko nta kosa yari yagafatiwemo iryo ariryo ryose ryari gutuma yatumwa nk’umubyeyi cyangwa akirukanwa.
Ati “Naomie yize hano kuva mu wa kabiri w’amashuri yisumbuye kugeza arangije, yari umukobwa uzwiho gusetsa cyane, nta makosa yakunze kumuranga mu buzima bwe bwo ku ishuri.”
Yavuze ko uyu mukobwa yari afite imyitwarire myiza ku buryo abarezi n’abanyeshuri bagenzi be babimukundiraga ndetse byatumye banamuba hafi mu rugendo rwe rwo kwiyamamariza kuba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda.
Mu bijyanye n’amasomo, umuyobozi w’iri shuri yavuze ko uyu mukobwa yatsindaga neza, ati” Dufite amanota tugenderaho twimura abanyeshuri, Naomie ntiyigeze asibira n’umunsi wa rimwe, urumva ko yatsindaga.”
Umuyobozi w’ikigo Nishimwe Naomie yizeho yavuze ko bakimenya ko uyu mwana ari muri Miss Rwanda bakanguriye abanyeshuri kumushyigikira yaba mu buryo bwo kumutora ndetse n’ubundi bwose bushoboka.
Isheja Ricky Junior uhagarariye abandi banyeshuri muri Glory Secondary School yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu mukobwa yari umuntu usetsa kandi uzi kubana n’abantu ku buryo ari umwe mu bari bishimiwe cyane mu kigo.
Ati “Nishimwe Naomie yari umukobwa ukunda gusetsa cyane, nimwiza cyane twamufataga nk’uwa mbere mu burang. Nibyadutunguye kuba yabaye Miss Rwanda.”
Umukundwa Keilla bucura bwo kwa Nishimwe Naomie na we wiga muri iki kigo mukuru we yanyuzemo, yabwiye IGIHE ko bishimiye cyane iyi ntsinzi.
Umukundwa wiga mu wa kane HEG (History-Economics -Geography) yavuze ko yaba mu rugo ndetse no ku ishuri bishimiye gutsinda kwa mukuru we wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ku ishuri yigagaho Nishimwe Naomie azwi nk’umukobwa w’uburanga ariko usetsa cyane ku buryo abanyeshuri hafi ya bose bari bamuzi.
Nishimwe Naomie si we wa mbere wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda avuye muri iki kigo cya Glory Secondary School cyane ko mu 2015 havuye na Kundwa Doriane.
Usibye aba bakobwa begukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda ariko iki kigo kibitse andi Makamba nk’irya Lynca Akacu wabaye igisonga cya kabiri cya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu mwaka wa 2015.
Aha hize kandi Marie d’Amour Uwase Rangira wabaye igisonga cya gatatu cya Miss Rwanda 2016, Ndahiro Liliane wabaye Miss Congeneniality 2018 na Gaju Anitha witabiriye Miss Rwanda 2019.

Title: Miss Uwimana w’i Burundi yatunguwe n’ibirori bya Miss Rwanda abigereranya na Miss Universe
Body:
Miss University Africa Burundi, Uwimana Dative, witabiriye irushanwa rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020, yanyuzwe n’ibirori yabonye avuga ko agereranyije ntaho bitaniye n’ibyo ajya abona bya Miss Universe.
Miss University Africa Burundi, Uwimana Dative, witabiriye irushanwa rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020, yanyuzwe n’ibirori yabonye avuga ko agereranyije ntaho bitaniye n’ibyo ajya abona bya Miss Universe.
Ku wa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo habaye ibirori byo gutora Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 ikamba ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie imbere y’abafana benshi.
Ibi birori byari byitabiriwe n’abakobwa bafite amakamba y’ubwiza mu bihugu bitandukanye bifuje kwitabira Miss Rwanda ndetse banayikurikiranye imbonankubone.
Uwimana Dative Miss University Africa 2019 wari waturutse i Burundi mu kiganiro na IGIHE yagize ati ”Ibirori byari bimeze neza, urwego abategura irushanwa bagezeho ni ibintu byiza cyane, ni ikintu cyantangaje wagira ngo ni Miss Universe.”
Uyu mukobwa icyakora nubwo yashimye urwego rw’imitegurire n’uburyo iri rushanwa ryagenze yavuze ko ikintu cyazitonderwa ubutaha ari ikijyanye n’umwanya kuko byakererewe.
I Burundi aho uyu mukobwa aturuka baheruka gutora Nyampinga mu 2017 guhera 2018 kugeza ubu ntawo barongera gutora umukobwa uhiga abanda uburanga ku rwego rw’Igihugu.
Ibi birori byitabiriwe na ba nyampinga baturutse mu bindi bihugu baje kwihera ijisho umukobwa wegukana ikamba.
Usibye Uwimana hari na Nyampinga wa Tanzania, Sylivia Sebastian, watowe mu 2019; Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana; Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana n’igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi; Miss Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudani y’Epfo na Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda.
Ikiganiro na Uwimana Dative wari waturutse i Burundi

Title: Abanyarwanda basogongejwe ku muco wo muri Sénégal mu gitaramo kidasanzwe (Amafoto)
Body:
Abahanzi babiri bo muri Senegal, Faada Freddy na N’Dongo D basusurukije abitabiriye igitaramo Live & Unplugged cyabereye i Kigali, cyibanda ku kugaragaza umuco wo muri Senegal, mu burengerazuba bwa Afurika.
Abahanzi babiri bo muri Senegal, Faada Freddy na N’Dongo D basusurukije abitabiriye igitaramo Live & Unplugged cyabereye i Kigali, cyibanda ku kugaragaza umuco wo muri Senegal, mu burengerazuba bwa Afurika.
Iki gitaramo cyabaye kuri uyu wa Gatandatu muri Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village hamenyerewe nka Camp Kigali, cyatangiye saa moya z’umugoroba kirangira ahagana saa yine, cyitabirwa cyane cyane n’umubare munini w ’abanyamahanga.
Habanje DJ Juls ashyushya abari aho binyuze mu miziki yavangaga, irimo indirimbo nyarwanda n’inyamahanga, akanyuzamo agashyiramo izo muri Senegal by’umwihariko.
Nyuma ya DJ Juls hajeho itsinda Daara J Family rigizwe n’abagabo babiri, Faada Freddy na N’Dongo D. Ni itsinda rizwiho kurapa, rikomoka muri Senegal.
Iri tsinda ryashimishije abitabiriye iki gitaramo mu ndirimbo nyinshi baririmbye, cyane ko bamaze ku rubyinirino amasaha agera kuri abiri.
Bavuyeho hasubiraho DJ Juls umwanya muto, maze igitaramo gisojwe bakomereza mu kwishimisha.
Amafoto: Dushimimana Ami Pacifique

Title: Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 (Amafoto na Video)
Body:
Ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie winjiye mu irushanwa ahagarariye Umujyi wa Kigali, Igisonga cya Kabiri cyabaye Umutesi Denise [No43] naho Igisonga cya mbere ni Umwiza Phionah [No47].
Ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie winjiye mu irushanwa ahagarariye Umujyi wa Kigali, Igisonga cya Kabiri cyabaye Umutesi Denise [No43] naho Igisonga cya mbere ni Umwiza Phionah [No47].
Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda w’umwaka wa 2020, asimbura Nimwiza Meghan wari ufite iriheruka yambitswe muri Gashyantare 2019.
Uyu mukobwa w’imyaka 20 yatowe mu birori byabereye mu Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo ku mugoroba wo ku wa 22 ushyira mu rukerera rwo ku wa 23 Gashyantare 2020. Nishimwe yabaye Nyampinga wa munani utowe mu mateka y’u Rwanda.
Urugendo rwo guhitamo Nyampinga w’u Rwanda rwari rumaze iminsi 64 kuva ku ijonjora ry’ibanze ryabereye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku wa 21 Ukuboza 2019.
Nishimwe yagizwe Nyampinga hagendewe ku kimero n’ubwiza, kugira ubumenyi kurusha abandi ndetse n’umuco nk’imwe mu nkingi z’ubuzima bw’igihugu.
Uyu mukobwa yahiriwe cyane kuko yanagizwe Nyampinga uberwa n’amafoto (Miss Photogenic).
Abakobwa 20 [baje kuvamo umwe] b’ikimero bageze mu cyiciro cya nyuma cy’irushanwa batoranyijwe muri 54 batsinze amajonjora yabereye mu ntara zose z’igihugu aho abagera kuri 400 bari biyandikishije.
Mu byashingiweho batoranya Nyampinga harebwe uburanga (amanota 30%), ubuhanga mu kuvuga (amanota 40%) n’uko umukobwa yiyerekanye (amanota 30%) byose bikagira igiteranyo cy’amanota ijana.
UKO IRUSHANWA RYAGENZE UMUNOTA KU WUNDI:
 	Amafoto y’abakobwa bahawe amakamba
01: 30: NISHIMWE NAOMIE w’imyaka 20 wiyamamarije ku itike y’Umujyi wa Kigali ni we wagizwe Nyampinga w’u Rwanda asimbuye Nimwiza Meghan wari ufite irya 2019.
Mu ijambo rye yagize ati “Ndishimye cyane. Ndashimira Abanyarwanda bangiriye icyizere.’’
Nishimwe yasazwe n’ibyishimo nyuma yo gutangazwa ko ariwe wegukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020. Ababyeyi n’abavandimwe be bamusanze ku rubyiniro barishimana.
Uyu mukobwa yahise anashyikirizwa urufunguzo rw’imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift yagenewe. Iyi modoka nshya (Zero Kilometre) yatanzwe na Suzuki binyuze muri Rwanda Motor.
Nishimwe yize ibijyanye n’Imibare, Ubukungu n’Ubumenyi bw’Isi (MEG). Ubwo yiyamamarizaga i Kigali ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020, Nishimwe yavuze ko nahabwa ikamba azita ku mushinga wo kugabanya agahinda gakabije mu rubyiruko (depression).
Icyo gihe yagize ati "Urubyiruko rukunze kugira depression rukirukira mu biyobyabwenge rukaniyahura.”
 	Nishimwe yashyikirijwe imodoka nshya
Nishimwe wari ugaragiwe n’inshuti n’abavandimwe be, yahawe urufunguzo rw’imodoka nshya yemererwa nka Nyampinga w’u Rwanda.
 	Nishimwe yahogoje Abanya- Sénégal
Nishimwe Naomie usanzwe ari mu bakurikirwa cyane kuri Instagram ufite abarenga ibihumbi 65 kuri uru rubuga, yigeze no gutangarirwa ubwiza bwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga Abanya- Sénégal bagaterana amagambo.
Uyu mukobwa asanzwe akurikirwa cyane [afite abantu ibihumbi 66.1 kuri Instagram] ndetse byagaragajwe cyane n’uburyo yahamagawe [ariwe wa nyuma] abantu bari bari mu cyumba cyabereyemo igikorwa cyo kujonjora bakiyamira.
Uretse ibyo, muri Kamena umwaka ushize muri Sénégal ubwiza bw’Abanyarwandakazi bwakuye benshi mu byimbo butuma bamwe bavugishwa, havuka iteranamagambo hibazwa igihugu gifite abakobwa beza hagati y’u Rwanda na Sénégal.
Icyo gihe ifoto ya Nishimwe Naomie yavugishije benshi bari batangariye ubwiza bwe. Ku mbuga zitandukanye muri Sénégal hakwirakwiye ifoto y’uyu mukobwa wari uhagarariye Abanyarwandakazi muri rusange hagereranywa ubwiza bwe n’ubw’abakobwa bo muri icyo gihugu.
Izi mpaka zakwirakwiriye ku mbuga za internet zitandukanye muri Sénégal, zatangiriye mu itsinda [Group] rya Facebook rikunzwe muri iki gihugu ryitwa ‘T’es De Dakar Si’ hibazwaga hagati y’u Rwanda n’iki gihugu ahari abakobwa b’uburanga.
Kuva ubwo havutse ibice bibiri muri iri tsinda, icya mbere cy’abagabo bo muri Sénégal bemeza ko ‘Abanyarwandakazi bafite uburanga burangaza benshi kurusha ubw’abakobwa bo muri iki gihugu’ mu gihe hari n’abakobwa batabyishimiye maze nabo bishyira hamwe bamagana ibyo basaza babo bavuze.

Ikamba ryambitswe Miss Nishimwe Naomie ryakozwe n’Inzu y’Ingoro Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda nyuma y’imyaka itanu iryari risanzwe rikozwe.
Abanyamakuru Nzeyimana Luckman na Martina Shami Abera ni bo bahamagaye abakobwa bavuyemo Miss Rwanda n’ibisonga bye.

01:09: Sherrie Silver uri mu bagize Akanama Nkemurampaka yabwiye abakobwa bahataniye ikamba ko “ari ingenzi kumenya intego bafite mu gihe bazatsinda.’’
Yakomeje ati “Aba bakobwa bagomba kumenya ibyo bagomba gukora mu gihe batsinze. Ati “Mwakoze cyane.’’
 	Akanama Nkemurampaka karagarutse
Nyuma y’iminota 83 abagize Akanama Nkemurampaka biherereye bagarutse mu byicaro byabo. Hagiye gutangazwa Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020.
Abakobwa bose uko ari 19 bari mu mwiherero bongeye guhamagarwa imbere y’imbaga iteraniye mu Intare Conference Arena.
Imitima y’abakobwa iradiha, abari mu cyumba kiri kuberamo ibirori na bo bategereje kumenya umukobwa uri bwegukane ikamba, ibisonga bye n’abahabwa andi makamba.
 	Nimwiza Meghan yiteguye gutanga ikamba…
Nyampinga w’u Rwanda wa 2019, Nimwiza Meghan yicaye mu Intare Arena hamwe n’abandi ba nyampinga yasimbuye. Ategereje ko hatangazwa umukobwa agomba kwambika ikamba amaranye umwaka.
Ibi birori kandi byitabiriwe na ba nyampinga baturutse mu bindi bihugu baje kwihera ijisho umukobwa wegukana ikamba.
Muri bo harimo Dative Uwimana waserukiye u Burundi muri Miss Africa University mu 2019; Nyampinga wa Tanzania, Sylivia Sebastian, watowe mu mwaka wa 2019; Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana; Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana n’igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi; Miss Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudani y’Epfo na Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda.
 	Irushanwa ryo gushaka umukobwa urusha abandi ubwiza, ubwenge n’umuco ryambukiranyije umunsi.
00: 04: Dj Ira yagarutse ku rubyiniro atangira kuvangavanga imiziki itandukanye. Abafana bari bari mu mwuka w’injyana gakondo bakomeje banyeganyega mu muziki wa kizungu.
Uyu mukobwa uva inda imwe na Bissosso na we wamamaye mu kuvanga imiziki, yatangiye acuranga indirimbo zirimo “Dede’’ ya Davis D, "Ni tuebue’’ ya Bushali, B Threy na Slim Drip, "Baba lao’’ n’izindi ziganjemo izo mu mahanga.
Icyo wamenya ku bihembo abakobwa bazahabwa muri Miss Rwanda 2020
 	Ibihembo bya Miss Rwanda 2020
Umukobwa wabaye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda yagenewe imodoka nshya (Zero Kilometre) yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift 2019 yatanzwe na Suzuki binyuze muri Rwanda Motor.
Azahabwa umushahara w’ibihumbi 800 Frw ku kwezi mu gihe cy’umwaka, aya akazatangwa na Africa Improved Foods.
Uzatorwa nka Nyampinga w’u Rwanda yemerewe kwivuza ku buntu ku ivuriro ryitwa Ubuzima Polyclinique no gusohokera muri Camellia agafata icyo ashaka mu gihe kingana n’umwaka azamarana ikamba.
Uzegukana ikamba rya Miss Rwanda kandi yemerewe itike y’indege izamujyana i Dubai n’ibindi byose bijyanye n’urugendo azakora mu rwego rw’ikiruhuko, iyi ikazatangwa na kompanyi yitwa Multi Design Group.
Keza Salon yemeye gukorera umukobwa uzegukana ikamba ibijyanye n’imisatsi ndetse no kwita ku bwiza bwe mu gihe cy’umwaka wose.
Uzegukana ikamba kandi azaba yemerewe “Printing” ku buntu ku bintu byose azaba ashaka muri Smart Design, mu gihe True Connect yo yamwemereye internet y’umwaka ku buntu.
Mu gihe agiye mu birori, umukobwa uzegukana ikamba azajya yambikwa na Ian Boutique ku buntu mu gihe azajya anahabwa imyenda ya Siporo y’ubuntu muri Magasin Sport Class.
Afrifame Pictures nayo yemereye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda kumufatira ibijyanye n’amafoto igihe cyose ayakeneye mu mwaka azamarana ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Umukobwa wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda buri mwaka ahita anatsindira itike yo guhagararira igihugu muri Miss World.
 	Ibyo ibisonga bya Miss Rwanda bizahembwa
Igisonga cya mbere azahita agirwa Brand Ambassador wa Kompanyi ya Multi Design Group izamuhemba 1 200 000 Frw, mu gihe igisonga cya kabiri cya Miss Rwanda na we azahembwa 1 200 000 Frw na Songa Logistics LTD, azanahita abera Brand Ambassador umwaka wose.
MTN Rwanda yemeye guhemba Miss Popularity 1 500 000 FRW akagirwa Brand Ambassador wa MTN Yolo, azahabwa iPhone 8Plus ya 64 GB ndetse anahabwe guhamagara no gukoresha internet ku buntu mu gihe cy’umwaka azamarana iri kamba.
Miss Photogenic, umukobwa wifotoza akaberwa n’amafoto, yagenewe igihembo cyo kuba Brand Ambassador wa Bella Flowers, aba bakazamugenera igihembo cya 1 200 000 Frw.
 	Akanama Nkemurampaka kagiye kwiherera mbere yo gutangaza umukobwa wegukanye ikamba
23:32: Nyuma yo kumurika imishinga yabo, abakobwa 10 bahataniye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda basubiye mu rwambariro. Muri buri cyiciro bari guhinduranya amakanzu baserukanye.
Abagize Akanama Nkemurampaka bagiye kwiherera batangaze umukobwa uhiga abandi, uri bwambikwe ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020.
Itorero Gakondo ryahise rihamagarwa risusurutsa abitabiriye ibi birori mu ndirimbo zifite umudiho wa Kinyarwanda. Ryaririmbye indirimbo zirimo Kanjogera ya Masamba Intore.
23:27: Irasubiza Alliance [No11] ni we mukobwa wa nyuma wanyuze imbere y’Akanama Nkemurampaka muri ba nyampinga bamuritse imishinga yabo.
Yavuze ko agiriwe icyizere cyo kwambikwa ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda azita ku kurwanya inda z’imburagihe mu bana bakiri bato bari munsi y’imyaka 18.
23:25: Umwiza Phionah [No47] afite umushinga wo kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana bari munsi y’imyaka 18.
23:24: Umutesi Denise [No43] umushinga we ni uguteza imbere uburenganzira bw’abaguzi.

23:19: Teta Ndenga Nicole [No35] yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gukangurira abanyarwanda n’urubyiruko guhinga ibiti by’imbuto.

23:13: Mutegwantebe Chanice [No27] afite umushinga wo guhuriza hamwe abantu batishoboye basabiriza ku mihanda mu rwego rwo kubafasha kwiteza imbere.

 	Amazina y’abakobwa 10 bakomeje mu kindi cyiciro
Abakobwa 19 bahamagawe imbere y’Akanama Nkemurampaka, hatangazwa abakobwa 10 bakomeje mu kindi cyiciro.
Muri aba bakobwa harimo Nishimwe Naomie wakomeje kubera yarushije bagenzi be amajwi binyuze ku matora yo kuri internet n’ubutumwa bugufi bwa SMS.

22:09: Itorero Inganzo Ngari ryahamagawe ku rubyiniro
Ababyinnyi b’Itorero Inganzo Ngari baserutse ahirengeye baherekejwe n’abakobwa bose 19 bahataniye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda.
Aba bakobwa bambaye bya Kinyarwanda bahawe rugari aba aribo biyerekana mu mbyino zitandukanye zigaragza umuco gakondo. Urebesheje ijisho biragaragara ko bitoje neza gutega amaboko no gucinya akadiho.
Nyuma yo kwiyerekana mu ndirimbo imwe bahaye urugari Inganzo Ngari yanzika n’igitaramo, isusurutsa abateraniye mu Intare Arena.
22:00: Uwase Aisha [No51] ni we mukobwa wa nyuma muri 19 banyuze imbere y’abagize Akanama Nkemurampaka. Yavuze ko igihugu cyiyemeje guteza imbere ubukungu bushingiye ku bumenyi hashingiwe ku rugero rwa Singapoure. Yavuze ko urubyiruko rukeneye gukomeza kwiga rwiteza imbere mu bijyanye n’ubumenyi ngiro.
21:57: Umwiza Phionah [No47] yasobanuye akamaro k’amarushanwa y’ubwiza ku mwana w’umukobwa.
21:50: Umutesi Denise [No43] yabajijwe igisobanuro cy’Umwiherero w’abayobozi bakuru b’igihugu.
Yavuze ko Umwiherero ari gahunda imaze kuba inshuro 17, ihuriramo abayobozi mu nzego zitandukanye, za leta, abikorera. Yongeyeho ko wigirwamo ibibazo biri mu gihugu no kubishakira ibisubizo.
21:50: Umuratwa Anitha [No42] yabajijwe ku Nama ya CommonWealth u Rwanda rwitegura kwakira muri Kamena 2020.
Yavuze ko iyo nama igamije guhuza ibihugu bivuga ururimi rw’Icyongereza. Icyo u Rwanda ruzayungukiramo ni ukubona abashyitsi barimo abazakoresha Sosiyete y’Ubwikorezi ya RwandAir.
21:49: Teta Ndenga Nicole [No35] yavuze kuri gahunda yo Kwita Izina asobanura icyo imariye igihugu.
21:43: Nyinawumuntu Rwiririza Delice [No33] yavuze ko guha agaciro ururimi gakondo bifasha igihugu cyane ko iyo bahuje ururimi kubahuza biroroha kandi iterambere ry’igihugu iyo rizamutse byongera agaciro kacyo.
21:41: Nishimwe Naomie [No31] yabajijwe icyo azi kuri gahunda ya Rwanda Day. Yasobanuye ko ari igikorwa gihuza Abanyarwanda cyatangijwe mu 2010 bigizwemo uruhare na Perezida Paul Kagame.
21:38: Mutesi Denyse [No28] yageze imbere y’Akanama Nkemurampaka.
21:35: Mutegwantebe Chanice [No27] yavuze ko umugore yahawe agaciro abasha kwitinyuka ndetse anagira uruhare mu iterambere binyuze mu guhanganira imyanya ku isoko ry’umurimo.
21:34: Musana Teta Hense [No26] yanyuze imbere y’Akanama Nkemurampaka.
21:28: Mukangwije Rosine [No21] yabajijwe ku kijyanye n’ikurwaho rya Visa ku baturage bo mu miryango ya Commonwealth na Francophonie.
Mukangwije yavuze ko bizongera abakerarugendo, bikazamura amadevize igihugu cyinjiza.
21:23: Marebe Benitha [No18] yasobanuye ko gahunda yo kumenyekanisha u Rwanda ya Visit Rwanda yazamuye ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Yasabye Abanyarwanda gushyigikira iyo gahunda mu gukomeza kubaka igihugu n’umurage wacyo.
21:21:Kirezi Rutaremara Brune [No17]. Yabajijwe impanuro bahawe n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, n’icyo ayo masomo yabamariye.
Kirezi yavuze ko amasomo bahawe afasha umukobwa kurushaho gusobanukirwa igihugu no kumenya indangagaciro zikwiye kumuranga nk’uzahagararira u Rwanda mu mahanga.
21:18: Kamikazi Rurangirwa Nadege [No15] yageze imbere y’Akanama Nkemurampaka. Yavuze ko Nyampinga afata nk’icyitegererezo ari Miss Mutesi Jolly watangije ibiganiro bihuza urubyiruko ndetse akaba ashyira imbaraga mu kubaka ubushobozi bw’igitsinagore.
21:15: Irasubiza Alliance [No 11]. Yavuze ko impamvu Afurika idatera imbere ari ukubera imiyoborere mibi kuko umugabane ufite imitungo kamere ihagije yafasha umugabane kwiteza imbere.
21:11: Ingabire Rehema [No10] yabajijwe icyo azi ku barinzi b’igihango. Yavuze ko ari ibikorwa by’indashyikirwa biteza imbere ibijyanye n’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge.
21:07: Ingabire Gaudence [No8] yabajijwe ibyiciro by’Intwari no kubitandukanya. Yavuze ko ubutwari bugaragaza umuntu witanga kandi uharanira kugera ku byiza abikoreye abandi. Yasobanuye ko hari ibyiciro bitatu by’intwari birimo Imena, Ingenzi n’Imanzi.
21:02: Ingabire Diane [No7] yavuze ko mu guhangana n’abatera abangavu inda zitateganyijwe yasaba ko hakazwa ibihano ku basambanya abangavu.
20:59: Akaliza Hope [No 1] ni we mukobwa wa mbere wagize imbere y’Akanama Nkemurampaka. Buri wese ari gutombora ikibazo mu biri mu gakangara. Nyuma yo gusuhuza abakagize yabajijwe uko abona izamuka ry’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda.
Ubukungu bw’u Rwanda burazamuka bitewe no kuba igihugu gitekanye bigatuma abashoramari bashora imari mu gihugu.
 	Impinduka mu bagize Akanama Nkemurampaka
Mu bagize Akanama Nkemurampaka bazengurutse intara zose hamwe na Miss Rwanda 2020, Miss Mutesi Jolly ni we wenyine wagaragaye mu kanama nkemurampaka hose.
Usibye Jolly Mutesi ariko kandi Evelyne Umurerwa na we wagaragaye mu kanama nkemurampaka mu majonjora yabaye muri buri ntara yongeye kwinjiramo ku munsi wo gutanga ikamba.
Umunyamakuru ubifitemo uburambe Munyaneza James akaba akorera The New Times wari wagiriwe icyizere muri Pre-Selection yongeye kugarukamo.
Hinjiyemo kandi amaraso mashya nka Ntarindwa Diogène umunyarwenya wamenyekanye cyane nka Atome mu Rwanda.
Umubyinnyi mpuzamahanga w’Umunyarwandakazi Sherrie Silver kuri iyi nshuro yinjiye mu kanama nkemurampaka.
Aba ni bo bagomba gutanga amanota aza gutanga Nyampinga w’u Rwanda. Kugira ngo umukobwa yegukane ikamba haragenderwa ku bintu bitatu aribyo; Uburanga, Ubwenge n’Umuco.
Ntalindwa Diogène wavuze mu izina ry’abagize akanama nkemurampaka ka Miss Rwanda 2020 yavuze ko ubwiza butanga amanota 30, umushinga w’umukobwa ugatanga amanota 40 n’umuco ukabarirwa ku manota 30.
20:47: Abakobwa bahamagawe ku rubyiniro imbere y’Akanama Nkemurampaka. Aba bakobwa bambaye amapantalo y’umukara n’imipira y’umukara ya Miss Rwanda. Hari guseruka babiri babiri, abafana bari kubakiriza amashyi y’urufaya n’induru nyinshi ku buryo byagorana kumenya ushyigikiwe cyane.
Mu byo bari kugaragaza harimo ibyo batojwe mu gihe cy’umwiherero bamazemo ibyumweru bibiri.
Video: Uko abakobwa baserutse muri Miss Rwanda 2020
20:33: Abashyushyarugamba b’ibi birori bageze ku rubyiniro
Abanyamakuru Nzeyimana Luckman na Martina Shami Abera bakora kuri KC2, Ishami rya kabiri rya Televiziyo y’u Rwanda batanze ikaze ku bitabiriye ibirori bya Miss Rwanda.
Batangiye bavuga uko urugendo rwo guhitamo abakobwa rwatangiye kugeza uyu munsi wanone, hasigayemo 19 bahataniye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
 	Ba Nyampinga bafite amakamba y’umwaka ushize biteguye kutayanga
Abakobwa begukanye amakamba mu mwaka ushize biteguye kuyashyikiriza bagenzi babo bari buseruke neza.
Uhereye ibumoso hari Mwiseneza Josiane wabaye Miss Popularity 2019, Kabahenda Ricca Michaella wabaye Nyampinga w’Umuco 2019, Muyango Claudine wahawe ikamba rya Nyampinga uberwa n’amafoto 2019, Uwase Sangwa Odille wabaye Igisonga cya Kabiri 2019 na Uwihirwe Yasipi Casimir wabaye Igisonga cya Mbere 2019.
 	 Video: Uko byari byifashe mbere yo gutangira ibirori byo gutanga ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020
 	Ibyamamare byitabiriye Miss Rwanda ku bwinshi
Ibyamamare mu ngeri zitandukanye byatangiye kugera mu cyumba kigiye kuberamo irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ijisho ry’umufotozi wa IGIHE ryabonye bamwe barimo Umunyarwandakazi Sherrie Silver umaze kubaka izina mu mbyino ku Isi yose.
 	Nishimwe Naomie yasoje amatora ari ku isonga
Mu matora yaba ayo kuri nternet no kuri SMS yarangiye saa moya z’umugoroba kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020. Yarangiye Nishimwe Naomie ariwe uyoboye abandi mu majwi.
Kuri internet Nishimwe Naomie yabaye uwa mbere n’amajwi 92 756 naho kuri SMS ayoboye abandi n’amajwi 79 756.
 	Umuteguro ni wose, umuziki ukomeje kubyinwa
19:53: Abafana benshi bamaze kwinjira mu Intare Conference Arena. Umuriri uri hejuru cyane, amajwi y’abafana ari kumvikana baririmba amazina y’abakobwa bari inyuma.
Urubyiniro abakobwa bahagararaho basobanura imishinga yabo rwateguwe, rwarimbishijwe n’indabo nziza ziri mu mabara atandukanye.
Muri aka kanya ibirori ntibiratangira, Iradukunda Grace Divine [Dj Ira] ni we uri gususurutsa abaje kureba Miss Rwanda 2020 mu miziki itandukanye irimo iy’Abanyarwanda n’iyo muri Amerika.
 	Imodoka ihabwa Nyampinga w’u Rwanda yagejejwe mu Intare Arena
Imodoka ihabwa Miss Rwanda 2020 yagejejwe mu Intare Arena, mbere yuko ibirori bitangira imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift ihembwa Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 yamaze kwinjizwa ahari kubera ibi birori itwikiriwe.
Iyi modoka ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 18 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda yatanzwe n’Uruganda rwa Africa Improved Foods ari nayo izahemba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 800 000 Frw buri kwezi mu gihe cy’umwaka azamarana ikamba.
 	Intare Arena niyo Nimwiza Meghan yambikiwemo ikamba amaranye umwaka
Inyubako ya Intare Arena niyo yakiriye ibirori byatangiwemo ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda wa 2019, ryegukanywe na Nimwiza Meghan ku mugoroba wo ku wa 26 Mutarama 2019.
 	Rwarutabura wa Rayon Sports ashyigikiye Umutesi Denise
Ngenzahimana Bosco [Rwarutabura]umenyerewe nk’umufana ukomeye wa Rayon Sports ari mu bashyigikiye Umutesi Denise [No43].
Rwarutabura witabiriye Miss Rwanda avuye kwa muganga nyuma yo gukubitwa agakomeretswa ku mugoroba wo ku wa 21 Gashyantare 2020, yabwiye IGIHE ko yemeye kuza gushyigikira mushiki w’inshuti y’umuryango we.
18:30: Abantu batangiye kwinjira mu Intare Conference Arena ahagiye kubera irushanwa rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda. Hari gucurangwa indirimbo zitandukanye ari nako abafana benshi bazibyina bagaragaza akanyamuneza.
 	Ababyeyi, inshuti n’abavandimwe b’abakobwa bahatana babubekereye
Imihanda myinshi iri kwerekeza i Rusororo ku Intare Arena ahatangarizwa Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020.
Abitabiriye ibi birori bashyiriweho imodoka zibakura kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera zibageza i Rusororo.
Mu masaha ya saa Kumi n’imwe, abantu benshi bageze aho irushanwa ribera, baserutse bafite ibyapa biriho amazina y’abakobwa bashyigikiye bifuza ko aribo bakwambikwa ikamba.
Urebye ku maso yabo bifitiye icyizere, bambariye gushyigikira abakobwa babo no kuza kubabona bashinjagirana isheja bambikwa ikamba.
Usibye ibyapa, bambaye imipira iriho amazina n’amafoto y’abo bashyigikiye. Bicaye ahantu hamwe ku buryo umuriri wabo ushobora gusakara ukagera kuri benshi mu bateraniye mu Intare Arena.
Irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ryatangiriye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku wa 21 Ukuboza 2019, ahatoranyirijwe abakobwa batandatu bemerewe guhagararira Intara y’Uburengerazuba; ku wa 28 Ukuboza 2019 mu Karere ka Musanze hatoranyijwe abakobwa batandatu bahagarariye Amajyaruguru.
Umwaka wa 2020 watangiye irushanwa rikomereza mu Karere ka Huye aho ku wa 4 Mutarama havuye abakobwa barindwi bahagarariye Amajyepfo. Ijonjora ry’ibanze mu ntara ryasorejwe mu Karere ka Kayonza, ahavuye abakobwa 15 bahagarariye Uburasirazuba mu gihe ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020, abakobwa 20 batoranyirijwe guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali.
Mu bakobwa 400 bose bageze ahabereye ijonjora ry’ibanze, 54 gusa ni bo bemeje abagize akanama nkemurampaka bemererwa gukomeza mu cyiciro cya nyuma cyasize havuyemo 20 bagiye mu mwiherero w’ibyumweru bibiri wabereye muri La Palisse Hotel i Nyamata.
Abakobwa 20 batangiye umwiherero ku wa 9 Gashyantare 2020, ariko Ingabire Jolie Ange ntiyagize amahirwe yo gukomeza kuko yasezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Irushanwa ry’ubwiza mu Rwanda ryatangiye mu 1993 icyo gihe Nyampinga yabaye Miss Uwera Dalila, ryambitswe Bahati Grace mu 2009, mu 2012 rihabwa Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore, mu 2014 ryambikwa Akiwacu Colombe, Kundwa Doriane arihabwa mu 2015, Mutesi Jolly atorwa mu 2016, Iradukunda Elsa afata irya 2017, irya 2018 ryahawe Iradukunda Liliane mu gihe iriheruka mu 2019 ryatwawe na Nimwiza Meghan.

Title: Amateka y’ibyorezo by’inzara, indwara z’abantu n’amatungo byayogoje u Rwanda kugeza mu 1946
Body:
Mbere y’imyaka 74 ishize(1946-2020) ishize, u Rwanda rwabaye mu byorezo by’inzara, indwara z’abantu n’amatungo, byoretse imbaga y’abatagira ingano, bishegesha igihugu ku buryo ubuyobozi bwariho icyo gihe bwagiye bufata ingamba zikomeye.
Mbere y’imyaka 74 ishize(1946-2020) ishize, u Rwanda rwabaye mu byorezo by’inzara, indwara z’abantu n’amatungo, byoretse imbaga y’abatagira ingano, bishegesha igihugu ku buryo ubuyobozi bwariho icyo gihe bwagiye bufata ingamba zikomeye.
Igitabo “Imizi y’u Rwanda” cyanditswe n’umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, kigaragaza ko ubwo hari hashize imyaka mike umwami Mibambwe Sentabyo yimye ingoma, ni ukuvuga ahasaga mu wa 1746, mu Gisaka hateye ubushita burimbura abatagira ingano.
 Icyo ihe mu Rwanda hari intambara itoroshye hagati ya Mibambwe Sentabyo na Gatarabuhura washakaga ingoma ku mbaraga. Sentabyo yahashyije Gatarabuhura ahungira mu Gisaka. Mu gihe biteguraga gutera mu Gisaka hateye indwara y’ubushita bituma Abanyarwanda batinya gutera yo ngo batazana icyo cyorezo ndetse n’ umwami ubwe aca iteka ko nta muntu ugomba kwambuka Nyabarongo agana iburasirazuba bw’u Rwanda kugira ngo atagira aho ahurira n’iyo ndwara.
Umwami na we yarimutse aza gutura muri Taba ya Gitarama ahitwa i Remera ndetse n’amato yose yambutsaga abantu muri Nyabarongo abuzwa kongera kwambutsa abantu mu rwego rwo gushyira mu kato igice cy’uburasirazuba.
Kimenyi Getura umwami wategekaga i Gisaka icyo gihe ; na we yatinyaga u Rwanda kandi ahora azi neza ko isaha ku isaha igihugu cye cyaterwa n’abanyarwanda bakacyigarurira. Ibyo byatumye yigira inama yo gushyigikira Gatarabuhura akanamutiza amaboko bagafata ubutegetsi mu Rwanda bityo na we igihugu cye kikagira amahoro.
Yashyizeho Inkoto( Bariyeri) hirya no hino mu gihugu cyane cyane ku mbibi zihuza u Rwanda n’i Gisaka.
Uyu mwami Kimenyi Getura yaje guhimba amayeri yo kohereza umuntu mu Rwanda agenda yiyita ko ahunze igihugu bityo akaba ashaka ubuhungiro ku mwami Sentabyo. Uwo muntu ngo yaje yitwaje n’impano y’impuzu ikoze neza, ariko iyi mpano yari iy’uburozi kuko ngo yari yarambawe n’umunyabushita.
Sentabyo ntiyagize amakenga y’ikigambiriwe, yahise akenyera iyo mpuzu imwanduza ubushita ari nabwo bwamuhitanye. Nubwo Sentabyo yahitanywe n’ubushita, yagerageje gukingira abanyarwanda, ntibabwandura ngo bubakukumbe. Yategetse ko nta munya-Gisaka winjira mu Rwanda, abanyarwanda nabo babuzwa kujyayo ndetse mu gihugu hose hashyirwaho za bariyeri (Inkoto) zikumira abashoboraga kukinjirana mu Rwanda.
Hagati y’umwaka wa 1746 na 1946, mu Rwanda hadutse indwara z’ibyorezo zitandukanye zahitanye n’amatungo. Muri zo twavuga nko mu 1890-1891 ubwo hateraga indwara y’amatungo yitwa Muryamo yibasiraga cyane amatungo magufi, mu 1907-1908 hateye indwara y’amatungo yitwa Uburenge bwibasiraga cyane inka, mu 1920-1927 hateye indwara y’amatungo yitwa Iragara, mu 1934-1935 hongeye gutera Muryamo yibasira cyane cyane amatungo magufi n’indwara y’amatungo yitwa Amashuye bwibasiraga cyane inka inka yadutse mu 1936-1937.
Kugira ngo abami b’u Rwanda bahoshe ibyo byorezo byibasiraga amatungo, bakoraga imihango yo gufukura amariba mashya bakayatera n’ibyuhagiro bivura izo ndwara n’indi mihango yateganywaga n’Ubwiru.
U Rwanda kandi rwigeze kugira n’ibihe by’amapfa akomeye hatera ibyorezo by’inzara, zihitana abatari bake. Nko mu 1890 hateye inzara bise Muhatibicumuro, mu 1902 -1903 hateye inzara bise Ruyaga, mu 1917-1918 hateye Rumanura( Rumanurimbaba), mu 1924-1925 hateye Gakwege, mu 1927-1928 hateye Urwakayihura ( Yitiriwe Kayihura wataraga u Bugoyi kuko ariho yatangiriye), mu 1931 hateye inzige ziyogoza imyaka naho mu 1942-1944 hatera Ruzagayura.
Mu bihe by’inzara n’amapfa, Abami b’amatungo n’imyaka bajyaga mu miterekero, bagatanga imbuto n’ibyuhagiro by’imyaka kugira ngo irumbuke. Kera mu Rwanda hakundaga gutera Inzara bitaga amazina bahereye ku cyayiteye, cyangwa se ku bimenyetso byayo no ku nkurikizi zayo
Mu byorezo by’inzara , Abami b’imbuto bajyaga ku misozi miremire, bakahaca ibiraro, bagaterekera, ari na ko bavuza ingoma; imvura yabaga yahagamye, ikagwa. Ibyonnyi na byo byatera mu mirima, Abahoryo bakazivuma zikagenda.
Hari n’indwara z’ ibyorezo zateraga mu bantu ku mpamvu zo kubura imiti zikarimbura imbaga , abarokotse zikabasigira ubusembwa. Indwara z’ibyorezo zateye mu Rwanda zikibasira abantu, zirimo ubushita bwateye hagati ya 1893 na 1894, mu 1916-1917 bwarongeye buratera, mu 1917-1918 ; hateye Mugiga inagaruka mu 1935 naho mu 1945 hatera ibihara.
Iyo ibyorezo by’indwara nk’izo byateraga, Abami b’ imbuto n’amatungo batangaga amasubyo, ariyo miti y’amahumane yo gucubya ibyo byorezo by’indwara.
Mu Rwanda rwa kera habaga n’indi mihango yajyanaga n’ingoma, igakorwa n’abavubyi b’imvura, bakayikorera ahantu inkuba yabaga yakubise, bakahaterekerera , kugira ngo bahavane umwaku wayo , bakahagangahura.

Title: Incamake ku gitabo “Stop Working for Uncle Sam” gikebura abahora barambirije ku mushahara
Body:
Si henshi wasanga bashishikariza abantu gushaka akazi, ahubwo bahora babashishikariza kugahanga bakagaha abandi nk’imwe mu ntwaro zo kwivana mu bukene no guteza imbere igihugu.
Si henshi wasanga bashishikariza abantu gushaka akazi, ahubwo bahora babashishikariza kugahanga bakagaha abandi nk’imwe mu ntwaro zo kwivana mu bukene no guteza imbere igihugu.
Abafite akazi na bo bararira, bamwe binubira umushahara w’intica ntikize bahabwa, abandi barambiwe guhora bafatirwa imyanzuro y’icyo bakora, igihe bagikorera n’uko bagikora nta ruhare babigizemo.
Sunday Adelaja ni umupasiteri wo muri Nigeria, yabavunnye amaguru mu gitabo cye ‘Stop Working for Uncle Sam’ cyasohotse mu 2017.
Ni igitabo kigaragaza inzira zose wanyuramo ukareka gukorera abandi, aho gukoreshwa ugatangira gukoresha abandi.
Iki gitabo kigereranya abakorera umushahara nk’abacakara bahorana ubukene bw’amafaranga, bagenerwa utuvungukira ku murundo w’ibyo baba babiriye icyuya, kandi hari uburyo nabo bakwiteza imbere.
Umwanditsi asobanura Uncle Sam nk’ahantu hose ujya gushaka akazi cyangwa uburyo bw’imikorere aho imibereho yawe yose uyikesha uwo muntu cyangwa urwo rwego ruguha umushahara.
Kubaho ukorera abandi Sunday abigereranya nk’ubucakara buburizamo ubwigenge bw’umuntu, aho ukora icyo bakubwiye cyose nta mwanya wo gutekereza cyangwa gukora ibintu nk’uko wowe ubishaka.
Ati “Mu gihe ukorera Uncle Sam, uba wishyira mu bucakara ku bushake bwawe kubera ko akwishyura udufaranga tw’intica ntikize. Kubera utwo tuntu duke, uremera ukagurisha ubuzima bwawe, ukagurisha ukwishyira ukizana kwawe, uba uboshye udashobora guhindukira ngo ugane iburyo cyangwa ibumoso.”
“Ntushobora kuvuga ngo ugiye mu biruhuko igihe ushakiye umukoresha wawe atabyemeye. Ntushobora kwihitiramo ngo ngiye aha n’aha mu gihe wenda cy’ukwezi, uba uziritswe.”
Ni igitabo kigaragaza uburyo bwo guhunga ubucakara bwo kuba umukozi ahubwo ukaba umukoresha, ukareka kuba wa muntu uhorana ubukene kandi ukora buri munsi.
Iki gitabo kigaragaza kandi ko abantu bose badakwiye kumva ko bakwikorera, ahubwo bashobora gukorera abandi, bakitanga bishoboka ariko batameze nk’abacakara.
Agira inama abantu ko bakwiriye kwirinda kuguma mu kazi banga, kuko uko kukagumamo bituma bagakora nabi kurusha, bikarangira bashwanye n’abakoresha babo.
Ingingo yo gukoresha igihe neza, nayo umwanditsi ayigarukaho, aho asobanura ko igihe kigereranywa n’ubuzima, kugikoresha nabi bikaba bisa no kwangiza ubuzima bwawe.
Asobanura kandi ibyiza byo kwiga, ariko mu bundi buryo, aho usanga abantu benshi bumva ko kwiga bakaminuza bihagije kugira ngo babeho mu buzima bwiza bifuza, aho avuga ko atari byo ndetse bitanahuye.
Iki gitabo cy’amapaji 292 kiboneka kuri Amazon.

Title: Iby’ingenzi mu gitabo ‘Let the People Pick the President’ kinenga uburyo amatora muri Amerika akorwamo
Body:
Hashize igihe abaturage binubura uburyo bwo kubara amajwi bwiswe ‘Electoral College’ bukoreshwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Nubwo bose babyinubira, nta n’umwe wigeze abyandika mu buryo busomeka neza nk’uko Jesse Wegman yabikoze mu gitabo cye gishya “Let the People Pick the President.”
Hashize igihe abaturage binubura uburyo bwo kubara amajwi bwiswe ‘Electoral College’ bukoreshwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Nubwo bose babyinubira, nta n’umwe wigeze abyandika mu buryo busomeka neza nk’uko Jesse Wegman yabikoze mu gitabo cye gishya “Let the People Pick the President.”
Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Amerika yagerageje inshuro zisaga 700 guhindura cyangwa kuvanaho iryo tegeko ariko byaranze. Ni uburyo bwo gutora butumvwa kimwe n’abatuye Amerika.
Electoral College muri Amerika, abatora babarwa ni abo bise ‘electors’ 538 muri Leta 50, barimo abasenateri 100, abadepite 435 n’abandi batatu ba District of Columbia. Abo mu bigaragara nibo batora ugomba kuba Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Leta zigenda zirushanya umubare w’abatora nk’uko zirutanwa mu bunini cyangwa umubare w’abaturage. Hagendewe ku ibarura ry’abaturage rya 2015, California ituwe na 39 144 818 ibarirwa abatora 55; Texas ifite 27 469 114 ikagira abatora 34; New York ituwe na 19 795 791 ikagira abatora 31 naho Pennsylvania ituwe na 12 802 503 ifite abatora 21.
Kugira ngo byumvikane, igihe umukandida runaka atowe n’abaturage benshi muri California, ahita ahabwa abatora (electors) 55 hatitawe ku majwi abandi bari bahanganye bagize. Bivuze ko afatwa nk’uwatowe n’abatuye iyo Leta bose kandi atari ko biri.
Utsinda ni ugira hejuru ya kimwe cya kabiri cya ba electors 538 kingana n’abantu 270.
Ni uburyo bamwe bafata nk’ubudatanga ubwisanzure, kuko ibyo abaturage benshi bahisemo atari ihame ko ari byo byemezwa nkuko amahame ya demokarasi abiteganya.
Umukandida ashobora gutorwa n’abaturage benshi ariko kuko yatowe n’abo muri Leta zidatuwe cyane kabone n’aho zaba ari nyinshi, agatsindwa kuko abo muri Leta zituwe cyane bamutoye ku bwinshi, akikubira ba ba ‘electors’ iyo Leta igenerwa.
Ikindi gishobora kubitera ni uko muri Leta atagizemo ubwiganze, ayo majwi y’abamutoye asa nk’abaye imfabusa kandi wenda iyo aza guteranywa n’ay’ahandi yagize ubwiganze bwinshi, ari we washoboraga kuza imbere.
Byarabaye mu 2016, ubwo Hillary Clinton yatsindwaga ku munota wa nyuma na Donald Trump nyamara Clinton ari we watowe na benshi.
Mu matora atanu ya Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aherutse, inshuro ebyiri zose hari abagiye batorwa atari uko batowe n’abaturage benshi ahubwo kuko uburyo bwa Electoral College bwabahaye ababahagararaira benshi kubera Leta zituwe cyane batsinzemo, nyamara wabara abaturage bose babatoye no muri za Leta zituwe na bake, ugasanga nibo bari batsinze cyane.
N’iyo uwatowe na benshi ari we ubaye Perezida, akenshi abaturage ntibabona uruhare rwabo rw’ako kanya mu kumushyiraho, kuko amajwi yabo avunjwamo ibyo bindi byiswe ‘electors’ hakagira ababanza kuyaha umugisha mbere yo gutangaza uwatsinze.
Igitabo cya Jesse Wegman kigaragaza ko mu gihe Amerika igiye kujya mu matora ya Perezida mu Ugushyingo 2020, uburyo bukoreshwa Perezida atorwa bukwiriye guhindurwa kuko budakoresha ukuri n’umucyo.
Let the People Pick the President ni igitabo kijya mu mizi itangiriro ry’ubwo buryo bwiswe ‘Electoral College’ n’amakuru atandukanye yagiye atangwa na bamwe mu bagiye bagira uruhare mu matora ya Perezida yagiye aba guhera mu mwaka wa 2000, bagaragaza impamvu ubwo buryo butakijyanye n’igihe.
Iki gitabo cyasohotse tariki 17 Werurwe 2020, kiboneka ku iguriro rya internet rya Amazon no ku zindi mbuga za internet zisomerwaho ibitabo.

Title: Bimwe mu bitabo by’Abanyarwanda byagufasha muri iki gihe cya coronavirus
Body:
Gusoma ni bumwe mu buryo bwo kwiyungura ubwenge, bukaba uburyo bwo kuruhuka no kwinezeza mu gihe ufite umwanya uhagije.
Gusoma ni bumwe mu buryo bwo kwiyungura ubwenge, bukaba uburyo bwo kuruhuka no kwinezeza mu gihe ufite umwanya uhagije.
Muri ibi bihe Abanyarwanda bagiriwe inama yo kuguma mu ngo kugira ngo hahashywe icyorezo cya Coronavirus, gusoma igitabo ni bumwe mu buryo bwafasha kubyitwaramo neza, ntikibe igihe cy’ubwoba no gupfusha ubusa ahubwo kikaba umwanya wo kwiyungura ubwenge no kumenya byinshi.
Ubwanditsi bw’ibitabo mu Rwanda bukomeje gutera imbere, ariyo mpamvu IGIHE yatoranyije bimwe mu bitabo by’Abanyarwanda biri mu ngeri zitandukanye bishobora gufasha abantu kumererwa neza muri ibi bihe.
La mort ne veut pas de moi, Yolande Mukagasana
La mort ne veut pas de moi ni igitabo Yolande Mukagasana yanditse mu mwaka wa 1997 nyuma y’imyaka itatu Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ibaye. Kigaruka ku buzima bubi Abatutsi baciyemo mu gihe cya Jenoside. Bavuga ko ‘Imana yirirwa ahandi igataha i Rwanda’, ariko Mukagasana mu gitabo yibaza niba guhera tariki 6 Mata 1994 yari ikiri mu Rwanda koko, cyangwa niba yari yarusigiye sekibi.
Intwari z’Imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro, Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu
Iki gitabo cyasohotse mu mwaka wa 2018. Gikubiyemo amateka y’imyubakire y’u Rwanda nk’igihugu, umushinga waraje benshi rwantambi bawutekereza, na nyuma yo kuwunoza, ukabaraza ishinga mu ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryawo.
Indege y’ubumwe Rwanda rw’ubu, François Xavier Gasimba Munezero
Igitabo ‘Indege y’ubumwe Rwanda rw’ubu’ cya François Xavier Gasimba Munezero, cyasohotse mu 1999. Ni igitabo cy’inkuru mpimbano ikoze mu buryo bw’igisigo, ivuga kuri Guverinoma y’Ubumwe yagiyeho nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Mu buryo busa nk’ubutebya, Gasimba agaragaza u Rwanda nk’indege, itwawe n’abayobozi batandukanye bagenda bafata imyanzuro itandukanye ngo indege itarohama.
Petit Pays, Gaël Faye 
Iki gitabo cyanditswe mu mwaka wa 2016, cyandikwa na Gaël Faye, Umufaransa uvuka ku mubyeyi w’umunyarwanda. Avugamo ubuzima bwe, aho agaruka ku buzima bw’umwana wavukiye i Burundi akabyarwa n’umunyarwandakazi w’impunzi n’umuzungu w’umufaransa wakoreraga i Burundi. Uwo mwana avuga uko yabonaga ubuzima muri icyo gihe, ibibazo by’amoko, Hutu na Tutsi.
Uwo mwana ufite hagati y’imyaka 10 na 15 aba yibuka uburyo ubuto bwe bwaje kwicwa n’ibibazo bya politike zo muri aka karere. Anavuga ku kibazo cyo kuvuka ku babyeyi badahuje uruhu.
Gukira Bishobokera Buri Wese, Ariko Biraharanirwa, Dieudonne D’amour Nordkvist Hakizimana
Cyanditswe na Dieudonne D’amour Nordkvist Hakizimana mu mwaka wa 2019. Gikubiyemo amabanga menshi yatuma ukira mu kanya gato abari bakuzi udafite n’urwara rwo kwishima bagatangira gutangazwa n’impinduka zaje mu buzima bwawe.
Rwanda means The Universe, Louise Mushikiwabo
Mu mwaka wa 2006 ubwo yabaga muri Leta Zuze Ubumwe za Amerika, Louise Mushikiwabo yasohoye igitabo ‘Rwanda means The Universe’ (U Rwanda bisobanuye Isanzure) cy’amapaji 384 yafatanyije n’umunyamakuru Jack Kramer.
Igitabo cya Mushikiwabo cyanditse mu buryo bw’ibarankuru n’itangabuhamya. Inkuru ya Mushikiwabo ayitangira mbere gato y’ihanurwa ry’indege yari itwaye Perezida Juvenal Habyarimana mu 1994, avuga uko yari abayeho muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho yabaga ndetse n’ibyo inshuti ze zakundaga kumubaza ku mubano, amateka n’imibereho y’abanyarwanda.
Mushikiwabo na Kramer bagaragaza ubugome Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yakoranywe n’uburyo bigaragara ko yari yarabanje gutegurwa. Iki gitabo kijya mu mizi y’imibereho y’abanyarwanda mbere y’abakoloni, ubwo abanyarwanda babagaho nta yindi si bazi ari naho izina ry’igitabo ryaturutse.
Untamed, Beyond Freedom, Uwineza Celine
Igitabo ‘Untamed, Beyond Freedom’ cyanditswe na Uwineza Celine, gisohoka muri Mata 2019. Yanditse ku buzima yabayemo we n’umuryango we muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ubwo yicirwaga benshi mu muryango akiri umwana muto.
Iki gitabo cy’amapaji 149 cyanditse mu buryo bwo kubara inkuru. Uwineza atangirana ibaruwa yandikiye mama we wishwe tariki 10 Mata 1994 hamwe na bakuru be babiri na musaza we, abamenyesha agahinda afite nyuma yo kubabura n’uburyo akumbuye kuzongera kubabona.
Intwari Mpinduramatwara Paul Kagame, Richard Hategekimana
Iki gitabo “Intwari Mpinduramatwara Paul Kagame”, kigaragaza ibikorwa bya Perezida Kagame by’indashyikirwa nuko yagaruriye u Rwanda ikuzo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Icyo gitabo cy’amapaji 98 kigaragaza uburyo igice kimwe cy’Abanyarwanda bari barahejejwe hanze ariko akabacyura, ndetse akanahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, yanaguyemo abasaga miliyoni mu gihe cy’amezi atatu.
Mitingi Jenosideri, Imbundo, Imbarutso y’imbunda yarimbuye imbaga , Edouard Bamporiki
Iki gitabo cyasohotse mu 2017, ni icya Edouard Bamporiki. Gikubiyemo ubuhamya bw’abantu 67 bakoze Jenoside ndetse na bamwe mu bana bavutse ku babyeyi barokotse nyuma yo gufatwa ku ngufu n’abajenosideri.
L’oncle Gynécologue, Numuhire Caroline
Iki gitabo cya Numuhire Caroline, gikubiyemo inkuru y’umwana w’umukobwa wahohotewe na nyirarume wamusuzumaga igihe yari atwite.
Inkuru iri muri iki gitabo ishingiye ku mwana w’umukobwa watewe inda nk’urwibutso asigiwe n’inshuti ye magara yari irwaye kanseri, nyuma yo gutereranwa n’umuryango we, ahitamo kubiganiriza nyirarume wari inzobere mu kuvura indwara z’abagore ariko ntiyamubera imfura, amufata ku ngufu.
Moi, Le dernier Tutsi, Charles Habonimana
‘Moi le dernier Tutsi’, ni igitabo cyanditswe na Charles Habonimana gisohoka mu 2019. Gikubiyemo ubuhamya bw’imibereho y’Umututsi mbere ya Jenoside, inzira y’umusaraba we ubwe yanyuzemo mu gihe cya Jenoside n’uburyo Ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi zamurokoye.
Ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda mu mateka yabo, Innocent Nizeyimana
Iki ni gitabo cyasohotse mu mwaka wa 2015. Umwanditsi agaragaza imibanire y’Abanyarwanda mbere y’uko abazungu baza mu Rwanda, uko iyo mibanire myiza yaje kugenda ihinduka mibi buhoro buhoro bitewe n’imiyoborere mibi y’ubukoroni ndetse n’uburyo Abatutsi batangiye kwirukanwa mu Rwanda. Iki gitabo gisoza kivuga uko abakoroni basizeho Repubulika ya mbere yagombaga gukomeza gukora ku nyungu zabo
Inzira y’Inzitane yo kwibohora, NDAHIRO Logan
Iki gitabo cyanditswe na nyakwigendera Ndahiro Logan mu mwaka wa 2017. Gikubiyemo inzira igoye ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi zanyuzemo mu rugendo rwo kubohora Abanyarwanda.
Un abrege de l’ethno histoire du Rwanda, Alexis Kagame
Ni igitabo cyanditswe n’inzobere mu mateka y’u Rwanda, Padiri Alexis Kagame. Kivuga ku mateka y’u Rwanda guhera mu 1853 kugeza mu 1972, kikaba cyarasohotse mu 1972.
Rwanda demain! Une Longue Marche vers la transformation, Dr Kimonyo Jean Paul
Iki gitabo cyasohotse mu 2018, kivuga ku mbogamizi n’ibitekerezo byiza byaranze inzira yo kongera kwiyubaka k’u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Goliyati Araguye, Mgr Birindabagabo Alexis
Iki gitabo cyasohotse mu 2019, cyanditswe na Musenyeri Birindabagabo Alexis. Gikubiyemo inzira n’uburyo bwakwifashishwa mu guca ibiyobyabwenge mu Rwanda. Harimo inshingano za buri wese mu kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge, icyo buri wese asabwa, inyungu zo kubirandura mu Rwanda n’ubuhamya bw’abasore bakoreshejwe n’ibiyobyabwenge bakica mugenzi wabo.
Rwanda 1959-1962, La Révolution manquée, Antoine Mugesera
Iki gitabo cyasohotse mu 2018, gisobanura uburyo impinduramatwara yo mu 1959 yiswe ‘revolisiyo’ atari yo kuko icyo impinduramatwara ziba zigamije kitagezweho.
Undi Munsi, Maniraguha Ferdinand
Iki gitabo cyiswe ‘Undi Munsi’ cyasohotse mu wa 2019, gikubiyemo inkuru mpimbano y’urukundo rw’umukobwa Naila n’umusore Gisa bakundanye, urukundo rwabo rukaza kwicwa n’ishyari ry’abatarabifurizaga ineza.
New Rwanda From Hell to Heaven, Bamurangirwa Patricia
Iki gitabo cyamuritswe muri Mutarama 2020. Havugwamo uburyo u Rwanda rwabashije kwivana mu mahano ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ubu akaba ari igihugu cy’icyitegererezo muri Afurika.

Title: Rutangarwamaboko yasobanuye uko ubupfumu yaburazwe na sekuruza n’impamvu yo guterekera (video)
Body:
Rutangarwamaboko yasobanuye byinshi birimo uko yarazwe na sekuruza kuba umuvuzi gakondo ndetse n’impamvu akora imigenzo imwe n’imwe yo hambere yacwekereye mu Rwanda rw’ubu.
Rutangarwamaboko yasobanuye byinshi birimo uko yarazwe na sekuruza kuba umuvuzi gakondo ndetse n’impamvu akora imigenzo imwe n’imwe yo hambere yacwekereye mu Rwanda rw’ubu.
Rutangarwamaboko usanzwe ari umushakashatsi, umwigisha w’ubuzima bushingiye ku muco akaba n’inzobere mu by’umuco, amateka, imbonezabitekerezo (Filosofiya) n’ubuzima bwa muntu bushingiye ku myizerere, imyumvire, imitekerereze, imyitwarire ndetse n’imigirire.
Ni umugabo w’abana babiri yabyaranye na Umuziranenge Sana Cynthia, barimo imfura yabo bise Umugiramana n’ubuheta bise Benimana. Izina Rutangarwamaboko arikomora kuri sekuruza wari umukuru w’imandwa.
IGIHE yamusuye imuganiriza byinshi ku buzima bwe abantu benshi batazi.
Uko yabaye umupfumu…
Ubusanzwe yitwa Nzayisenga Modeste ni umuganga ubugira gatatu, kuko yabyize muri kaminuza mu bijyanye n’ubuzima bwo mu mutwe, akaba umuganga nk’umupfumu ndetse akanaba we nk’umunyempano wabirazwe.
Ati “Sogokuruza Rutangarwamaboko yari umugangahuzi, umuganga akaba n’umupfumu akaba n’umukuru w’imandwa mu nduga hose, ari iki gihe twamugereranya na ba musenyeri. Niho nabikuye nk’umurage. Hari uburyo umubyeyi agenda abiraga abazakurikiraho, ni naho izina Rutangarwamaboko bituruka.”
Yumvikanisha ko akiri umwana aribwo yatangiye kwiyumvamo impano yo kuvura ndetse akajya abiganiriza se, utaramuciye intege ahubwo akamwumvisha ko ari ibintu agomba gukorera.
Ati “Ndi umuganga kandi nk’impano kuko mvuka kumwe umwana akura afite imyaka itanu cyangwa irindwi, barambazaga bati uzakora iki? Data yarabimbazaga nkamubwira ko nzaba umuganga, akambwira ko ngomba kubyitaho, nanjye nkamubwira nti sinzaba umuswa. Akavuga ati nk’ubu mu Rwanda dufite umuganga umwe ubaga umutwe ntigeze menya, nkamubwira nti nzaba uwa kabiri kandi nzamurusha.”
Yashoje kaminuza atangiza uburyo bushingiye ku muco nyarwanda mu kuvura indwara n’ibibazo byo mu mutwe avura abarwayi bari barananiranye, by’umwihariko baraciye kuri za kirazira barasara ibintu ahanini ubuvuzi mvamahanga bwigwa mu ishuri buyoberwa.
Rutangarwamaboko yakuriye kwa Sekuruza, ndetse aza kugenda akurira mu maboko ye kuko akenshi yamutumaga imiti bigatuma agenda akerebuka mu Kinyarwanda no mu kuvura.
Yamusigiye imiringa yambara ku maboko yise ‘Imiringa y’imirinda’ imurinda ibintu byakototera umuntu by’amandu n’amarozi ndetse ikaba n’umurimbo.
Impamvu akunda gukora imihango yo kubandwa no guterekera kandi abenshi batakibikozwa muri iki gihe
Rutangarwamaboko akunda gukora imihango itandukanye itagikorwa cyane mu Rwanda rw’ubu irimo kubandwa, guterekera n’indi itandukanye yakorwaga mu gihe cyo hambere.
Avuga ko impamvu abantu benshi batakiyikora ari uko bafite ukutamenya kuko ariwo muco w’abanyarwanda kandi bikaba byakabaye akarango kuri buri wese ukomoka mu Rwanda.
Ati “Hari igitabo kimwe ndi kwandika cyitwa nyina w’umugome ni ubugoryi. Ubugome abantu tugirira abandi natwe twigirira bituruka ku kutamenya, n’ubu rero hariho ibintu byacu byabaye nk’ibishitani cyangwa bikaba interamatsiko ku bandi ku buryo abantu babikubonamo bagatangara kandi ubundi bwari bwo buzima. Ni ukutamenya, ni uguhona, ni ubugoryi. Ntekereza ko abantu nibahonoka bazagenda bamenya ko umuco arirwo rutirigongo twigoragorezaho gutsinda ubugorogoro bwose, niwo uduha akito mu bandi tukagira icyo twitirirwa, bakavuga bati uriya ni umunyarwanda kubera ibi n’ibi. Arangwa n’imihango n’imigenzo.”
“Nko kubandwa no guterekera ni imihango, nkimara gusobanukirwa ibyo aribyo, kirazira aribyo, maze gukura nabonye abo byasajije kubera ko baciye kuri iyo kirazira. Utagira imihango ntagira ibyo ahanga ntagira n’ibyo ahangamura byamuhangaye kimwe n’utagira imigenzo ntagira uko agenza.”
Kuri we yemeza ko abantu b’iki gihe kubera ko badashamadukira kubandwa no guterekera ari ikibazo gikomeye kuko bifite umumaro mu kwegeranya umuntu n’abakurambere be.
Ati “Ninde wamenya icyo kubandwa aricyo ntabandwe cyangwa ntabyifuze kuko biva ku nshinga ‘kubanda’ bivuga komatanywa. Abanyarwanda rero babandwa kabiri, bwa mbere bomatanywa n’Imana y’i Rwanda bwa kabiri bomatanywa n’abakurambere. Abazimu nibo batuma tutazima, ariko uramuvuga abantu bakikanga. Hatari iyo mihango n’imigenzo wazamenya aho uvuka se ? wazamenya agasozi kanyu ? Guterekera biva ku nshinga gutereka, umuteguro ugiriye abakuru, abanyacyubahiro, abegeramana, ababyeyi mu mutima wawe kugira ngo ubwo urya urye nkabo, ubwo unywa unywe nkabo.”
Rutangarwamaboko asanzwe atuye ku Gisozi ho mu Karere ka Gasabo mu Mujyi wa Kigali ndetse anafite ivuriro ry’ubuvuzi bushingiye ku muco riherereye i Nyarutarama.

Title: Uko u Rwanda rwahuye n’ibyorezo by’inzara, ibisebe n’indwara z’amatungo ku ngoma ya Mutara Semugeshi
Body:
Mu myaka isaga 477 (1543-2020) ishize, u Rwanda rwahuye n’ibyorezo birimo umuze ukomeye, ibisebe by’umufunzo, ibyorezo by’inzara, indwara z’abantu n’amatungo, byoretse imbaga y’abatagira ingano.
Mu myaka isaga 477 (1543-2020) ishize, u Rwanda rwahuye n’ibyorezo birimo umuze ukomeye, ibisebe by’umufunzo, ibyorezo by’inzara, indwara z’abantu n’amatungo, byoretse imbaga y’abatagira ingano.
Ibyorezo bikomeye u Rwanda rwahuye nabyo, byabimburiwe n’icyatangiye ku ngoma ya Mutara Semugeshi mu ntango y’urwimo rwe ahasaga mu wa 1543.
Muri ibyo bihe Ruganzu Ndoli yatanze atunguranye ubwo yicwaga n’umuhinza Bitibibisi. Kubera amakimbirane yari ibwami umugabekazi Nyirarumaga yaranze kurekura ubugabekazi, Semugeshi yabuze umwiru wamwimika akamuha Inyonga ( Ibimenyetso by’ubwami) ngo abe umugenga w’ingoma y’u Rwanda. Mpande ya Rusanga wari umwiru mukuru w’ingoma ya Ndoli, niwe wafashe iya mbere mu kugumura abandi Biru mu kwanga kugaragaza aho bahagaze mu kwimika Semugeshi na Nyina Nyirakabogo.
Semugeshi agisha nyina inama, nyina aramusubiza ati “So Ruganzu Ndoli, yari yaranywanye na Mutaga Nyamubi umwami w’u Burundi, none genda aguhe Abiru baze bakore imihango yo kukwimika. Ubundi utware ingoma ya so, kuko nta wundi wo kuyizungura uhari”.
 Semugeshi ashyira nzira yitabaza Mutaga Nyamubi umwami w’u Burundi amuha abiru bimitsi barimo Nyamwonda wa Rurenge na Gahenda ka Nyabayobya. Imihango yo kwimika Semugeshi yabereye i Mwaka wa Rukoma muri Mushubati ( ubu ni mu Karare ka Muhanga mu Murenge wa Nyarusange), imihango irakorwa, bamuha izina ry’ubwami rya Bicuba I Semugeshi.
Nyuma y’iyimikwa rya Bicuba Semugeshi, yahuye n’akaga gakomeye cyane arwara ijisho rirabyimba, ryitambikwamo n’ikintu kimeza nk’umwashi n’inkingi. Mu gisenge cy’inzu ye hitambikamo ikintu kimeze nk’ukwezi. Abaturage b’u Rwanda nabo, ntibabonye amahwemo, bahuye n’amahano y’umuze utarigeze ubaho bokamwa n’inzara n’indwara z’ibinyoro n’ibisebe by’umufunzo.
Abantu ba hafi ya Semugeshi baje kumubwira bati “Bariya Biru Mutaga yakoherereje ntibazi imihango y’iyimikabami ry’I Rwanda, mubwire akoherereze abandi, bakureho iyi miziro yatumye uberama igakururira rubanda rw’umwami umuze n’amapfa”.
Nuko Semugeshi atuma kuri Mutaga Nyamubi umwami w’u Burundi amwoherereza umuvuzi gakondo we ngo atange umuhamuro w’ibyo biza, na we amwoherereza Kiniga cya Rumanura ngo aze ahoshe ayo mahano. Kiniga cya Rumanura asesekara ibwami kwa Semugeshi, asanga ibintu byacitse, ibinyoro n’ibisebe by’umufunzo n’ibindi bigeze banyarwanda habi! Abantu ba hafi ba Semugeshi bari aho, bati “Nimushake Mpande ya Rusanga, aduhe umuzi n’umuhamuro w’izi manza zagwiririye u Rwanda”.
Umwami Semugeshi atuma abantu be ngo babaririze aho Mpande ya Rusanga yaba aherereye, basanga yaragiye kure cyane ahitwa: I Cyotamakara cy’I Buhanga ( ubu ni mu Murenge wa Ntyazo wo mu karere ka Nyanza), ari umusaza wa cyane, yarakennye bitavugwa inzara imugeze kure.
Ubwo Mpande ya Rusanga asubiza abantu bari boherejwe na Semugeshi ati “Ndashaje, ndashonje, nambaye ubusa, nahinguka nte imbere y’umwami?’, bajya kubibwira umwami Semugeshi, afata inka ebyiri z’imbyeyi, imyambaro ikoze mu mpu n’ingobyi yo ku muheka, bamujyana ibwami.
Kera kabaye Mpande ya Rusanga arashyira agera ibwami, akigera ibwami akabona ibirimo kuhabera. Nuko aramubaza ati “Wimitswe na ba nde?” Semugeshi ati “Ni Abiru b’i Burundi barimo Nyamwonda wa Burenge na Nyagahenda ka Nyabayobya.” Mpande ya Rusanga ati “Wimikiwe he?” Semugeshi ati “Nimikiwe i Mwaka wa Rukoma”.
Mpande ya Rusanga abwira Semugeshi ati “Bariya Biru b’i Burundi bakwimitse, nta kiza bashakira u Rwanda. Kukwimikira i Mwaka ugasohokera ku Ntosho, ni ikimenyetso cy’uko Abanyarwanda babaroze kwicwa n’inzara ikomotse ku mapfa bakazajya birirwa bahonda inguri z’ibikoro n’amateke bashaka amaramuko. Gushokera inka z’amashashi, ni ikimenyetso cyo kutagira uburumbuke bw’abantu, imyaka n’amatungo mu gihugu. Gusohokana igicuba cyaramvuwe mu Mutake, ni ukwifuriza Abanyarwanda guhora bataka nta kugoheka n’amahoro muri bo. Gusohokera mu Mutobo, ni ukurwara ibinyoro n’ibisebe by’imifunzo bizabahitana igihugu kikaba umwirare.”
Mpande ya Rusanga abwira Nyirarumaga ati “Impamvu igihugu cyahuye n’akaga k’iriya mize n’amapfa akaze, ni ariya marira ya Nyirakabogo urara arira ko wanze kurekura ingoma, kandi Ruganzu yaraguhaye umuhungu we Semugeshi ngo umubere umujyanama, none kugira ngo igihugu gikire nuko amarira ya Nyirakabogo yakama, kuko nta mugisha wo guhora umugabekazi aririra mu gihugu, fata inzira uhunge uve mu gihugu ujye i Burundi ubise Nyirakabogo n’umuhungu we Semugeshi bime ingoma.”
Nyirarumaga ashorera inka ze ashyira nzira n’abaja be bacikira i Burundi. Nyirarumaga akigera ku cyambu, haje inkuba itagira imvura irivovota, nyuma haza imirabyo iramukubakuba iramuyora imujyana mu kirere aburirwa irengero. Nuko Mpande ya Rusanga wari wabaherekeje ngo abambutse, abonye ibyo bibaye, abwira abakobwa ba Nyirarumaga ati “Nimuhumure buriya Nyirarumaga asanze Ruganzu Ndoli, mujye muri ubu bwato n’inka zanyu mwambuke mwigire i Burundi mu Rwanda nta mwanya mukihafite”. 
Mpande ya Rusanga ageze ibwami ahamagara Abiru bose n’abakuru bari barigumuye, bakora inama yo kohera ayo mahano yagwiririye igihugu, akaba amaze kugitsembamo abenegihugu. Nuko batangira inzira yo gukora imihango n’imigenzo y’ubwiru bw’iyakorwaga mu kohera amahano yabaga yagwiririye igihugu.
Mbere yuko batangira imihango yo kweza igihugu no gukiza ubwandure bw’abaturage babanje kubakira Semugeshi urugo I Bunyogombe ngo abe ariho atura bamugangahure, bamutera ibyuhagiro n’imitsindo y’ingoma y’u Rwanda, kuko mbere yaho yari atuye mu rugo rwa se Ruganzu Ndoli rwari I Ruhashya. Kandi umwami yagombaga gukorerwa imihango yose ari mu ngoro ye nshya.
 Kugira ngo umuhango wo kohera ayo mahano ukorwe, bitabaje amazi y’Ubuhoro yo mu mariba ya Rwezangoro ( mu Murenge wa Muhima), ayo mu iriba rya Shaki, ayo mu iriba rya Kabuye ka Jabana, ayo mu iriba rya Mbizi, amariba yavomwagaho amazi y’ubuhoro, akiza ubwandure agahumanura abahumanye. Yose bayahuriza hamwe mu iriba rya Kabyaza ryari munsi y’umusozi wa Nyamweru nuko bayakoreraho imihango yo kwiyeza no kweza igihugu, ngo abaturage bakire ubwandure, bagire ubuhoro n’amahoro, bagire uburame n’ubuziramuze.
Nyuma y’iyo mihango Mpande ya Rusanga yahise ahakorera imihango y’ubwimitsi yimika Semugeshi, amwambura izina yari yahawe n’Abiru b’I Burundi rya Bicuba, amuha izina ry’ubwami rya Mutara Nsoro. Niko gukurizaho kwitwa Mutara Nsoro Semugeshi. Mu gihe bakiri muri ibyo, nibwo babonye ikirere gihindutse, igicu kirakuba babona imvura iraguye, icyorezo gicika mu Rwanda, amapfa arazima, Abanyarwanda bava ibuzimu bajya ibuzima.

Title: Scholastique Mukasonga yasohoye igitabo kivuga kuri Kibogo wafatwaga nk’umukiza w’abanyarwanda
Body:
Umunyarwandakazi Scholastique Mukasonga yasohoye igitabo yise ‘Kibogo est monté au ciel’ kivuga uko Kibogo woherejwe n’Imana nk’umukiza w’u Rwanda yagiye mu Ijuru.
Umunyarwandakazi Scholastique Mukasonga yasohoye igitabo yise ‘Kibogo est monté au ciel’ kivuga uko Kibogo woherejwe n’Imana nk’umukiza w’u Rwanda yagiye mu Ijuru.
Mbere y’uko abamisiyoneri bazana inkuru nziza ya Yezu i Rwanda bivugwa ko uwo Kibogo ari we wafatwaga nkuko Abakristu bafata Yezu .
Scholastique Mukasonga ni Umwanditsi w’umunyarwanda abakunda gusoma ibitabo n’abakurikiranira hafi ibijyanye na sinema bibuka filimi Notre Dame du Nil ishingiye ku gitabo cye yasohotse muri Gashyantare 2020.
Igitabo cya Mukasonga ’ Kibogo est monté au Ciel’gifite paji 160. Cyasohowe n’inzu isohora ibitabo yo mu Bufaransa, éditions Gallimard. Ni ubwoko bw’ibitabo by’inkuru ndende mpimbano cyangwa se Roman (Novel).
 Ugendeye ku mateka ya Kibogo uvugwa mu mateka y’u Rwanda wumva ari igitabo kigaragaza ko imyemerere cyangwa ibisa n’ibyo abanyamadini bigisha kuri Yezu hari uwari uhari kandi abifite mbere.
Agace gasa no gutera amatsiko yashyize ku rubuga Gallimard, kabaza uwaba yaragiye mu Ijuru hagati ya Kibogo w’i Rwanda na Yezu yita uw’abamisiyoneri ndetse nyuma yo kujya mu Ijuru akagirira abantu ineza.
Ati "Ari Kibogo, umuhungu w’umwami na Yezu w’abamisiyoneri ni nde wazamutse mu Ijuru? wongeye kugusha imvura, agakiza abantu amapfa n’inzara?"
Akomeza yibaza niba abantu bakwiye kwizera inkuru cyangwa imigani baciriwe n’abera kurusha kwizera izo babwiye n’ababyeyi babo amanywa n’ijoro. Ati "Ese birakwiye ko twakwizera imigani twaciriwe n’abagabo b’abera b’ubwanwa burebure cyangwa twakwemera iyo ababyeyi bacu baducira buri mugoroba."
Igitabo cyitwa Le Rwanda ancien cyanditswe na De Lacger, kuva ku rupapuro rwa 167 kugeza ku rwa 68 kigaragaza ko mbere y’umwaduko w’ubukirisitu mu Rwanda hari imyizerere gakondo idafite aho itandukaniye n’ubukirisitu ndetse ikaba yari ifite akarusho ko kuba ishingiye ku muco gakondo w’abanyarwanda.
Ayo makuru yemeza ko mu Rwanda hahoze inkuru nziza y’“umukiza (umutabazi) Kibogo", yaje guteshwa agaciro n’inkuru nziza y’“umukiza (umutabazi) Yezu“ yazanywe n’abakoloni.
Mu Rwanda rwa kera umutabazi yari umuntu wemeraga gutanga amaraso ye ku bushake akameneka ku butaka bw’umwanzi bigatuma umwica cyangwa uwo amenekeye mu gihugu atsindwa.
Ibi ngo byaba byaratangiwe na “Kibogo“, izina ry’Ikinyarwanda rikomoka ku nshinga kubogora ihwanye n’iyo mu gifaransa bita “sauver“, “redresser“ cyangwa se ‘Gutabara’.
Igitekerezonkomoko cy‘umutabazi Kibogo mu Rwanda
Mu mateka y’u Rwanda dutangira kumva iby’Umutabazi bwa mbere muri wa mugani w’Ibimanuka mu gice cya wo cy’Umugani uvanze n’igitekerezo.
Lacger yanditse agira ati “Ubwo Kigwa n’umuvandimwe we Mututsi na mushiki wabo Nyampundu bacibwaga mu ijuru bitewe n’icyaha cya nyina wamennye ibanga ry’Imana, bururukiye mu Mubali bavuye mu ijuru. Bagera mu Mubali rero, bibonye bambaye ubusa bakennye. Hashize iminsi icumi bafite agahinda gakabije, bafite inzara, inyota n’imbeho bifuza gupfa gusa, bambaza Imana bati: Mana y’u Rwanda tugirire impuhwe utubabarire. Muri ako kanya inkuba ikubitira mu kirere maze umurabyo ukongeza ibyatsi byumye maze babona agashirira baragafatisha babona umuriro barota.”
“Hashize iminsi ijuru rirakinguka babona hamanutse impeke, ibishyimbo, amasaka n’insina y’imineke. Hashize iminsi na none mu ijuru hamanuka ikibumbe cy’ubutare bwo gucuramo ibyuma n’amasuka bati: Imana ni yo itwoherereje ibi byose”.
Ngo icyo gihe maze ni bahinze batihingishije! Muri ako karere bamanukiyemo, hari hatuye imiryango itatu: Abasinga, Abazigaba n’Abatwa bo mu ishyamba. Abo bantu bose bari barakomotse mu ijuru aho ba sekuruza bari barirukanywe bitewe n’icyaha bahakoreye. Kubera ko bo batari barigeze basaba Imana imbabazi, ni cyo cyatumye ibarekera mu butindi n’ubukene. Abo baje nyuma nibo babatungishije.
Ubwo Kibogo yicwaga n’abagome nyuma Imana ikamuzura
Kugira ngo abo bantu batazarimbuka bagashiraho, byatumye Imana yohereza Umutabazi Kibogo aza ku ruhembe rw’umurabyo arababwira ati “Mwitinya nimuhumure ni Imana ibantumyeho! Nzaba umuhuza wanyu n’Imana kandi icyo muzasaba cyose niba ari cyiza Imana izakibaha!. Umutabazi ni impongano y’Imana ku bana bayo bayiringira.”
Nyuma ariko abagome ngo baramufashe bamumanika ku giti bakoresheje ibyuma bisongoye baramwica. Imana yaje komora ibikomere bye imugaruramo ubuzima hanyuma Imana yohereza umurabyo umuzamura mu kirere asubira ku Mana.
Lacger yavuze ko iyo u Rwanda rugize amakuba, umuzimu w’Umutabazi aza gutura muri umwe mu bana b’Umwami agahinduka Umutabazi agakiza igihugu.
Bavuga ko abatambyi bo mu Mubali aribo bamubambye bakamwica ariko ko “Imana yomoye ibikomere bye imugaruramo ubugingo hanyuma yohereza n‘umurabyo umuzamura mu kirere asubira ku Mana”.

Title: Indirimbo umwami Yuhi Musinga yaririmbye ubwo yacibwaga mu Rwanda
Body:
Umwami Yuhi V Musinga, ni umwe mu bayoboye u Rwanda mu bihe bibi , ayobora ubwo abakoloni bageraga mu Rwanda bagashaka kumwambura ubutegetsi, yabangira bakamwirukana mu gihugu.
Umwami Yuhi V Musinga, ni umwe mu bayoboye u Rwanda mu bihe bibi , ayobora ubwo abakoloni bageraga mu Rwanda bagashaka kumwambura ubutegetsi, yabangira bakamwirukana mu gihugu.
Musinga yimye ingoma ahagana muri Werurwe 1897, ayambuye mukuru we bahuje se, Mibambwe IV Rutarindwa. Byakurikiwe no kwitwikira mu nzu kwa Rutarindwa n’umuryango we wose amaze kumenya ko yagambaniwe.
Musinga yimye ingoma akiri muto, ku myaka 14 gusa, ari nayo mpamvu mu minsi ye ya mbere yayoborerwaga na nyina Kanjogera. Ni imyaka yari iruhije kuko Abakoloni b’Abadage n’abamisiyoneri ba mbere bari bari kwinjira mu Rwanda, bashaka abayoboke mu banyarwanda.
Kubera kwanga amabwiriza bamuhaga n’uburyo bashakaga kuyobora u Rwanda, Abakoloni birukanye umwami Musinga mu Rwanda mu Ukwakira 1931.
Saa yine n’igice ku wa 14 Ukwakira 1931 igihiriri ry’abaja cyahagurutse i Nyanza giherekeje Musinga, abagore be batanu n’abana be icyenda na nyina Kanjogera n’abo mu muryango wabo, bajyanwa mu nzu yari yabateguriwe i Kamembe.
Mu gitabo cyiswe Rucunshu, cya Ruhashya Épimaque, ku ipaji ya 94 kugeza kuya 95, hagaragara indirimbo bivugwa ko yahimbwe n’Umwami Musinga ubwo yacibwaga akajyanwa i Kamembe akavaha ajya i Moba.
Muri iyo ndirimbo, Musinga agaragaza ko yari umwami mwiza uzi kurinda igihugu kandi ufasha abababaye. Agaragaza ko yaciwe mu gihugu nta cyaha yakoze, n’agahinda atewe no gusiga igihugu cye, abaturage be n’abana be.
Ntabwo bizwi neza niba iyo ndirimbo ariyo Musinga yihimbiye ubwe dore ko ntaho amateka amugaragaza nk’umusizi, cyangwa niba ari iyo yahimbiwe ikamwitirirwa.

Title: Imvugo igaragaza icyubahiro inka zahabwaga mu muco nyarwanda
Body:
Inka si itungo nk’ayandi mu mibereho y’Abanyarwanda ndetse uburyo bayifata, uko bayivuga n’ibyo bayikorera, bigaragaza ko kuva hambere yahabwaga icyubahiro gikomeye.
Inka si itungo nk’ayandi mu mibereho y’Abanyarwanda ndetse uburyo bayifata, uko bayivuga n’ibyo bayikorera, bigaragaza ko kuva hambere yahabwaga icyubahiro gikomeye.
Amateka agaragaza ko inka yahoze ari ikimenyetso gikomeye cy’ubukungu bw’igihugu, uwabaga ayifite ntiyarwazaga bwaki, ntiyarumbyaga imyaka, ntiyaburaga abagaragu n’inshuti.
Akenshi ikintu cyabaga cyubashywe mu Rwanda rwo hambere, ibigikomokaho byagiraga ivugwa ryihariye ritandukanye n’ibindi bisanzwe, bikitabwaho na buri wese yaba umukuru n’umuto, bajya kugira icyo bavuga ku nka cyangwa ikindi cyahawe agaciro gakomeye, bakigengesera, bikaba bizwi mu Kinyarwanda nk’Ikeshamvugo.
Inka iri mu bintu bitagatifu mu muco n’amateka y’u Rwanda, byubahwa kandi bitinywa byagize uruhare runini mu mushinga wo kurwubaka.
Inka n’ibiyikomokaho nk’amata, amavuta n’ibikoresho byifashishwa mu bworozi bw’inka birimo ibyansi, byagiye bihabwa umwihariko mu muco w’u Rwanda.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Ikeshamvugo mu Kinyarwanda” cy’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu , Inzobere mu Busizi, Umuco, Ubuvanganzo n’amateka y’u Rwanda, tugiye gukomoza ku ikeshamvugo rikoreshwa ku Nka nk’umutungo w’ikirenga mu gihugu, wagize uruhare rw’ikirenga mu bukungu, mu mibereho myiza y’abaturage, mu bubanyi n’amahanga, mu mutekano n’amahoro, mu mihango n’imigenzo y’Abanyarwanda n’ibindi.
