Title: Nyanza: Urubyiruko rwigishirijwe mu Rukari imirimo yakorwaga n’abangavu n’ingimbi mu Rwanda rwo hambere
Body:
Muri gahunda yo kwimakaza no gusigasira Umuco Nyarwanda, Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda cyateguye umunsi wo kwigisha abari kubyiruka imirimo yakorwaga n’Abangavu n’Ingimbi mu Rwanda rwo hambere ndetse n’imikino bakinaga.
Muri gahunda yo kwimakaza no gusigasira Umuco Nyarwanda, Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda cyateguye umunsi wo kwigisha abari kubyiruka imirimo yakorwaga n’Abangavu n’Ingimbi mu Rwanda rwo hambere ndetse n’imikino bakinaga.
Icyo gikorwa ngarukamwaka cyabereye mu Ngoro y’Amateka y’Abami iherereye mu Karere ka Nyanza ahazwi nko mu Rukari. Kuri iyi nshuro higishijwe abanyeshuri biga muri Collège du Christ Roi i Nyanza bo mu mwaka wa gatanu n’uwa gatandatu biga mu ishami ry’indimi n’Ubuvanganzo.
Abanyeshuri bagera kuri 50 ni bo basuye iyo ngoro basobanurirwa byinshi, bigishwa gukora imirimo itandukanye irimo kwahura, kuragira, gucyura, kudahira no kuhira inka, kwahirira inyana, kwinikiza no gukamisha.
Umukozi ukuriye Ingoro y’Abami yo mu Rukari, Gahongayire Yvonne, yavuze ko ari gahunda bateguye mu rwego rwo kwigisha abakiri bato Umuco Nyarwanda no kuwubakundisha.
Ati “Ni uburyo twashyizeho bwihariye bwo kwigisha Abanyarwanda umuco n’amateka duhereye ku rubyiruko; ikindi ni ukubungabunga ibikoresho by’umuco gakondo no kugira ngo babimenye.”
Gahongayire yasobanuye ko ikigamijwe ari ugusigasira umuco n’ururimi no kumenyesha abakiri bato inkomoko y’ibikoresho gakondo n’akamaro kabyo.
Imirimo yakozwe n’abakobwa irimo gukukira inka, gukubura, koza ibyansi, kubuganiza no gutereka amata. Naho abahungu bakoze imirimo irimo gukama inka; kuhira inka, kwahira ubwatsi n’iyindi.
Mu gusoza iyo gahunda aba banyeshuri babonye n’umwanya wo kwidagadura aho beretswe banakina imikino gakondo itandukanye irimo gusimbuka urukiramende, kumasha, kunyabanwa, gutera uruziga, hamwe no kurasa ku ntego.
Ubusanzwe iyo mikino abana bayigiraga mu itorero hagamijwe kubatoza kurangwa n’indangagaciro z’ubutwari no gukunda igihugu no kucyitangira.
Bamwe mu banyeshuri bitabiriye icyo gikorwa bashimiye Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda; bavuga ko bahigiye byinshi kandi bizabafasha mu mibereho yabo.
Mukeshimana Zula ati “Icyo nahigiye ni ubufatanye hagati y’abagize umuryango; badusobanuriye uko kera imirimo yakorwaga mu rugo abagize umuryango bagafatanya. Ikindi nahungukiye ni ukumenya ibikoresho byakoreshwaga kera nk’ibyansi n’urusyo.”
Rukimbira Godfred “Icyo namenye ni uko n’iterambere rigomba kujyana n’umuco kuko ubufatanye mu gukora imirimo ni indangagaciro zarangaga abanyarwanda. Nabonye uko abami babagaho mbona ni mateka meza.”
Ingoro y’Abami mu Rukari igizwe n’ibice bine; icya mbere ni Ingoro Umwami Yuhi V Musinga yabayemo n’abandi bamubanjirije bose, igaragiwe n’izindi nzu ebyiri za gakondo (Iy’amata ndetse n’iy’inzoga). Igice cya kabiri kigizwe n’inyambo (inka z’amahembe ashyorongoshyoye).
Icya gatatu ni ingoro y’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, naho icya kane kigizwe n’umusezero (aho Abami batabarije i Mwima).
Muri bimwe mu bintu bimurikwa mu Ngoro y’Abami harimo ibikoresho bitandukanye birimo inteko (intebe umwami yicaragaho); Intwaro zigizwe n’ingabo, umuheto, icumu n’umutana urimo imyambi.
Harimo kandi Igisasiro (uburiri bw’umwami), ibiseke, inkangara ndetse n’agacuma yanyweragamo.

Title: Iby’ingenzi byabaga bigize ubukwe bw’Abanyarwanda bo hambere
Body:
Ubukwe ni umwe mu mihango ikomeye mu buzima bwa muntu. Ni umuhango ukomeye kubera ko uhuza imiryango, ugatuma umuntu ashinga urugo rwe akabyara ndetse n’igihugu kikunguka amaboko. Imihango y’ubukwe yagendaga itandukana hagendewe ku muco, idini n’akarere abantu baherereyemo.
Ubukwe ni umwe mu mihango ikomeye mu buzima bwa muntu. Ni umuhango ukomeye kubera ko uhuza imiryango, ugatuma umuntu ashinga urugo rwe akabyara ndetse n’igihugu kikunguka amaboko. Imihango y’ubukwe yagendaga itandukana hagendewe ku muco, idini n’akarere abantu baherereyemo.
Mu Rwanda rwo hambere, ubukwe bwari ubw’umuryango. Imiryango iyo yabonaga ko umusore cyangwa inkumi bakuze kandi ko bageze igihe cyo gushinga urugo, yatangiraga gutera intambwe zagenwaga n’umuco.
Kurambagiza
Kurambagiza ni ukureba uburanga bw’umukobwa cyangwa umuhungu, ubwiza, imico n’imyifatire bye. Mu kurambagiza habagaho kumenya no kugenzura imyitwarire, imibereho, imikorere, isuku ndetse n’umuryango umuhungu cyangwa umukobwa akomokamo kugira ngo bamenye niba yarahawe uburere.
Umuranga ni we wafashaga imiryango y’abateganya gushyingiranwa kumenyana no gutunganya neza imihango ijyanye no kurambagizanya kwayo. Umuranga yabaga ari inshuti y’imiryango yombi ishaka guhana abageni cyangwa akaba umuvandimwe w’umuryango umwe, ariko aziranye n’abantu bo mu muryango bashakamo amaboko.
Iyo umuranga yamenyeshaga imiryango uwo yatoranyije, umusore n’inkumi bashoboraga guhura, bakamenyana cyangwa bakaganira mu buryo busanzwe.
Gusaba no gufata irembo
Gusaba no gufata irembo byakurikiraga kurambagiza, bikabera iwabo w’umukobwa. Imisango yo gufata irembo no gusaba yarihutaga kuko ubusanzwe mu Kinyarwanda ntawimana irembo. Iyo umuryango w’umusore wabaga wemerewe irembo, hakurikiragaho umuhango wo kurifata.
Mu gihe abo mu muryango w’umusore bagiye kumufatira irembo babaga bageze iwabo w’umukobwa, barakirwa bakazimanirwa maze uhagarariye umuryango w’umukobwa akababaza ikibagenza.
Umuranga, se w’umusore cyangwa undi umuryango w’umusore watoranyije ni bo bajyaga gusaba no gufata irembo. Umuryango usaba watangaga inka y’ifatarembo ku bifite cyangwa isuka ku baciriritse. Bwabaga aribwo bwa mbere imiryango yombi ihuye, ikaganira ku bijyanye n’ubukwe bw’abana babo, bakajya inama ku bizakorwa n’ibizakenerwa.
Gusaba no gukwa
Gusaba umugeni ni umuhango wakurikiraga uwo gufata irembo, ukabera iwabo w’umukobwa. Mu muhango wo gusaba, umuryango w’umusore watoranyaga abakwe bajya kuwusabira, bakagenda bayobowe n’umukwe mukuru, bitwaje inzoga yo gusabisha.
Wari umuhango wo guha agaciro imiryango kuko umusore ntiyabaga yemerewe gutwara umukobwa atamuhawe. Ibyo byari ikimenyetso cy’uko umuryango w’umuhungu uha agaciro umuryango wareze umukobwa.
Mu gihe cyo gusaba, umuryango w’umukobwa ntiwahitaga wemerera umuryango w’umusore umugeni, ibyo bikagaragaza kwihesha agaciro nk’umuryango no kugahesha abawukumokamo.
Nyuma yo gusaba hakurikiragaho umuhango wo gukwa ugakorwa n’umuryango w’umusore kandi ukabera iwabo w’umukobwa. Umusore yakwaga inka, isuka cyangwa andi matungo nubwo hose bavugaga ko bakoye inka.
Inkwano yabaga ari ikimenyetso hagati y’imiryango yombi, ko ibaye inshuti. Inkwano yari ipfundo ry’ubumwe hagati y’imiryango yombi.
Mu muco Nyarwanda, inkwano ntiyabaga inzitizi. Yaba yabonetse cyangwa itabonetse, ntibyabuzaga ubukwe gutaha. Igihe inkwano yabaga ibuze, umusore yashoboraga gutenda, ni ukuvuga gufata igihe aba kwa sebukwe akora akazi gasimbura inkwano cyangwa agahabwa umugeni w’ubuntu.
Gutebutsa
Ni umuhango wakurikiraga gukwa. Umuryango w’umusore wajyaga iwabo w’umukobwa hagamijwe kuganira ku gihe umugeni bazamubazanira (bazamubahekera).
Hari uduce gutebutsa byakorwaga inshuro zirenzwe imwe, umuryango w’umukobwa ugakomeza kwihagararaho kugira ngo umuryango w’umusore ubone agaciro k’umukobwa wabo.
Kurongora no kurongorwa
Igihe iyo cyabaga kigeze, umuryango w’umukobwa waramuhekaga ukamushyira umuryango w’umusore. Iyo yabaga ageze kwa sebukwe, hari imihango yakorwaga yo kumwakira ikagenda itandukana bitewe n’agace.
Hari nk’aho iyo yabaga akiri mu bikingi by’amarembo, yahagararaga hejuru y’aho batabye urusyo, nyirabukwe akamukoza umwuko ku mpanga. Hari aho umugeni yinjiraga agasanga sebukwe yicaye ikambere akamwicaza ku bibero akanamuha inka y’ibibero akabona kujyanwa mu mbere.
Mu gihe ibirori by’ubukwe byabaga bigeze hagati, se w’umusore yamujyanaga kurongora. Mu kurongora hakoreshwaga umwishywa, umusore akawambika umugeni hanyuma akivuga ati ‘ndakurongoye ndi kanaka mwene kanaka’ maze ababyeyi bakavuza impundu. Ibirori byarakomezaga kugeza mu gitondo, abaje baherekeje umugeni bagasezera bagataha.
Nyuma y’uko abaje bahetse umugeni bageze iwabo w’umukobwa bagashyikiriza ababyeyi be umwishywa. Hakurikiragaho umuhango wo kwakira umwishywa ukabanzirizwa no gucunda, guca hagati no kumara amavuta.
Nta mukobwa washyingirwaga yaratakaje ubusugi kuko kubutakaza byabaga ari igisebo ku mukobwa, umuryango akomokamo n’igihugu. Uwabaga yatwise atarashyingirwa, yafatwaga nk’uwatesheje igihugu ubusugi, kugira ngo igihugu gisubirane iryo shema ry’ubusugi bwacyo, umukobwa bakamucira mu mahanga cyangwa bakamuroha.
Gutinya
Nyuma yo kurongorwa, hari iminsi umugeni yamaraga ari mu nzu adasohoka. Muri icyo gihe cyo gutinya yaboheraga nyirabukwe akebo k’ibara rimwe, bitaga nyirabitabo. Gutinya byafashaga umukobwa kumenyerana n’umuryango ajemo, akamenya imyitwarire n’imico biranga umuryango mushya ajemo.
Gutwikurura
Ni umuhango wakorwaga hagamije gusohora umugeni kugira ngo bamuhe uburenganzira bwo kujya ahagaragara, kugira ngo atangire imirimo ye. Habanzaga gukura abageni mu nyegamo, kubogosha amasunzu, guha abana amata no kubereka imitwa.
Mu kwerekwa imitwa, urugo rushya rwahabwaga ibyangombwa nkenerwa birimo ibikoresho, ibiribwa n’ibindi.
Umuryango w’umukobwa wabaga wamuzaniye ibiribwa, imyaka n’ibikoresho byo mu gikoni. Umukwe mukuru ni we watumwaga mu rugo ngo ayobore uwo muhango, aherekejwe n’abakuze n’amasugi.
Guca mu irembo no kuramukanya
Guca mu irembo byakorwaga n’abageni bajya gusura iwabo w’umukobwa. Uyu muhango wabaga nyuma y’igihe runaka abashyingiwe baramenyereye urugo kandi baratangiye kurukorera.
Abageni bajyanaga na se w’umuhungu, umuranga cyangwa se undi muntu washoboraga kubavugira ijambo. Bitwazaga inzoga, bagera iwabo w’umukobwa bagasangira kandi bakaganira hagamijwe gushimira umuryango w’umukobwa ko wabahaye umugeni mwiza.
Gusura abageni
Ni umuhango wakorwaga n’iwabo w’umukobwa ugakorwa nyuma yo guca mu irembo. Ababyeyi b’umukobwa bateganyaga inzoga n’izindi mpano bashyira urugo rushya, kugira ngo barufashe kwiteza imbere. Umuryango w’umukobwa wabonaga umwanya uhagije wo kuganira n’umukwe wabo kuko nta misango myinshi yabaga mu gusura abageni.

Title: Uko igihugu cya Nduga cyometswe ku Rwanda hakoreshejwe amayeri y’ubushuti
Body:
Nduga ni agace kagize amateka menshi mu Rwanda, kaba igihugu cy’igihangage u Rwanda tuzi ubu rutabaho, kukomeka ku Rwanda bisaba abami b’u Rwanda gukoresha amayeri arimo kubanza kwiyunga bagashyirana abageni, u Rwanda rwuririra kuri ubwo bucuti rutera umwami wa Nduga.
Nduga ni agace kagize amateka menshi mu Rwanda, kaba igihugu cy’igihangage u Rwanda tuzi ubu rutabaho, kukomeka ku Rwanda bisaba abami b’u Rwanda gukoresha amayeri arimo kubanza kwiyunga bagashyirana abageni, u Rwanda rwuririra kuri ubwo bucuti rutera umwami wa Nduga.
Mu bihe byo ha mbere, kugira ngo igihugu kigire ubuzima gatozi cyitwe igihugu, ni uko cyagombaga kuba gifite ibintu bitanu by’ingenzi, aribyo; Kugira ubutaka, kugira abaturage bacyitirirwa, kugira ingoma ngabe nk’ikirango cy’igihugu cyigenga, kugira umwami ukigenga n’ingabo zikirwanirira.
Nduga cyari kimwe mu bihugu 29 byari bigize u Rwanda rwo hambere, ndetse kikaba kimwe mu byari bikomeye.
Igitabo “Imizi y’u Rwanda”, Umutumba wa mbere ndetse n’igitabo “Intwari z’imbanza zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro’’ byombi by’umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, bigaragaza ko Nduga cyari mu bihugu byahanzwe bwa mbere mu Rwanda kuko yahanzwe ahasaga mu wa 600 mu kibariro cy’ibihe byacu.
Kugira ngo abami b’u Rwanda bigarurire kimwe mu bihugu gikomeye cya Nduga, hateweyo ibitero byinshi byagabweyo n’abami b’u Rwanda nka Cyilima Rugwe n’umwuzukuru we Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi. Cyilima Rugwe, yabanje kohereza ibitero by’ubushotoranyi ku ngoma ya Nduga, ahereye ku turere twari twegereye u Rwanda, nko mu gice cy’Akarere k’Amayaga kahanaga imbibi n’u Rwanda, kitwaga “Nduga Bunyagitunda” katwarwaga na Mulinda w’Umunnyugu ahatwarira Sabugabo, umwami wa Nduga.
 Nuko Cyilima Rugwe yigarurira ako gace yica Mulinda w’Umunyungu watwaraga ako Gace. Kumutsimbura ku butegetsi, Cyilima yamushukishije kumushyingira, ingabo zimutera zitwa ngo ni abakwe bahetse umugeni, habaye ubucakura bwo mu rwego rwo hejuru kuko cyari igihugu gikomeye kandi cy’abanyamaboko, ku buryo intambara yabo yari inkundura.
Kigeli Mukobanya wazunguye se Rugwe ku ngoma, nta cyo yigeze yongeraho ku gitero se yagabye mu Nduga, ahubwo yashyize imbaraga mu guhangana n’igitero cya mbere cy’Abanyoro no guhanaguraho igihugu cy’u Bwanacyambwe bwari mu Majyepfo y’ Iburasirazuba bw’u Rwanda
Umuhungu wa Mukobanya, Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi, amaze kwima Ingoma ya Se Kigeli Mukobanya, yihatiye kwigarurira Nduga y’Ababanda iranga imubera ibamba, bigera n’aho Nduga igaba ibitero byambuka Nyabarongo, igihe kiza kugera atsinda Nduga ya Nkuba ya Sabugabo wari warazunguye se Sabugabo ku ngoma. Abanyiginya baje kwambuka Nyabarongo, basatira Ababanda barabatsinda, Nkuba ya Sabugabo aricwa, ingabo zitwaga ‘Ibisiga’ byari umutwe w’Ingabo z’Ababanda, zikubitirwa ahareba i Nzega, umuhungu wa Nkuba ari we Mashira ahungira mu Bugesera.
Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi, yahise ashyiraho Abatware be mu Nduga, maze umwe mu batware be, aza gucumbikira Mashira ya Nkuba atamuzi. Icyo gihe akarere ka Nduga kari kamaze iminsi mu mapfa, maze Mashira akihagera, ahurirana n’uko imvura iguye, maze bituma abaturage ba Nduga bamuyoboka, baramwimika aba umwami rwihishwa.
 Abatware ba Sekarongoro bamaze kubimenya ko Mashira yimye barahunga, bahungira mu bice bidatuwe biteganye na Nyabarongo. Mibambwe amaze kubimenya, asaba Mashira ya Nkuba ya Sabugabo kuyoboka, kuko Ingoma ya Se yayimwambuye, Mashira aranga.
Mashira ya Nkuba ya Sabugabo watwaraga Nduga amaze kunanirana, Mibambwe yigiriye inama yo kugirana na we amasezerano, biremezwa Mashira ahamya ubwami bwa Nduga. Nyuma yaho imishyikirano yarakomeye, haziraho no gushyingirana. Nuko Mashira arongora Nyirantorwa umukobwa wa Mibambwe I Sekarongoro, na ho Mibambwe I Sekarongoro arongora Bwiza bwa Mashira budashira irora n’irongorwa, bamwambuye Rugayi rwa Buzi wari utuye mu Burundi, wari waramushatse mbere. Icyo gihe na Gahindiro Semutakirwa wa Mibambwe Sekarongoro yarongoye Nyankeri ya Mashira. Icyo gihe umurwa wa Mibambwe Sekarongoro, wari i Mbilima na Matovu, hahoze ari mu Ngoma y’u Buliza ( ubu ni mu Karere ka Gakenke mu Murenge wa Coko), naho Mashira atuye ku Mugina wa Jenda na Kabugondo hafi y’i Busuri, i Cyeza no ku Mukingo.
Mu gitero cya Kabiri cy’Abanyoro cyari kirangajwe imbere n’umuhungu wa Nyabwongo II Buhemu, Abatasi b’u Rwanda babwiye Mibambwe I Sekarongoro ko atazatsinda Abanyoro bari benshi bikabije ugereranyije n’abaje mu gitero cya mbere, icyo gihe yagerageje kwitabaza umwami w’u Bugesera Nsoro II Sangano, na Kimenyi II Shumbusho w’i Gisaka na Mashira ya Nkuba ya Sabugabo, umwami wa Nduga, ibyo bihugu byanga kumutabara, bimutera utwatsi. Nuko Mibambwe Sekarongoro abonye ko asumbirijwe, kandi u Rwanda rwe rushobora gusibama, ahitamo guhunga, ahungana n’Ingabo ze, abaturage ndetse n’amatungo, berekeza i Bunyabungo (mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Epfo ).
 Abanyoro bakurikiranye Mibambwe I Bunyabungo, Mashira abaha inzira. Abanyoro bahingutse, Abanyarwanda babanza kubatinya kubera ubwinshi bwabo gusa baza gukoresha amayeri babagwa gitumo, abanyarwanda baratsinda.
Mibambwe Sekarongoro yaje kugaruka mu gihugu cye amaze gutsinda, anyura kwa Sebukwe akaba n’umukwe we Mashira wari utuye I Mwima ya Busasamana muri icyo gihe. Mashira rero yaje gusanganira Sebukwe nta cyo yikeka nubwo yanze kumutabara akanaha inzira abanyoro. Yarabazimaniye. Igihe kigeze hagati, ingabo za Mibambwe zaramufashe, Mibambwe Sekarongoro aramwica, afatanyije na Munyanya wavaga inda imwe na Mashira kwa se wa bo, amutsinda aho ngaho I Mwima, ingoma yabo Nyanihinda barayinyaga, ubutaka bw’igihugu cya Nduga y’ababada babwomeka ku Rwanda. Ibyo kwa Mashira birarimbuka, Nduga itsindwa itsinzwe noneho. Sekarongoro, ategekana umwete Nduga, kugira ngo itazongera kumwigaranzura ikamurushya nka mbere.
Nguko uko uruhererekane rw’amateka y’igihugu cya Nduga yagiye ahererekana, kugeza ku izima ryayo ubwo yigarurirwaga n’u Rwanda ahasaga mu wa 1444, ku ngoma y’umwami w’u Rwanda, Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi.

Title: Umugambi wapfubye mu 1978 wo kohereza Abanyarwanda muri Tanzania na Gabon kubera ubwiyongere bw’abaturage
Body:
Guhera u Rwanda rutangiye kubarwa nk’igihugu nyuma y’ubwigenge, ubuyobozi bwose bwagiyeho bwagowe no guhangana n’ikibazo cy’ubwiyongere bukabije bw’abaturage, baberanye na kilometero kare 26338 rwahawe n’abakoloni mu nama y’i Berlin mu 1885.
Guhera u Rwanda rutangiye kubarwa nk’igihugu nyuma y’ubwigenge, ubuyobozi bwose bwagiyeho bwagowe no guhangana n’ikibazo cy’ubwiyongere bukabije bw’abaturage, baberanye na kilometero kare 26338 rwahawe n’abakoloni mu nama y’i Berlin mu 1885.
Mu myaka ya 1970 nibwo iki kibazo cyagaragaye cyane, ndetse icyo gihe ibihugu bikomeye n’imiryango mpuzamahanga bigira inama u Rwanda ko mu gihe nta gikozwe, bizarangira runaniwe kwita ku baturage barwo.
Muri iyo myaka Kiliziya Gatolika yasaga n’iyashinze imizi haba mu buzima bw’iyobokamana n’ubwa Politiki mu Rwanda, ntiyemeraga uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro butari ubwa kamere ari nayo myemerere yayo kugeza ubu, mu gihe ubushakashatsi bwagaragazaga ko ubwo buryo butafatwa nk’ubwahangana n’ikibazo nyamukuru igihugu cyari gifite.
Mu 1978, u Rwanda rwabarirwaga abaturage miliyoni 4.8 utabariyemo impunzi zari mu mahanga. Hakurikijwe ubutaka buri mu gihugu bukoreshwa, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zarushyiraga mu bihugu bituwe cyane dore ko kilometero kare icyo gihe yabarirwaga abaturage basaga 400.
Guhera mu 1975, imyaka ibiri Habyarimana afashe ubutegetsi, ikibazo cy’ubwiyongere bukabije bw’abaturage cyari kimaze gufata indi ntera. Ibyo byakubitiyeho ko umuryango nyarwanda wari ukibaswe n’imyumvire gakondo y’uko kubyara abana benshi, ari umugisha, bikaba amaboko n’ubukungu.
Hiyongeragaho ko benshi mu baturage ari abayoboke ba Kiliziya Gatolika itarakozwaga ibyo kuboneza urubyaro.
Habyarimana wari umuyoboke Gatolika anakorana nayo bya hafi kugeza no mu miyoborere, muri Nzeri 1977 yatumije uwari intumwa ya Papa mu Rwanda, Rotunno ngo baganire ku buryo igihugu cyatangiza gahunda yo kuboneza urubyaro ariko bitabangamiye imyemerere Gatolika.
Inyandiko z’ibanga za Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda icyo gihe, zigaragaza ko Rotunno yemeye ko ubwiyongere bw’abaturage buri mu Rwanda bukwiriye gushakirwa umuti mu maguru mashya. Mu nama yagiriye Habyarimana harimo gukoresha uburyo bwa kamere mu guhangana n’icyo kibazo.
Banki y’isi mu 1977 yamenyesheje u Rwanda ko kugira ngo rugire ubushobozi bwo guhaza abaturage biyongera rufite ari uko umusaruro w’ubuhinzi wiyongera ku kigero cya 3 % buri mwaka.
Kimwe mu byo Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zashinjaga u Rwanda nka nyirabayazana w’ubwiyongere bukabije bw’abaturage, ni ukugendera ku bitekerezo bya Kiliziya Gatolika byo kuboneza urubyaro mu buryo bwa kamere.
Mu 1978, mu Rwanda habaye inama yiga ku kuboneza urubyaro, imiryango mpuzamahanga nka Pathfinder International yiyemeza gutanga ubufasha.
Icyo gihe hagaragajwe ko mu guhangana n’ikibazo cy’ubwiyongere bw’abaturage mu Rwanda, kuboneza urubyaro ari cyo gisubizo gishoboka hagakoreshwa uburyo bwose bwaba gakondo n’ubwa kizungu kandi abaturage bakabwegerezwa ari nako basobanurirwa imikorere yabwo.
Mu biro bya Perezida hashyizweho itsinda ryihariye ryita ku gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya gahunda yo kuboneza urubyaro, ari nabyo byaje kurangira mu 1981 hashinzwe Ofisi y’Igihugu yita ku Mibereho y’Abaturage, ONAPO, yari ishinzwe ibyo kuboneza urubyaro.
Gutuza abanyarwanda mu mahanga, umushinga wapfubye
Mu nama zitandukanye Leta y’u Rwanda icyo gihe yagiye igirwa, harimo gushaka uburyo bamwe mu baturage bakimurwa bakajya gutuzwa mu mahanga, mu bihugu byabemera.
Iyi nama yahuje akanama ka Leta kagizwe n’inzobere zitandukanye mu by’ubuzima n’imibereho myiza, ku matariki 18 na 19 Mata 1978 hemejwe ko Guverinoma ishyira imbaraga mu kuganira n’ibihugu byifuza gutuza Abanyarwanda, bikagabanya igitutu cyari kuri Leta cy’ubwiyongere bw’abaturage.
Intumwa za Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga zamenyesheje ako kanama ko Tanzania yari yemeye kwakira no gutuza abanyarwanda bari hagati ya 400 000 na 1 000 000, bakabatuza ahantu hihariye.
Muri uko kwezi, uwari Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Aloys Nsekalije yari yabwiye abanyamakuru ko u Rwanda ruzishimira kohereza abo banyarwanda muri Tanzania ariko bigakorwa mu buryo budahubukiwe kandi abagiye koherezwa bakabanza gutegurwa.
Ntibyatinze, tariki 11 Gicurasi 1978, Perezida Julius Nyerere yagiriye uruzinduko rw’iminsi itatu mu Rwanda. Inyandiko z’ibanga za Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zahishuwe na WikiLeaks, zigaragaza ko yemereye u Rwanda kwakira abaturage barwo, bagatuzwa mu bice byo mu Burengerazuba bwa Tanzania bitari bituwe.
Agiye guhaguruka asubira muri Tanzania, Nyerere yagize ati “Twiteguye no kwakira abanyarwanda 500 000 icya rimwe kuko dufite ahantu hanini hadatuwe. Abazaza bazashyirwa mu midugudu izwi nka Ujamaa nkuko abandi Banyatanzaniya bameze.”
Uyu mushinga waheze mu mpapuro kuko nubwo u Rwanda na Tanzania byari byawemeranyijeho, ikiguzi cyose cyo gutuza abo baturage cyari kuri Leta y’u Rwanda.
Inyandiko z’ibanga za Amerika zerekana ko u Rwanda rwabigenzemo gahoro cyane, dore ko amikoro yo kubatuza yasaga nk’aho ari menshi ahubwo rushyira imbaraga muri gahunda zo kuboneza urubyaro.
Mbere yo kuganira na Tanzania, Habyarimana yari yaciye undi muvuno wo kumvikana na Gabon abanyarwanda bamwe cyane cyane abafite ubumenyi runaka, bakajyanwa gutuzwa muri icyo gihugu cyari cyugarijwe n’ubuke bw’abakozi mu nzego nyinshi cyane cyane iza Leta.
Tariki 30 Nzeri 1976 Perezida Habyarimana yagiriye uruzinduko muri Gabon, we na Perezida Omar Bongo basinya amasezerano ane y’ubufatanye arimo ayo kohereza abanyarwanda muri Gabon bakagenda nk’abakozi.
Byari byitezwe ko nyuma y’isinywa ry’ayo masezerano, impande zombi zizashyiraho Komisiyo ihuriweho ishinzwe kuyashyira mu bikorwa.
Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigaragaza ko uwo mushinga nawo waje gupfuba kuko Gabon yagiye igaragaza ubushake buke mu kuwushyira mu bikorwa, cyane ko byari biyoroheye kubona abandi banyamahanga batayihenze kandi ba hafi no guteza imbere uburezi imbere mu gihugu kugira ngo ibone abaturage bayo bafite ubumenyi bukenewe.
U Rwanda rwakomeje guhangana n’ubwiyongere bw’abaturage hakoreshejwe kuboneza urubyaro ariko umusaruro bitanga ukaba muke.
Mu 1966, abaturarwanda bageraga kuri miliyoni eshatu, bagenda bazamuka aho mu 1988 rwari rutuwe n’abaturage miliyoni esheshatu, mu gihe mu mwaka wa 2018 rwari rutuwe n’abasaga miliyoni 12.
Ibimenyetso byerekana ko bazakomeza kwiyongera ku buryo mu 2032 bazaba bageze kuri miliyoni 16.9 mu gihe baba biyongereye cyane, cyangwa miliyoni 15.4 baramutse baboneje urubyaro.
Ikigo gishinzwe Ibarurishamibare kigaragaza ko bazaba barikubye gatatu mu 2050 urebeye ku bwiyongere bariho bwa 2.6% ku mwaka.

Title: CNLG yasohoye ibitabo bigaragaza ubugome Jenoside yakoranywe muri Cyangugu na Gitarama
Body:
Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside, CNLG, yasohoye ibitabo bitatu bigaragaza amwe mu mateka mabi ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi cyane cyane muri Perefegitura ya Gitarama n’iyahoze ari Cyangungu, harimo n’ubuhamya bw’uburyo abasirikare b’Abafaransa bafataga Abatutsi ku ngufu.
Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside, CNLG, yasohoye ibitabo bitatu bigaragaza amwe mu mateka mabi ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi cyane cyane muri Perefegitura ya Gitarama n’iyahoze ari Cyangungu, harimo n’ubuhamya bw’uburyo abasirikare b’Abafaransa bafataga Abatutsi ku ngufu.
Kuri uyu wa Kane nibwo CNLG yagaragaje ibi bitabo, hakaba harimo kimwe gikubiyemo ubuhamya bw’uburyo Abatutsi batotojwe guhera mu 1973 bakanirukanwa mu mashuri.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na CNLG ibifashijwemo n’abashakashatsi bayo barimo Mafeza Faustin wakoze ubushakashatsi kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Perefegitura ya Gitarama, Nikuze Donatien, we yakoze ubushakashatsi kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu yahoze ari perefegitura ya Cyangungu, naho Ntashamaje Gérard we yashyize hamwe ubuhamya.
Nko muri Cyangungu, ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza uburyo Ingabo z’Abafaransa zari muri ako gace zarebeyereye Interahamwe zicaga Abatutsi, ariko zinakora n’amahano yo gufata Abatutsi ku ngufu no kubakorera ibindi bikorwa bya kinyamanswa.
Uyu mushakashatsi agaragaza ko Abafaransa bageze mu Nkambi ya Nyarushishi aho bagomba kurinda impunzi z’Abatutsi, nyamara bakomeje gukorerwa ubwicanyi.
Agaragaza ko impunzi muri iyi nkambi zahabwaga ibiryo ariko nta nkwi zo kubitekesha, kandi ko byari ihame ko impunzi zijya hanze y’inkambi gushakisha inkwi, uwasohokaga wese Interahamwe zahitaga zimwica abasirikare b’Abafaransa bareba.
 Abafaransa mu bikorwa byo gusambanya Abatutsi
Iki gitabo kigaragaza ko Abafaransa baje muri Opération Turquoise bageze i Nyarushishi, batambagijwe inkambi yose, ari nako bagenda bafata amafoto.
Bugaragaza ko nyuma y’iminsi igera kuri itatu, bari bamaze kumenya ahaherereye abagore n’abakobwa, maze batangira kujya baza kubatwara bakajya kubasambanya ku ngufu, mu gihe bari bashinzwe kubarinda.
Uwitwa Kambogo Constance watanze ubuhamya yagize ati “Abafaransa bafataga abakobwa ku manywa y’ihangu bakabasambanya, bazaga mu nkambi bakazenguruka, bakagenda basohora abakobwa muri za burende, maze bagatoranya abo bashaka, babeshya ko ari abo kujya kubakorera isuku.”
“Ibyo ariko twaje kumenya ko byabaga ari ibinyoma, ko ahubwo babaga bagiye kubasambanya ku ngufu. Mu kubatoranya bavugaga ko bakeneye abakobwa bafite mu nda hato n’amabere mato. Bamara gutoranya abo bishimiye, bahitaga babajyana mu mahema yabo, babagezayo bakabasambanya ku ngufu, abana bakagaruka bataye umutwe.”
Avuga ko mu basambanyijwe ku ngufu i Nyarushishi harimo uwitwa Claudine wari ufite hagati y’imyaka 14 na 15. Kumusambanya ku ngufu byamuviriyemo guhungabana kugera abaye nk’umusazi.
Bakorerwaga kandi ibikorwa by’ubunyamaswa birimo kubashyiramo urusenda, kubasambanya mu kanwa, mu kibuno, bakabafata amafoto babambitse ubusa n’ibindi.
Yagaragaje ko abarangije kubasambanya bahitaga babahererekanya biyamira ko ari beza, ko batandukanye n’abakobwa n’abagore b’iwabo.
Avuga ko uretse mu Nkambi ya Nyarushishi, Abafaransa basambanyije ku ngufu abagore n’abakobwa ku Kibuga cy’Indege cya Kamembe, kuri Stade Kamarampaka n’ahandi.
Uwitwa Habimana Jean Bosco wari Interahamwe, avuga yari asanzwe akorana bya bugufi n’abasirikare b’Abafaransa, dore ko bari baramuhaye n’imbunda.
Yavuze ko Abafaransa bari muri Stade bamusabye kubashakira abakobwa bo gusambanya.
Muri Perefegitura ya Gitarama, ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko abatutsi benshi bahungiye i Kabgayi bazi ko ariho bazabona umutekano. Byaje kugaragara ko bahungiye ubwayi mu kigunda, kuko abari bagize komite y’umutekano muri Perefegitura ya Gitarama hamwe na ba Burugumesitiri bajyanaga lisiti y’Abatutsi bagomba kwicwa, bakabapakira amabisi bakajya kubicira muri Ngororero.
Guhera mu matariki ya 20 Mata 1994, buri munsi ngo hazaga amabisi yo gutwara Abatutsi bajyaga kwicirwa ku Cyome ku ruzi rwa Nyabarongo, ahahoze ari Komini Kibilira na Satinsyi.
Hari n’abandi Batutsi biciwe mu mashyamba yari hafi ya Kabgayi. Mu makomini ya Ntongwe na Mugina, Abatutsi baho bishwe n’Interahamwe zifatanije n’abasirikare baturutse mu kigo cya gisirikare i Gako n’impunzi z’Abarundi.
Bugaragaza ko bishwe urw’agashyinyaguro, kuko impunzi z’Abarundi zavanagamo imitima y’Abatutsi zimaze kwica zikayotsa.
Kwicwa urw’agashinyaguro byabereye ahantu hatandukanye, nko muri Komini Musambira, Segiteri ya Nyarubaka aho ababyeyi basabwe guhamba abana babo b’abahungu ari bazima, bikozwe n’uwari ukuriye Interahamwe y’umugore witwa Mukangango.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo y’Igihugu Ishinzwe kurwanya Jenoside (CNLG), Dr Bizimana Jean Damascène, yavuze ko gukora ubu bushakashatsi bifasha cyane cyane abakiri bato kumenya amateka yaranze igihugu cyabo, no kumenya ko bafite inshingano yo guhangana n’abakomeje kubiba urwango.
Yagize ati “Icya mbere ubu bushakashatsi CNLG ikora bugaragaza uko Jenoside yateguwe ikanashyirwa mu bikorwa bifasha urubyiruko kumenya amateka kuko abenshi bari bataravuka cyangwa bakaba bari bakiri batoi”
“Bibafasha kumenya umwihariko wa buri karere, nubwo yateguwe mu gihugu cyose ariko usanga buri gace gafite ubugome bwahakorewe, ikindi ni ukugira ngo bamenye icyo leta y’ubumwe bw’abanyarwanda yakoze kandi bafate n’ingamba zo kubisigasira kuko haracyari abantu bakirangwa n’ingebitekerezo ya Jenoside batarava muri urwo rwango.”
CNLG yizeye ko ibi bitabo bizafasha kwerekana ko abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi babeshya.

Title: Amateka ya Nduga, igihugu cyometswe ku Rwanda hakoreshejwe amayeri
Body:
Nduga ni agace kagize amateka menshi mu Rwanda, kaba igihugu cy’igihangage u Rwanda tuzi ubu rutabaho, kukomeka ku Rwanda bisaba abami b’u Rwanda gukoresha amayeri arimo kohereza ingabo zigize abakwe n’abageni, bahageze bahagaba igitero gikomeye.
Nduga ni agace kagize amateka menshi mu Rwanda, kaba igihugu cy’igihangage u Rwanda tuzi ubu rutabaho, kukomeka ku Rwanda bisaba abami b’u Rwanda gukoresha amayeri arimo kohereza ingabo zigize abakwe n’abageni, bahageze bahagaba igitero gikomeye.
Mu bihe byo ha mbere, kugira ngo igihugu kigire ubuzima gatozi cyitwe igihugu, ni uko cyagombaga kuba gifite ibintu bitanu by’ingenzi, aribyo; Kugira ubutaka, kugira abaturage bacyitirirwa, kugira ingoma ngabe nk’ikirango cy’igihugu cyigenga, kugira umwami ukigenga n’ingabo zikirwanirira.
Nduga cyari kimwe mu bihugu 29 byari bigize u Rwanda rwo hambere, ndetse kikaba kimwe mu byari bikomeye.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Imizi y’u Rwanda, Umutumba wa mbere ’’ ndetse n’igitabo “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro’’ byombi dukesha Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere mu Busizi, umuco n’amateka y’u Rwanda, igihugu cya Nduga cyahoze kizwi nka ‘Nduga y’Ababanda’. Ni kimwe mu bihugu byahanzwe bwa mbere ku butaka u Rwanda rufite ubu, kuko yahanzwe ahasaga mu wa 600 nyuma ya Yezu.
Umwami uzwi mu mateka ya Nduga mu gihe cy’umwaduko w’ingoma Nyiginya ni uwitwa Kibanda cya Rurenge. Abami batwaye Nduga ni Kimezamiryango n’umuhungu we bitirinwaga, Kibanda, Sabugabo, Nkuba na Mashira.
Igihugu cya Nduga, cyari giherereye mu Rwanda rw’Amajyepfo no hagati, kuri ubu kikaba cyari gikusanyije uturere twa Kamonyi, Muhanga, Ruhango na Nyanza, imirenge imwe n’imwe yo mu Karere ka Gisagara ndetse na Huye.
Ingoma ya Nduga yategekwaga n’Ababanda bafite igisekuruza cyabo kuri Kidanda cya Rurenge, ufite inkomoko mu Basinga b’Abasangwabutaka, kikaba cyari gifite uturere tune.
Mu Turere twari tugize igihugu cya Nduga, harimo Akarere k’Amayaga ariko karere kari kanini kuko kari gasanganyije igihugu cyose cya Nduga y’Amajyepfo, ushyizemo umurongo ugabanyamo kabiri.
Akarere k’Amayaga kari gaherereye mu Mirenge ya Runda, Gacurabwenge, Rugalika, Nyarubaka, Mugina na Nyamiyaga yo mu Karere ka Kamonyi, Imirenge ya Mbuye, Ruhango, Kinazi na Ntongwe yo mu Karere ka Ruhango n’imirenge ya Busoro, Kigoma, Muyira, Kibilizi na Ntyazo yo mu Karere ka Nyanza. Hari kandi n’Imirenge ya Mamba, Gikonko na Musha yo mu Karere ka Gisagara no mu Mirenge y’Akarere ka Huye irimo Ruhashya, Rusatira na Kinazi.
Mu Turere twari tugize igihugu cya Nduga, harimo n’Akarere k’Akabagali kari aka kabiri mu bugari. Aho kari gaherereye kuri ubu ni mu Mirenge ya Kigoma, Simbi na Rwaniro yo mu Karere ka Huye, Imirenge ya Busasamana, Rwabicuma, Cyabakamyi na Mukingo yo mu Karere ka Nyanza n’Imirenge ya Bweramana, Byimana, Kabagali, Kinihira na Mwendo yo mu Karere ka Ruhango.
Mu turere twari tugize igihugu cya Nduga kandi harimo n’Akarere k’Amarangara kari gaherereye mi mirenge ya Shyogwe, Nyamabuye, Muhanga, Mushishiro, Nyarusange na Cyeza yo mu Karere ka Muhanga n’Imirenge ya Musambira na Nyarubaka yo mu Karere ka Kamonyi.
Akarere ka kane kari kagize Nduga ni akarere ka Ndiza kari gaherereye mu Mirenge ya Rukoma, Karama, Kayumba, Kayenzi na Ngamba yo mu Karere ka Kamonyi n’imirenge ya Rugendabari, Kabacuzi, Kibangu, Rongi, Nyabinoni, Kiyumba yo mu Karere ka Muhanga.
Ku ikubitiro icyo gihugu cyahanzwe na Kimezamiryango cya Rurenge wari ufite gakondo nkuru y’Abamezamiryango ku rutare rwa Mukingo ( Ubu ni mu mu Murenge wa Mukingo wo mu Karere ka Nyanza).
Nyuma yaje kuzungurwa n’umuhungu we Kimezamiryango, waje kunyagwa igihugu na se wabo Kibanda, wari utuye i Gisari na Kibanda.
Kibanda cya Rurenge ari nawe murumuna wa Kimezamiryango cya Rurenge, yari yarahawe ubutware na Mukuru we Kimezamiryango bwo kumutwarira Akarere k’Amayaga, ari nako kari kanini mu gihugu cya Nduga. Kibanda, akaba umugabo ugira amakarikari n’ubuhangange butisukirwa, ku buryo izina se Rurenge yari yaramwise, yiyongereyeho izina rya “Gisari” bituruka ku nshinga “Gusarika” bivuga “Kutisukirwa”
Kibanda yaje gufata imisozi yari atuyeho yo mu Karere k’Amayaga, ayitirira amazina ye yombi ya Gisari (Kitisukirwa) na Kibanda. Ayo mazina arahahama kugeza na bugingo n’ubu. Gisari na Kibanda, ni imidugudu ituranye yo mu Kagali ka Kinazi yo mu Murenge wa Kinazi wo mu Karere ka Ruhango.
Mu gice gikurikiyeho, tuzabataturira, amateka y’iherezo ry’igihugu cya Nduga, n’uko cyometswe ku butaka bw’u Rwanda.

Title: Ubuzima bw’indaya z’i Kigali mu myaka ya 1970
Body:
Ibihe byose bigira ab’ubu, ab’imico isanzwe n’idasanzwe, ibangamye n’itabangamye yose icyo iba ihuriyeho ni ugutuma ubuzima bugenda mu gihugu.
Ibihe byose bigira ab’ubu, ab’imico isanzwe n’idasanzwe, ibangamye n’itabangamye yose icyo iba ihuriyeho ni ugutuma ubuzima bugenda mu gihugu.
Abahanga bavuga ko uburaya ari umwe mu myuga ikuze kurusha indi ku Isi nubwo nta bihamya bifatika, ariko bigaragara ko wakozwe kuva kera dore ko na Bibiliya iwuvugaho.
Abagore bibohoye, Femmes Libres de Kigali, ni izina ryari iry’indaya i Kigali mu myaka ya 1970, iterambere ry’Abanyaburayi ritangiye gusakara muri Afurika, imijyi itangiye gutera imbere, imishinga y’abanyamahanga yisukiranya ubutitsa.
Ni umwuga wamye ukorwa mu bwihisho mu masaha y’ijoro cyangwa ahihishe kandi uwukora ntiyishimire izina ‘indaya’, byatumye abinjiraga mu buraya barangije amashuri mu myaka ya 1970 bahindura izina, bakiyita ‘Femmes Libres de Kigali’.
Ni umwuga wakozwe mu bihe bigoye ikoranabuhanga ritaraza, telefone zigendanwa zikiri mu mishinga, internet ikiri mu igeragezwa.
Icyo gihe nibwo hahimbwe imvugo nyinshi zikoreshwa n’ubu nko ‘Gutega indege’ nubwo ubu ryahindutse iry’abafundi bahurira hamwe bategereje ubaha akazi mu gitondo.
Inyandiko “Femmes libres de Kigali” ya Marijke Vandersypen yasohotse mu kinyamakuru ‘Cahiers d’études africaines”, volume 17 n°65, 1977, igaragaza ko uko iterambere ryiyongeraga i Kigali, abakora uburaya barushagaho kwiyongera ahanini bitewe n’umubare munini w’abavaga mu cyaro bajya mu mijyi.
Muri iyo myaka, utubari twari tumaze kwiyongera mu duce tw’Umujyi wa Kigali twarabicaga bigacika nko mu Kiyovu, Nyamirambo no mu mujyi rwagati.
Ubwiyongere bw’abaturage mu Mujyi wa Kigali bugaragarira ku kuba abari batuye Kigali mu 1962 bari munsi ya 38,000, nyamara mu 1975 bari bageze ku 90,000.
Indaya z’i Kigali zabaga mu byiciro, harimo iziciriritse zabaga mu bice bya Nyamirambo n’ahandi hatuwe cyane, indaya ziyubashye zakoreraga cyane mu Kiyovu zigataha mu mujyi rwagati, indaya zo mu biro zakoraga nyuma y’akazi n’indaya zigenga zabaga ahanini zigizwe n’abagore babuze abagabo zikorera mu rugo.
Utubari nitwo twabonekagamo indaya cyane twaba uduciriritse n’utworoheje, hakaba na ba nyir’utubari bazifashishaga mu gukurura abakiliya, bamwe bakaziha akazi.
Marijke Vandersypen mu nyandiko ye yavuze ko ubwo yakoraga ubushakashatsi, yasanze ahazwi nka Camp Swahili i Nyamirambo akabari byari bizwi ko habonekamo indaya nyinshi, abazishaka bifite bagaparika imodoka bakajya gutoranya izo bashaka, bakongera bakagenda.
Indaya ziciriritse
Ni indaya ahanini zabaga zigizwe n’abakobwa baje baturutse mu bice by’icyaro, baje gushaka amaramuko i Kigali.
Benshi muri aba bakobwa babaga mu duce dutuwe cyane, bagakodesha inzu ahanini z’ibyumba bibiri ziri hagati ya 500 Frw na 1000 Frw ku kwezi. Bamwe babanaga ari nka babiri cyangwa barenga.
Marijke Vandersypen avuga ko nk’i Nyamirambo hari inzu y’ibyumba bitatu yasanze hacumbitsemo indaya zigera ku icumi.
Indaya zo muri icyo cyiciro akenshi zabaga mu nzu nto z’icyumba kimwe cyangwa bibiri zitabamo sima. Nta kandi kazi abo bakobwa bagiraga uretse kwirirwa bazenguruka mu tubari bareba ko hari uwabareba irihumye. Akenshi aba bakobwa bahoraga bimuka kubera kubura ubukode.
Nubwo nta mubare nyawo uzwi w’abari mu cyiciro nk’icyo icyo gihe, ubuhamya bamwe muri bo bagiye baha umwanditsi bugaragaza ko bari benshi.
Icyo cyiciro cyabagamo izindi ndaya zo zabaga zifite akazi mu tubari, abagabo bazishimye bakazitahana mu ijoro. Ni ibanga akenshi babaga baziranyeho na ba shebuja babahaye akazi, kuko byatumaga n’abakiliya biyongera.
Nubwo bose babaga bari mu cyiciro kimwe, ahanini batarageze mu ishuri cyangwa baracikirije amashuri, aba bo ngo ntibakundaga guhura n’ubuzima bubi nk’izindi ndaya ziciriritse, kuko bashoboraga kwiyishyurira amacumbi rimwe na rimwe bakaba bafite ay’ubuntu babamo mu tubari bakoramo.
Marie, indaya yiyubashye yakoreraga ikigo cyigenga ifite imyaka 28 ubwo inyandiko yasohokaga mu 1977, yagize iti “Bariya bakobwa (baciriritse) bafata umugabo wese babonye nta gutoranya. Ntawe basubiza inyuma apfa kuba azanye amafaranga. Bahura n’abantu bavuye hose ku buryo bashobora no kubazanira indwara bakabanduza. Hari nubwo bibaviramo kubura urubyaro kubera izo ndwara.”
Izo ndaya ziciriritse akenshi zabaga zifite abana. Nyuma yo kubyara, abenshi kubera kubura umwanya n’ubushobozi bwo kwita ku bana babo, baboherezaga mu cyaro aho baturutse. Abatabikoze gutyo bagashaka abakozi (ababoyi) boroheje bo kubitaho.
Nubwo mu kazi kazo kubyara byabaga ari ikintu gishoboka cyane dore ko imibonano mpuzabitsina ikingiye yasaga nk’itabaho, benshi muri izo ndaya zangaga kubyara kubi.
Thérèse wari ufite imyaka 19, yari atwite inda ya mbere. Yaje i Kigali avuye i Butare ari naho avuka, yanabanje gukorerayo uburaya.
Yagize ati “Ubukene ubu buranyishe. Nta byishimo nkigira, nta mugabo ukindeba, ubu nirirwa mu madeni. Nsigaye nywa amazi masa. Nizeye ko nimara kubyara, nzongera nkasa neza, nkambara utwenda tunyegereye n’inkweto ndende. Nizeye kongera gukundwa no kuri IBIS (hotel). Mama yambwiye ko azanderera umwana.”
Amasaha ya saa kumi n’imwe z’umugoroba, ngo nibwo indaya z’i Kigali zabaga zivuye mu rugo zasokoje, zambaye amajipo magufi cyangwa amapantalo zigatangira kuzenguruka utubari zishaka abakiliya cyangwa zikajya ‘gutega indege’ bitewe n’aho zahisemo abazishaka bazajya bazisanga.
Nta mafaranga yihariye indaya ziciriritse zakoreraga muri icyo gihe ariko ahanini yabaga ari hagati ya 100 Frw na 400 Frw mu ijoro rimwe, akiyongera cyangwa akagabanyuka bitewe n’ubwiza bw’umukobwa.
Thérèse yavuze ko akenshi abakobwa bo mu tubari bishyuzaga mbere umugabo ushaka kubatahana kugira ngo akazi nikaba kenshi akabura umwanya wo kujyana n’uwo mugabo, umugabo ataza kwisubiraho akajya gushaka abandi, ahubwo agombe amutegereza cyangwa arambirwe yigendere amafaranga ayasigarane.
Akenshi abakozi bo mu rugo b’abakobwa bakorera indaya ziciriritse, nabo byarangiraga bavuyemo indaya kubera kwigana ba nyirabuja. Izo ndaya zo mu rugo zatangiraga ziryamana n’amabandi, abacuruza ikarito n’abandi basore baciriritse badashobora kwigondera indaya nkuru.
Indaya zo mu Kiyovu
Kiyovu niko kari agace gakomeye kandi kiyubashye muri Kigali. Kari agace kabonekamo utubari twiza, dusurwa n’abadipolomate, abanyaburayi n’abandi bifite.Wahasangaga abakobwa biyubashye nubwo n’indaya ziciriritse zajyaga zihaza gake.
Ubwiza bw’umukobwa mu Kiyovu nibwo bwamuzaniraga abakiliya cyangwa uburyo azi kubyinisha neza abagabo mu kabari. Hari ababonaga abagabo kubera ubwitonzi bagaragaza cyangwa se uburyo bazimo Igifaransa ku buryo babasha kuganira n’abanyamahanga.
Abakobwa biyubashye bicururizaga mu Kiyovu abenshi babaga baba mu mujyi rwagati , bamwe baba bonyine cyangwa babana na bagenzi babo. Babaga mu nzu zimeze neza, zirimo sima zisize n’irangi. Bakodeshaga inzu zihenze ku mafaranga agera ku 3000 ku kwezi.
Ni abakobwa babaga bazi kwiyambika neza, bahora bahinduranya imyenda bikaba akarusho ubwo byabaga bigeze mu mpera z’icyumweru.
Benshi babaga bifuza abakiliya b’abanyamahanga. Nubwo indaya nyinshi zitifuza kubyara zikiri muri ako kazi, izo mu Kiyovu zabyifuzaga igihe zahuye n’abo banyamahanga kuko kubyarana nabo, byabaga bivuze guhabwa indezo itubutse.
Hari uwavuze uburyo yaryamanye kenshi n’Umufaransa wabaga i Butare, ngo arebe ko yamutera inda azabyare umwana w’umuzungu, birangira amubyaye se aramwanga, no mu cyaro aho yamujyanye kurererwa ahabwa akato.
Ati “Ubundi umwana w’umuzungu akwiriye kwitabwaho na se, akamujyana ku ishuri. Ntiyakabaye ahinga, arya ibijumba n’ibishyimbo. Ubu umubonye wese amutunga urutoki, ngo dore kiriya cyana, nyamara umwana wirabura iyo ari mu bandi ntawe umumenya.”
Abakobwa bo mu Kiyovu akenshi bakundaga gutemberera mu yindi Mijyi nka Gisenyi na Butare. Basohokeraga mu tubari two mu Kiyovu mu minsi isanzwe aho Primus yaguraga 30 Frw.
Mu Kiyovu, Abataliyani ngo bari bazwiho kwishyura indaya menshi naho Abafaransa bakaba ingona ku ifaranga.
Umutaliyani ngo yashoboraga kwishyura 3000 Frw mu ijoro rimwe mu gihe Umufaransa atarenzaga 1000 Frw. Abakobwa bazi ubwenge bo ntibishyuzaga abo banyamahanga ahubwo babigiragaho inshuti kugira ngo bazabitabaze mu minsi mibi.
Thérèse ati “Umuzungu iyo yagukunze ufite ababyeyi b’abakene abubakira inzu kugira ngo nimujyana iwanyu azakirirwe mu nzu nziza aho yabasha kubona aho yicara. Iyo urwaye agushakira imiti igufasha. Iyo aguhaye amafaranga aba ari menshi umuryango wawe ugatera imbere. Iyo asubiye iwabo agusigira imodoka cyangwa inzu, ni ibyo tuba tubashakaho.”
Hari n’ababaga bategereje ko abo banyamahanga bazabagira abagore, bagasezera ku bukene burundu.
Muri iki cyiciro cy’indaya habagamo n’amashyari, uwo bagenzi be badashaka bakagurira amabandi akamukubita. Abazi ko bagezweho muri iyo minsi akenshi ngo bashakaga abasore b’ibigango b’abashomeri bo kubaherekeza, bakabishyura.
Indaya zo mu biro
Ni abakobwa cyangwa abagore babaga bafite akazi keza mu bigo byigenga cyangwa ibya Leta. Babaga bazi kuvuga neza Igifaransa, bazi aho igihugu kigeze n’ibindi. Abenshi babaga ari abahembwa amafaranga atari menshi, bagahitamo kuba indaya ziyubashye ngo babashe gukemura ibibazo bahura nabyo.
Marie watanze ubuhamya, icyo gihe yari indaya yiyubashye ikorera ikigo cyigenga.
Yagize ati “Abakobwa cyangwa abagore batinya kwitwa indaya, bakifuza kugira undi mwuga ubarinda kwitwa gutyo. Nk’iyo abanyamahanga bahuriye n’umukobwa mu kabari cyangwa muri hoteli, barabaza ngo ‘wowe ukora he”, undi yaba ahafite akahavugana ishema ati nkora aha n’aha. Umunyamahanga yaba yamukunze bagahera aho baba inshuti.”
Abafite isura nziza hari ubwo bagiraga inshuti nyinshi kandi nziza, rimwe na rimwe amafaranga bakorera mu buraya akaruta kure ayo bahembwa ku kwezi, bakaba bava mu kazi kabahemba ku kwezi bakaba indaya butwi.
Camille 25, ni umwe mu ndaya zo mu biro Marijke Vandersypen yasanze atongana n’indaya iciriritse.
Camille yagira ati “Wa mushenzi we , mwe mucunganwa n’ijoro ngo mubashe kubaho . Twe dukora ku manywa nta pfunwe , twajya mu karuhuko mugatangira amanjwe. Nta soni mufite zo kunyita indaya?”
Abo bakobwa akenshi babagaho mu buryo bwiyubashye kurusha abo mu Kiyovu. Babaga mu nzu nziza rimwe na rimwe umwe akaba yaba mu nzu wenyine kandi isa neza. Inzu babagamo zabaga zikodeshwa hagati ya 3500 Frw na 5000 Frw.
Abafite abana, babaga babaho neza, biga ku bigo byiza. Igihe abana babo bamaze gukura, hari abahitagamo kubajyana mu mashuri meza aho biga babamo kugira ngo babone uko bikorera akazi neza.
Indaya zo mu biro nta wapfaga kuzisanga mu tubari, akenshi zabaga zifite inshuti z’abanyamahanga zijya gusura akazi karangiye, akaba ariho bagorobereza banywa inzoga zihenze nka Martini na Whisky, banaganira ku buzima bw’igihugu.
Ni indaya zitapfaga kwishyuza ahubwo abo bagabo zagize inshuti akenshi babaga ari abanyamahanga cyangwa abaherwe batezeho byinshi kurusha amafaranga y’ako kanya.
Bernadette umwe muri bo yagize ati “nyuma y’igihe uramubwira uti nagize ibyago, ndashaka gusura mama ararwaye cyane, akaguha ibihumbi 10, cyangwa ibihumbi 15 ingunga imwe. Ayo urayabika ukazayakoramo igikorwa kigaragara. Hari n’ubwo umubwira uti ndashaka kugura tourne disque, akaguha ibihumbi 20.”
Izo ndaya hari ubwo zakoreraga amafaranga ashobora gutuma ziyubakira inzu, zirihira abana bazo amashuri agezweho , zigura imodoka, zitangira ubucuruzi n’ibindi.
Indaya zigenga
Iki cyiciro cyabagamo akenshi abagore batanye n’abagabo, bafite ubucuruzi buciriritse nk’utubari two mu rugo kandi batuye mu duce tubamo abantu benshi.
Ni abagore bakoraga icyo bashatse igihe bashakiye dore ko nta mugabo wabaga abagenga. Abakiliya b’abo bagore akenshi babaga ari abantu basanzwe ari inshuti zabo cyangwa ari ba bagabo badakunda ko hari ababonana n’indaya ku muhanda cyangwa mu kabari.
Akenshi abo bagore babaga bafite abagabo baryamana nabo bazwi, adashobora kuryamana n’abandi. Abo nibo yifashishaga bamuha ibyo akeneye.
Mu Kinyarwanda cyiza wavuga ko uwo mugore yabaga afite abinjira, baza mu masaha y’umugoroba, akabari akagafunga bakinyabya mu gikari akaba ariho banywera.
Catherine wabaga muri Camp Swahili i Nyamirambo yagize ati “Hari nk’ubwo umugabo ava i Butare tuziranye, akaza kunsura, akavuga ati ‘Uriya ni umugore utagira umugabo, niho ndarara’. Akenshi aba ari abagabo b’aha mu mujyi , akaba asanzwe aza hano nzi ko isaha n’isaha azamfasha. Ntiyabona amafaranga ngo anyibagirwe.”
Muri abo bagore b’indaya, hari ababashaga kugira amahirwe bakabona abagabo muri ako kazi, bagashinga ingo. Ni abagore batinywaga cyane n’abandi bagore bafite abagabo, ntawe ubagire inshuti ngo batazamutwarira umugabo.
Mu gitabo AIDS: Responses, Interventions and Care, hagaragazwa ko mu ndaya zari ziri mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu 1985, 88 % by’izabashije gupima icyo gihe bazisanzemo virusi itera SIDA.
Hagati ya 1982 na 1983, Leta yakoze imikwabu mu ndaya zo mu mujyi wa Kigali inyinshi zirafungwa hagamijwe kuzihashya.

Title: Bamporiki yanyuzwe n’igitaramo Nyarwanda cy’abiga muri Green Hills Academy abizeza kugisangiza Abanyarwanda
Body:
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Bamporiki Edouard, yanyuzwe n’igitaramo Nyarwanda cy’abanyeshuri biga muri Green Hills Academy (GHA) gisigasira umuco gakondo kikanatoza urubyiruko gukunda igihugu, abizeza ubufasha bushoboka kugira ngo bagisangize Abanyarwanda bose.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Bamporiki Edouard, yanyuzwe n’igitaramo Nyarwanda cy’abanyeshuri biga muri Green Hills Academy (GHA) gisigasira umuco gakondo kikanatoza urubyiruko gukunda igihugu, abizeza ubufasha bushoboka kugira ngo bagisangize Abanyarwanda bose.
Iki gitaramo cyabaye ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 7 Gashyantare ku cyicaro cy’iri shuri, i Nyarutarama mu Karere ka Gasabo cyateguwe mu rwego rwo gusigasira umuco Nyarwanda no gutoza urubyiruko gukunda igihugu no kucyitangira igihe bibaye ngombwa.
Gikubiye mu cyo bise ‘Rwanda Festival Day’, umunsi urangwa n’ibikorwa bitandukanye bijyanye n’umuco Nyarwanda birimo imikino n’imbyino gakondo, ibikoresho bya Kinyarwanda, gusoma Ikinyarwanda, imigani n’insigamugani n’ibindi.
Aba banyeshuri bafite ubuhanga mu mikino n’imbyino gakondo zigaruka ku mateka n’umuco Nyarwanda, bakinnye umukino ugaruka ku butwari bw’umukobwa Nyiramateke Robwa, wemeye guhara ubuzima bwe n’ubw’umwana yari atwitiye Abanya-Gisaka aho kumubyara ngo azabe ariwe ugaba igitero ku Rwanda.
Bamporiki yashimye uburyo abanyeshuri ba Green Hills Academy bakinnye imikino n’imbyino gakondo, byimakaza umuco Nyarwanda, by’umwihariko bikabaremamo umuco wo gukunda igihugu.
Ati “Ndifuza ko munyemereye uyu mukino twazawereka Abanyarwanda benshi. Ubwo u Rwanda rwajyaga mu icuraburindi, imikino nk’iyi ntiyari yemewe. Imibyinire nk’iyi, imivugo n’ibitekerezo nk’ibi ntibyari byemewe.”
“Niba mushobora gutegura imikino nk’iyi ntabwo bikwiriye guherera hano. Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco yiteguye kubafasha kuyikinira mu cyumba kigari, Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Itangazamakuru kikamenyesha Abanyarwanda ibyo mufite hano. Ndabibasezeranyije.”
Bamporiki yavuze ko mu by’ukuri imikino y’abanyeshuri bo muri Green Hills Academy ijyanye n’inshingano afite zo guteza imbere impano zishingiye ku muco Nyarwanda no gukunda igihugu muri rusange.
Ati “Muri gukora neza, murimo kunyorohereza akazi, murimo kuganisha u Rwanda aho rugomba kuba ruri. Icyerekezo 2050 tugiye kwinjiramo vuba aha nari ndimo kubona ishusho y’u Rwanda nyarwo tuzaba dufite mu myaka 30 iri imbere. Murakoze kuri utu dushya.”
Minisitiri Bamporiki yabwiye aba banyeshuri, abarezi n’ababyeyi babo ko kuba u Rwanda uyu munsi rufite abantu bashobora kwitangira igihugu n’umuco wacyo bitanga icyizere ko utazazimira.
Ati “Abakurambere bacu baravuze ngo imishinga yose yapfuye ni iyo bene yo banze gupfira. Icyatumye uyu muco wacu wari ugiye gupfa ni uko hari abanze kuwupfira bakidagadura uko bashaka ariko ntabwo u Rwanda rugipfuye kuko Inkotanyi zaruvanye ku manga, ziduha umurage utuma tuvuga amateka yacu twemye.”
Umwarimu w’umuco muri Green Hills Academy, Nahimana Serge, yavuze ko iki gikorwa kigamije guteza imbere umuco Nyarwanda by’umwihariko no gutoza abana gukunda igihugu.
Ati “Tugira abanyeshuri bo mu bihugu bitandukanye bafite n’imico itandukanye ariko tukagira umwihariko wo kugira umunsi umwe wihariye ku Rwanda.”
“Abana bacu biga Ikinyarwanda kuva mu mashuri y’incuke kugeza mu yisumbuye n’isomo ry’umuco. Ni amasomo ikigo cyacu duha agaciro ku buryo umwana wese agira amahirwe yo kugira icyo yunguka ku Rwanda, yaba Umunyarwanda cyangwa umunyamahanga.”
Umuyobozi wa Green Hill Academy, Lisa Biasillo, yanyuzwe n’uburyo abanyeshuri bakinanye ubuhanga imikino n’imbyino bitandukanye, ashimira abagize uruhare mu gutegura iki gitaramo.
Green Hills Academy ni ishuri ry’ababyeyi riherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ryashinzwe mu 1997. Rifite icyiciro cy’incuke, icy’amashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye, bahabwa amasomo mu ndimi z’Igifaransa, Icyongereza, Ikidage n’Ikinyarwanda.
Mu mashuri yisumbuye abanyeshuri bategurirwa gukora ibizamini mpuzamahanga n’abarimu b’inzobere baturuka mu bihugu bitandukanye ku Isi.
 Abitegura gusoza umwaka wa Gatandatu bakurikirana amasomo mpuzamahanga muri porogaramu yitwa “International Baccalaureate” (IB), abafasha kwimenyereza kuvugira mu ruhame, akanabategura kuzaba abayobozi beza no gukomeza amasomo yabo muri za kaminuza hirya no hino ku Isi.
Amafoto: Dushimimana Ami Pacifique

Title: Uko Abanyoro bateye u Rwanda, bakabura uko barusohokamo bikarangira bamwe babaye Abanyarwanda
Body:
U Rwanda ni igihugu cyabaye igihangange kuva kera, gito mu buso ariko kikaba kinini mu mitekerereze ku buryo ibihugu byahoze bituranye narwo kuva kera biruzi nk’ishyanga ritisukirwa.
U Rwanda ni igihugu cyabaye igihangange kuva kera, gito mu buso ariko kikaba kinini mu mitekerereze ku buryo ibihugu byahoze bituranye narwo kuva kera biruzi nk’ishyanga ritisukirwa.
Ubuhanga bwarwo wabubaza Abanyoro, baruteye baje kwihimura bakahavana amateka na n’ubu ataribagirana, biviramo bamwe muri bo kuyoba no kuyoberwa iyo baje baturuka, bagahitamo kuguma mu Rwanda ari ingazurwamuheto.
Ibyo bisekuru by’Abanyoro babuze inzira n’abafashwe mpiri ubwo bateraga u Rwanda, byaje kuhamara igihe bihinduka Abanyarwanda bo mu bwoko bw’Indara n’Abasigari bazwi cyane mu bice byo mu Majyaruguru n’Iburengerazuba bw’Amajyepfo.
Ayo moko abiri cyangwa imiryango migari, yaje yiyongera ku yandi 24 yari asanzwe mu Rwanda.
Ibitabo birimo icyitwa “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro’’ n’igitabo “Iyoroka ry’Abanyarwanda, inkomoko y’imiryango migari” byombi by’umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, bigaragaza ko Abanyoro bagabye ibitero ku Rwanda mu bihe by’ingoma ya Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi, ahasaga mu wa 1411.
Abanyoro babanje kugaba igitero cyabo cya mbere mu Rwanda ku ngoma y’umwami Kigeli Mukobanya ahasaga mu wa 1378, baratsindwa. Uko gutsindwa kwabasigiye umujinya nk’ubwoko bwashakaga kwigarurira ibindi bihugu mu karere. Baragiye barisuganya bategura ikindi gitero cya kabiri, ari nacyo bagabye ku ngoma ya Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi, umuhungu wa Mukobanya.
Icyo gihe Abatasi b’u Rwanda babwiye Mibambwe I Sekarongoro ko atazatsinda Abanyoro kuko bari benshi bikabije ugereranyije n’abaje mu gitero cya mbere. Bwa kabiri, bari baje ari ingabo 10.000 mu gihe ingabo za Sekarongoro zo zari 4.000 gusa.
Icyo gihe Sekarongoro yagerageje kwitabaza umwami w’u Bugesera Nsoro II Sangano, na Kimenyi II Shumbusho w’I Gisaka na Mashira ya Nkuba ya Sabugabo, umwami wa Nduga,. Ibyo bihugu byanze kumutabara, bimutera utwatsi maze Sekarongoro abonye asumbirijwe kandi u Rwanda rwe rushobora gusibama, ahitamo guhunga n’ingabo ze, abaturage ndetse n’amatungo berekeza i Bunyabungo (mu ntara ya Kivu y’Epfo ). U Bunyabungo bwatwarwaga na Mulira Muhoyo wari ku ngoma muri ibyo bihe, amutuza mu murwa mukuru w’u Bunyabungo, ari wo Rusozi ( Bukavu y’ubu) abandi banyarwanda batura ku nkengero z’umugezi wa Rusizi.
Abanyoro baraje basanga Sekarongoro yagiye kera, bayogoza igihugu, batwara inka nkeya zishaje zahasigaye, batera Kimenyi w’ i Gisaka ariko ntibyakomera, batera u Bugesera umwami Sangano baramufata baramuboha baramujyana ngo ajye kubereka aho umuturanyi we Sekarongoro yagiye.
Bafashe urwo rugendo kugeza aho bagereye mu Kinyaga aho bari bitegeye ingabo za Sekarongoro, nuko Sangano w’u Bugesera bamwicira mu ishyamba rya Ngiga barenga bareba mu Kinyaga aho Sekarongoro yari aganje n’abaturage be.
Amateka avuga ko Abanyoro bamaze imyaka ine bidegembya ku butaka bw’u Rwanda mu gihe Sekarongoro n’abaturage be bari barahunze.
Abanyoro bakurikiranye Mibambwe Sekarongoro i Bunyabungo, Mashira abaha inzira, ariko Mibambwe Sekarongoro yari yagarutse hakuno y’umugezi wa Rusizi mu ngoma y’u Busozo kuko Abanyabungo bari birukanye Abanyarwanda, kuko imfizi ya Sekarongoro yari yishe iya Muhoyo, Abanyarwanda barwana n’Abanyabungo, ndetse Nyiramibambwe i Nyabadaha arahagwa.
Ubwo Abanyoro bari bahingutse, Abanyarwanda babanje kubatinya kubera ubwinshi bwabo. Bigeze ku mugoroba, Abanyarwanda biga ubucakura bwo gusambura amazu y’ibyatsi yari hafi aho, bahira n’ibindi byatsi ahari habazengurutse. Ubwo Abanyarwanda batangiye kugenda banyonyomba bigendera nk’abahunze, nyamara barimo kuzenguruka ibirindiro by’Abanyoro, mu rwego rwo kurema igico cyo kubata hagati.
 Aho abanyoro bari bakambitse bategereje gukoma imbarutso ngo rwambikane bakabona abanyarwanda bagenda uruhongohongo, bakagira ngo ni ukubatinya babahunga. Igihe kigeze, Abanyarwanda batwitse bya byatsi by’inzu barundanyije, Abanyoro aho bakambitse bashya ubwoba batangira guhunga batazi n’iyo bajya kuko ako karere batari bakamenyereye.
Umunyoro uhunze kubera ubwoba bw’ikome ry’umuriro yabonaga, akiroha mu muheto w’ingabo z’u Rwanda wahogeraga n’amacumu avuza ubuhuha nuko ingabo z’u Rwanda zica Abanyoro umusubizo, igitinyiro bashakaga muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba kiyoyoka burundu.
Uko bigaragara mu gitero cya kabiri Abanyoro bagabye mu Rwanda, haguye Abanyoro benshi kurusha abahaguye mu gitero cya mbere. Abanyoro bagiye barorongotana bahunga, bamwe batungukira mu Bungwe ahitwa Buhanga, babura inzira yabahuza n’ababo, baguma mu ishyamba riri i Burwi bararikonda, bararitura. Abo Banyoro nibo biswe Indara [abantu bayobye inzira], n’aho batuye hakurizaho kwitwa “Buhanga–ndara”.
Bamwe muri bo bahafatiwe mpiri abandi barayobagurika baza gutura mu Rwanda mu bice by’Amajyaruguru mu turere twa Burera na Musanze, bakaba ari bo bagize ubwoko bwitwa “Abasigari cyangwa se Basigi’’. Abandi banyoro barokotse umuheto wa Sekarongoro bagerageje kwambuka umugezi w’Umuvumba uri mu karere ka Nyagatare, nuko bageze mu Nkore umwami waho Ntare abahukamo arabica arabatsemba, niko kumuhimba ’’Kitabanyoro (Cyicabanyoro)’’.
Imiryango migari y’Abasigari n’Indara, ni ibisigara by’Abanyoro basize mu Rwanda bikomoka mu gitero cya kabiri bahagabye. Ni ukuvuga ko Indara n’Abasigari ari Ubuvivagiza bw’Abanyoro baba mu Rwanda. Iyo miryango yabaye imwe mu miryango migari ituye mu Rwanda mu buryo buyigwiririye kuko ntihagira inkomoko n’ubwo ihatuye igihe kirekire.
Aho imiryango y’Abasigari yiganje kuri ubu ni mu Turere twa Burera na Musanze mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru naho imiryango y’Indara, igatura mu Turere twa Gisagara na Nyaruguru. Abasigari cyangwa se Abasigi, nibo bakunze kwiyita “Abarera’’ izina bakomora kuri Sekuruza wabo “Murera’’.
Mu nzu y’Abarera, ari nayo nzu imwe Abasigari bibumbiyemo, niho hakomotse umutware umwe rukumbi ukomoka mu Basigari watwaye mu gihugu cy’u Rwanda, ari we Kabanda ka Mivumbi ya Ndabaramiye wo mu Basigari b’Abarera, watwaraga Susheferi ya Gitare muri Sheferi y’u Bukamba-Ndorwa muri Teritwali ya Ruhengeri.

Title: Hakizimana yanditse igitabo kirimo inzira zigeza umuntu ku bukire
Body:
Dieudonne D’Amour Nordkvist Hakizimana usanzwe yandika ibitabo, akaba umunyarwanda uba muri Suède, yanditse igitabo kigaragaza inzira umuntu ashobora gucamo agatera intambwe imugeza ku bukungu.
Dieudonne D’Amour Nordkvist Hakizimana usanzwe yandika ibitabo, akaba umunyarwanda uba muri Suède, yanditse igitabo kigaragaza inzira umuntu ashobora gucamo agatera intambwe imugeza ku bukungu.
Iyo umuntu abyutse mu gitondo akajya ku kazi yaba yikorera cyangwa akorera abandi byanga bikunze hari ikintu runaka aba yifuza kugeraho mu buzima bwe bwa buri munsi kandi kidatandukanye cyane no kuba ashaka ubukire.
Hari n’abayoboka inzira zigayitse usanga bishoye mu gucuruza ibintu bitemewe kugira ngo babashe kubona ubukire.
Niba uhorana inyota yo gukira, umwanditsi Dieudonne D’amour Nordkvist Hakizimana, yanditse igitabo gikubiyemo amabanga menshi yatuma ukira mu kanya gato abari bakuzi udafite n’urwara rwo kwishima bagatangira gutangazwa n’impinduka zaje mu buzima bwawe.
Uyu mugabo yabwiye IGIHE ko impamvu yanditse iki gitabo ari uko igihe yigaga ibijyanye n’ubukungu mu mu Bushinwa mu myaka yashize, hari amasomo akomeye yahaboneye.
Ati “ Maze kugera mu Bushinwa nkiga ibijyanye n’ubukungu nkanakora muri sosiyete zitandukanye z’abanya-Korea ndetse n’abanya- Suède , nahaboneye amasomo akomeye yatumye nanjye ntangira kwishingira ubucuruzi ndetse no guhimba ibintu binshya.”
“ Maze gusanga ko ubuzima bwanjye nzabukomereza mu mahanga kubera umuryango nubatseyo, nasanze ko gushyira mu nyandiko ibyo nungutse no kubisangiza abandi ko ari inkunga naba nteye Igihugu cyacu kugira ngo kizamure imibereho y’abaturage bacyo kandi buri munyarwanda wese akamenya ko afite imbaraga zo kugera ku bukungu no kubaho neza aramutse abishatse.”
Akomeza avuga ko iki gitabo kimeze nk’ikarita[Map] ikwereka inzira ushobora gucamo ugatera intambwe igera ku bukungu.
Muri iki gitabo cye yise ‘Gukira Bishobokera Buri Wese, Ariko Biraharanirwa’. hari aho agaragaza agira ati ‘Ntukishimire ko ugeze ku ntego yawe; kuko umunsi wayigezeho uzitura hasi’.
Iki gitabo kiri mu bice bitandukanye birimo ikivuga ngo ‘Urufunguzo Ninjye Urufite’ aho uyu mwanditsi agaragazamo ibintu byinshi byerekana ko umuntu ariwe ugena ubuzima bwe, uko wagera ku byishimo byawe n’ubuzima bwiza bw’umunezero wifuza n’ibindi.
Ikindi kirimo ni amahame yibanze yagufasha kugera ku ntsinzi ndetse no ku nzozi zawe.
Ikindi gice ni icya kabiri yise ‘ Ubushobozi Bwawe Ntibugira Ingano’ aho agaragaza ubushobozi bwihariye buri muntu afite ku buryo nta n’umwe ukwiriye kwitinya no kwitakariza icyizere.
Ati “Iki gitabo cyagufasha gushyira ubuzima bwawe mu cyerecyezo wifuza, kuba uwo wifuza kuba we, kugera aho wifuza kuzagera mu bukungu ndetse n’ubuzima bw’ibyishimo n’umunezero wifuza, ushyize mu bikorwa amahame ndetse n’inama bikirimo”.
Iki gitabo kuri ubu abenshi bashobora kukibona ku buntu bagiye muri Google Play Store bakandika mu ishakiro ijambo ‘Gukira’ bakabasha kuba bakibona ku buntu. Iki gitabo kandi kiraboneka muri Library CARITAS i Kigali.
Dieudonne D’amour Nordkvist Hakizimana wanditse iki gitabo yavukiye mu Rwanda mu 1977, muri Komini Kibali ahahoze ari Perefegitura ya Byumba ubu ni muri Gicumbi mu Mjyaruguru.
Amashuri yisumbuye yayize muri IFAK ku Kimihurura na Groupe Scolaire De La Salle i Byumba. Mbere yo kujya i Burayi, yamaze imyaka 10 mu Bushinwa yiga ibijyanye n’Ubukungu n’Ubumenyamuntu. Ni umuyobozi wa Sosiyete Igitego ikorera muri Suède, ikora ibijyanye no Guhanga udushya.
Amaze kwandika ibitabo birimo icyitwa ‘Amashyiga y’umunezero’ cyagiye hanze muri Nzeri 2019 , ‘Happiness Triangle’ cyangwa se ‘Mpandeshatu y’umunezero’ cyasohotse muri Kamena 2018, n’ikindi yasohoye mu Ugushyingo 2019 cyitwa ‘My Father Never Walked on Water’.

Title: Impamvu y’imiziro imwe n’imwe yari yihariye ku bagore bo mu Rwanda rwo hambere
Body:
Abantu benshi bakurikiranira hafi iby’imigenzo n’imiziro y’Abanyarwanda mu bihe byo hambere, bakunze kuvuga byinshi kubera imyemerere y’Abanyarwanda ishingiye ku miziro, bagera ku byo abagore bagomba kuziririza, bagasya bitanzitse!
Abantu benshi bakurikiranira hafi iby’imigenzo n’imiziro y’Abanyarwanda mu bihe byo hambere, bakunze kuvuga byinshi kubera imyemerere y’Abanyarwanda ishingiye ku miziro, bagera ku byo abagore bagomba kuziririza, bagasya bitanzitse!
Abenshi bagaragaza ko imyumvire y’Abanyarwanda bo ha mbere yakandamizaga umugore hashingiwe ku miziro bamushyiragaho.
Muri iyi nkuru, twabakusanyirije amateka y’imwe mu miziro yashyirwaga ku mugore n’impamvu yayo, ikamutoza kudakora iki cyangwa se kiriya, kugira ngo urujijo rw’iyo miziro rushire.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Umuco mu Buvanganzo’’ cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere ku muco, amateka n’ubuvanganzo, mu muco n’amateka y’u Rwanda hagabamo imibereho ishigiye ku miziro, imigenzo n’imihango, yose igendanye no kunoza imibereho yabo ya buri munsi.
Imiziro ni ibintu byaziraga mu muco nyarwanda cyangwa byagombaga kubahwa, gufatwa neza no gutinywa, kurinda ibyiza byagezweho ngo hatagira ikibyangiza cyangwa se ubyangiza. Kenshi na kenshi yanatozaga kwirinda ingeso mbi, kugira ibyo wubaha n’ibyo utinya, kwirinda kwandavura, kwiyandarika n’ibindi.
Imiziro ni imyemerere-hame idutoza kudakora iki cyangwa se kiriya. Za kirazira zose zigendana n’intera iyi n’iyi igihugu kigezeho, niyo mpamvu usanga za kirazira izi n’izi zaracyuye igihe, ugasanga izindi ziganje, hakavuka n’izindi nshya.
Zimwe muri za kirazira zagengaga ubuzima bw’umugore benshi bakunze kwikoma kubera kutazisobakukirwa, ni izi zikurikira:
Nta mugore wurira inzu:
Mu Rwanda rwo ha mbere cyaraziraga ko umugore yuyira inzu. Byaterwaga nuko nta makabutura cyangwa se amakariso yabagaho, byatumye bashyiraho uyu muziririzo ngo hatazagira umugore wurira inzu maze abari hasi ye bakamurunguruka bakabona ubwambure bwe bakamwubahuka. Bityo agata agaciro mu muryango kandi ari nyina w’umuntu.
Nta mugore ujya aho abagabo bicaye:
Mu Rwanda rwo hambere cyaraziraga ko umugore ataramira aho abagabo bicaye. Byaterwaga nuko kera nta bibindo (Cotex) byabagaho.
Iyo abagore bajyaga mu mihango, biberaga iyo mu mbere no mu bikari kugeza igihe imihango ishiriye, umugore akabona kujya ahabona. Niyo mpamvu hashyizweho uyu muzizirizo ku bagore, kugira ngo atazajya ajya aho abantu bateraniye ari mu mihango bityo bakamwubahuka bakanamusuzugura.
Ariko nubwo aticaraga hagati muri bo, yicaraga hafi yabo nk’uri kumwe nabo, ariko ku buryo ntawe umukenguza ngo amenye uko amerewe muri ibyo bihe.
N’iyo yabaga atari mu mihango, cyaraziraga kwicara mu bagabo kubera ko bashoboraga kumureba ikimero, bagatangira kumuzeyuka, bamukorakora uko biboneye. Yicaraga kure aho adashobora kwegerana n’abagabo. Biba intandaro yo kumurinda ahantu hose hateraniye abagabo.
Nta mugore ukama inka:
Uyu muziro ujya gusa n’uwo kurira inzu, kuko byose bisangiye impamvu. Nta myambarire yikwije abagore bagiraga mu bihe byo hambere yabafashaga guhisha ubwambure bwabo, ku buryo ubegereye cyangwa se ubari imbere atabasha kubarunguruka.
Niyo mpamvu bashyizeho umuziro wo kudakama inka kw’abagore, kugira ngo batazatera iry’abakamyi imbere y’abashumba n’abarenzamase, bakabona icyo bambariyeho.
Iyi miziro imwe n’imwe twagaragaje, yari iyo guhesha umugore agaciro no kumurinda igisuzuguriro, nta mpamvu yo kuyigaya tuyigira icyasha ko yakandamizaga abagore, nyamara bwari uburyo bwo kubarinda no kubungabunga ubusugire n’icyubahiro cyabo mu muryango nyarwanda.

Title: Ibitazibagirana mu gitero cyiswe icy’Imigogo u Rwanda rwatsinzemo abanyankore
Body:
Buri bitero byose u Rwanda rwagabye mu mahanga, byagiye bibamo ibikorwa by’ubuhangange bitazibagirana muri buri gitero. Igitero cyiswe icy’imigogo ni kimwe mu bitazibagirana umwami Kigeli Rwabugili yagabye ku ngoma ya Nkore.
Buri bitero byose u Rwanda rwagabye mu mahanga, byagiye bibamo ibikorwa by’ubuhangange bitazibagirana muri buri gitero. Igitero cyiswe icy’imigogo ni kimwe mu bitazibagirana umwami Kigeli Rwabugili yagabye ku ngoma ya Nkore.
Igitabo “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro’’ cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, kigaragaza ko muri Gashyantare 1894 ubwo Rwabugili yafataga umwanzuro wo kugaba igitero muri Nkore Abahinda b’Abanyankore, bari batangiye guhangara u Rwanda bitwaje agashya k’imbunda bahawe n’Abongereza.
Ibyateye umujinya Rwabugili, ni igitero Ntare V Rugingiza rwa Migereka Umwami wa Ankole yari yagabye mbere ahengereye Rwabugili ari i Bunyabungo aza kunyaga inyambo z’u Rwanda atwika ingoro y’i Rutaraka hafi ya Nyagatare.
Mu kwihimura, abanyarwanda bagabye igitero muri Nkore batamitse umuheto, imyambi ivuza ubuhuha, inkota zihogera.
Abanyankore batangiye gupfa mu buryo bubatunguye, babaga bahagararanye ari babiri cyangwa se barenze, barimo gukokinga ( gushyira amasasu mu mbunda), umwe akabona mugenzi we aravuza induru n’umwambi mu gituza wamwinjiye.
Mu gihe nawe akibaza ibibaye, akumva nawe bamufashe mpiri bambambuye imbunda bamucumita n’inkota mu gituza, abandi barimo kubaca imitwe, noneho imiriro n’urusaku rw’amasasu, rurahagarara humvikana induru z’abarimo gupfa n’abarimo guhunga batabaza.
Rwabugili n’Ingabo ze babonye ko umugambi wabo urimo kugera ku ntego, yahise asaba ingabo zose guhindura uburyo bwo kurwana, bose bagafata umurongo umwe wo kwirukankana Abanyankore barimo guhunga, ubundi bakaboherezamo urufaya rw’imyambi n’amacumu atagira ingano n’inkota zihogera bica uwo bafashe mpiri.
 Gusubira mu buryo bwa gakondo, nuko aribwo bari bamenyereye, kandi bwihuta butanahusha umuntu uhunga, kandi bari bamaze kubona ko ntawe urasa ahunga. Abanyankore barashishaga imbunda bahiye ubwoba barimo guhunga. Ikindi kandi n’ubwo Abanyarwanda bari bamaze kwambura imbunda Abanyankore, ntabwo bari bafite ubumenyi n’ubuhanga bwo kuzirashisha. Bituma bazihorera bikoreshereza ubumenyi bwabo gakondo bw’imirwano.
Amateka agaragaza ko muri icyo gitero Rwabugili yagabye mu Nkore yagitsinze mu buryo budasubirwaho, anyaga Abanyankore imbunda zigera ku Bihumbi Bibiri, ari nazo Musinga n’Ingabo ze bifashishije barwana n’Abadage nazo zikabananira, bakarashisha imiheto bakanatsindwa burundu, Abadage bagatangira gukoroniza u Rwanda.
Rwabugili n’ingabo ze barakomeje baratanya bagana mu Majyaruguru y’i Burengerazuba bw’ingoma ya Nkore, bagera ku mugezi wa “Rwizi” ubabera inzambi mu kuwambuka ngo bakurikirane inkirirahato z’Abanyankore zarokotse inzara z’umuheto w’inkotanyi cyane. Bitewe nuko ikiraro cyambuka uwo Mugezi Abanyankore bari bagiciye kugira ngo Ingabo z’u Rwanda zitabakurikira, Rwabugili nabo bari kumwe, bahise biga ubucakura bukomeye, bwo gushaka icyo batindisha uwo mugezi ngo bagomere amazi yawo babone uko bawambuka ngo bakurikirane inkirirahato z’Abanyankore.
Rwabugili wari ufite ishyaka ryinshi no kunyaruka mu mitekerereze, yahise yigira inama yo kurunda imirambo yose y’Abanyankore muri uwo mugezi ngo babakoreho ikiraro babone uko bambuka kuko ibyo gutema ibiti byari kubatinza bagasanga Abanyankore babacitse. Nuko barunda imirambo y’Abanyankore itagira ingano muri uwo mugezi wa Rwizi nk’abarunda amasiteri y’ibiti, bakora ikiraro gikomeye cyane, maze barambuka, bajya guhigisha uruhindu Umunyankore aho yari yahungiye hose.
Icyo gitero kiswe icy’Imigogo, cyabaye icyorezo mu Banyankore, cyaguyemo abatagira ingano, abamenyekanye ni umuhungu wa Ntare witwaga Rumukwe wari umutasi wa Nkore, akarashisha n’imbunda ifite amadarubindi kandi ikarasa kure.
Ingabo z’u Rwanda zikimara kumwica, Rwabugili yahise afata iyo mbunda ye, atangira kuyirashisha kugeza amasasu ashizemo. Ni imwe mu zabaye iminyago bakuye mu ngoma ya Nkore bayizana ibwami, usibye ko yahiriye mu nzu mu bihe by’intambara yo ku Rucunshu.
Abongereza barahurujwe n’Abanyankore ngo baze kubatabara, umwongereza wari ugaragiwe n’ingabo zikomeye n’intwaro nyinshi z’ikirenga, ageze i Nyagakoni Abanyankore bakunze kwita Nkoni abona imirambo y’Abanyankore inyanyagiye hirya no hino mu gihugu, ashya ubwoba, ku mutima ati “Aba bantu bishe ingabo bene aka kageni, ni nde wabikorereza?”, bahitamo kwisubirira inyuma urugamba ararureka.
Igitero cya Rwabugili yagabye muri Nkore, cyabaye inkomoko y’insigamugani n’amarenga yabaye kimomo mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, aho bagira bati “ Kanaka yagaritse ingogo” Byo kuvuga ko yishe abantu batagira ingano.
Uburyo bushya bw’imirwano uko ari butati nibwo bwatumye Abanyarwanda barushaho gutangarirwa n’Amahanga, bunatanga umusaruro ugaragara maze bagiriza Abanyankore babagusha ruhabo. Ubwo buryo burimo ubwo gukusha, kurashisha amano aribwo bakunze kwita “Kurasa umugaramirizo” no gukambakamba ushaka gufata mpiri umwanzi ngo umwambure intwaro.
Bamwe mu ngabo z’ibihangange zazengereje amahanga ku ngoma ya Rwabugili harimo Kamananga ka Sebajura umwuzukuru wa Rwakagara, warasaga umwambi ugahitana batanu, Nyamuhenda wa Kejeje, umwega w’Umuhenda, Umutekereza karundura w’ubucakura mu mirwano yo muri Nkore, Bisangwa bya Rugombituri, Umugaba w’imitwe y’Ingabo yose ku ngoma ya Rwabugili, akaba n’umuyobozi wigirira Icyizere nk’icya Sebuja Rwabugili, akaba umutware w’ingabo z’Ingangurarugo.
Hari kandi Rwanyonga rwa Mugabwambere wari umugaba w’Ingangurarugo Indwanyi idahusha wivuganye Kabego umwami wo ku Ijwi. Baramu ba Rwabugili barimo Kabare ka Rwakagara, wari umuhanga cyane mu kurwanira mu mazi mu bwato bwe bwitwaga “Imbabazi” Cyigenza cya Rwakagara watwaraga Ingoma za Rwabugili mu bwato bwitwaga ‘Ishyaka’ na Ruhinankiko wari indwanyi by’akaburarugero.

Title: Ibikoresho gakondo bya Muzika, byabicaga bigacika mu Rwanda rwo hambere
Body:
Ibihe birahita, ibindi bikaza, ariko ibyiza byabaye mu bihe byahise ntibishobora kwibagirana. Umuziki ni intwaro ikomeye yabayeho kuva muntu yagera ku isi, ikamufasha mu byishimo no mu kababaro.
Ibihe birahita, ibindi bikaza, ariko ibyiza byabaye mu bihe byahise ntibishobora kwibagirana. Umuziki ni intwaro ikomeye yabayeho kuva muntu yagera ku isi, ikamufasha mu byishimo no mu kababaro.
Abanyarwanda nabo bagiraga umuziki ubafasha kwizihirwa, bakagira ibikoresho byabo bwite bakoreshaga bacuranga ngo uwo muziki urusheho kubanogera.
Mu Rwanda rwo hambere, bagiraga ibitaramo by’ingeri eshanu, bikaba isoko y’akayunguruzo k’umutima-mutindi, umwe wa kinyamaswa, hakimakazwa umutimamana n’umutimanama mu Banyarwanda.
 Ibitaramo byakorwaga mu Rwanda rwo hambere, byarimo ibitaramo by’umuryango, Ibitaramo by’uburere mboneraagihugu, Ibitaramo nyizihizangoma, ibitaramo by’imihigo n’ibitaramo by’umuganura. Buri gitaramo cyabaga gifite abagomba kukitabira n’ibikoresho by’umuziki bigomba kwizihiza ibyo birori. Hakaba ibikoresho byakoraga mu bitaramo by’ibwami n’ibyakoreshwaga mu bitaramo byo muri rubanda.
Ibikoresho by’umuziki byo mu Rwanda rwo hambere, byari bigabanyijemo ingeri eshatu bitewe n’uko bikoreshwa kugira ngo bitange umuriri nyizihizagitaramo.
Ibikoresho by’Inyamirya: Ni ibikoresho bifite uburyo bakomaho imbarutso, bukarema imirya inyuranye kandi yirangira, ari nayo isimburana mu kwizihiza indirimbo.
Ibikoresho by’ubuhuha: Ni ibikoresho bakoreshaga mu muziki gakondo, ariko bigatanga umwirangiro ari uko bahushyemo,
Ibikoresho by’inkomangano: Ni ibikoresho byakoreshwagwa mu muziki nyarwanda, bigatanga umwirangiro, ari uko babikomyeho n’ikiganza, igititi cyangwa se ikirenge.
Izo ngeri z’ibikoresho by’umuziki nyarwanda, byabiciye bigacika zari zigizwe n’ibicurangisho bitandukanye. Muri byo hari nka:
Urusengo: Urusengo, ni kimwe mu bikoresho by’umuziki gakondo by’inyabuhuha. Kubera umuriri ntagereranywa bifite, byatumye ruba kimwe mu bikoresho mpuzamuriri by’ibwami. Gihanga aruha isumbwe rikomeye, ruba rumwe mu birango by’u Rwanda nk’ikirango cy’amahoro n’ubusabane. Urusengo rwo rugira imirya y’ishakwe , inyahura n’igihumurizo. Urusengo rwarangaga ingoma y’u Rwanda, mu bihe bya Gihanga, nirwo bitaga ‘Nyamilinga’.
Inanga: Inanga ni igikoresho cy’umuziki cya kera na kare, cyo mu bwoko bw’ibinyamirya, ni kimwe mu byahanganywe n’u Rwanda. Nk’uko yabaga mu buvanganzo nyemvugo bwo muri rubanda, ni nako n’ibwami bayikeneraga, mu bitaramo byaberaga ibwami. Inanga igira imirya irenga yitwa “imiyuki”n’inihira yitwa “imihumurizo”cyangwa se ibihumurizo.
Umurya w’inanga, ni kimwe mu byizihizaga ibitaramo bya kera, bigakesha ijoro, na n’ubu kandi, inanga ni igikoresho kitajya kiva ku gihe, aho mu bitaramo ndangamuco ariyo iba ku ruhembe rw’imbere mu kuranga u Rwanda.
Ingoma z’imisango: Ni iza kera cyane mu Rwanda, zari zifite umwanya ukomeye mu Rwanda rwo hambere. Ni kimwe mu bikoresho by’umuziki byo mu bwoko bw’inkomangano. Haba mu mbyino, mu mihamirizo, no mu yindi myidagaduro, ingoma yabaga iya mbere.
 Ingoma z’imisango, ni zimwe mu bikoresho by’umuziki gakondo, byabiciye bigacika mu bihe byo ha mbere. N’ubwo zadutse hagati mu iyubakwa ry’igihugu, zagize ibigwi by’ikirenga kuruta ibindi bikoresho mpuzamuriri. Ingoma z’imisango, arizo izi tuzi zikoreshwa mu birori zadutse ku ngoma y’umwami Cyilima I Rugwe, ahasaga mu mwaka wa 1345. Zadukanywe n’umunyamahanga Rwamuhama w’Umutoro. Mbere y’uko izo ngoma zaduka, mu Rwanda hari ubwoko bw’ Ingoma- Ngabe gusa, yari ikirango cy’igihugu.
 Ubuhanga n’ubuhangange Abanyarwanda bahaye ingoma, byatumye barema amoko yazo agera kuri 4, arushaho gutanga umwirangiro utandukanye uryoshya ibirori by’umurishyo w’ingoma. Mu moko y’ingoma harimo Ishakwe, Inyahura, Inumvu cyangwa Inumbiri n’Ibihumurizo.
Amakondera: Amakondera ni ibikoresho byakoreshwaga mu bitaramo bikomeye ndangamuco, akaba yari afite umwanya ukomeye mu bitaramo by’ibwami cyane cyane mu bitaramo by‘Intore. Ni amwe mu bikoresho by’umuziki nyarwanda by’Inyabuhuha. Amakondera akomoka ku ngoma y’umwami Rwabugili akaba yarayaramvuye i Bujinja kuri ubu habarizwa mu gihugu cya Tanzaniya.
Umuduri: Ni umwe mu bikoresho by’umuziki byakundaga gukoreshwa mu buvanganzo nyemvugo bwo muri rubanda, ni umwe mu bikoresho by’Inyamirya nk’ibikoresho mpuzamuriri bifite imirya bakoraho ikabona kwirangira nk’ Umuduri bita Umunahi cyangwa ibubura n’iningiri.
Ihembe: Ihembe ,ni igikoresho cy’umuziki kiri mu bwoko bw’Inyabuhuha, atanga umwirangiro ari uko babanje guhuhamo.Ni igikoresho mpuzamuriri cyakoreshwaga cyane mu muhamirizo w’intore, mu buvanganzo nyemvugo bw’ibwami.
Umwirongi: Ni igikoresho cy’umuziki cyamenyekanye cyane mu gukoreshwa n’abashumba mu rwuri, kikaba ikirango cy’amahoro. Iyo umushumba yahuhagamo, shebuja yahitaga yumva ko mu nama y’inka ari amahoro.
Hari n’ibindi bikoresho by’umuziki byakoreshwaga mu buryo bwihariye cyangwa se bitakundaga no gukoreshwa cyane, akaba ari nayo mpamvu nta bwamamare bifite. Muri byo twavuga nk’Ikinyuguri kijya mu mihango y’imandwa, Urujegerezo, agakoko k’inkomane kajegera bunyuguri kajya mu mihango irimo indirimbo, Urutaro rwari ikidasesa gicurangwa mu bitaramo by’akarere aka n’aka n’ibindi.

Title: Uko umunaniro wazahaje Perezida Kayibanda agashaka kwegura
Body:
Umunaniro ukabije ni imwe mu ndwara zizwi cyane izahaza abayifite ku buryo itavuwe cyangwa ngo uyirwaye yitabaze abaganga b’inzobere bamubwire icyo akora, bishobora kurangira ahatakarije ubuzima.
Umunaniro ukabije ni imwe mu ndwara zizwi cyane izahaza abayifite ku buryo itavuwe cyangwa ngo uyirwaye yitabaze abaganga b’inzobere bamubwire icyo akora, bishobora kurangira ahatakarije ubuzima.
Iyo ndwara yazahaje Perezida Grégoire Kayibanda mu myaka ya 1970 kugeza ubwo asabye kwegura ku mwanya wa Perezida ngo hashakwe umusimbura, abaminisitiri be bakabyanga.
Kayibanda yayoboye u Rwanda guhera mu 1961 kugeza mu 1973 ubwo yahirikwaga ku butegetsi na Juvénal Habyarimana wahoze ari Minisitiri we w’Ingabo.
Mu ntangiriro z’ubutegetsi bwe, ibintu byasaga n’ibigenda neza mu ishyaka rye MDR Parmehutu ndetse benshi bamubonamo icyerecyezo kizima dore ko ari we wari waranashinze iryo shyaka, nyuma yo gushyigikirwa n’Ababiligi bakaza gukuraho ubwami bwari bumaze imyaka amagana mu gihugu.
Akijya ku butegetsi, Kayibanda yatowe n’abadepite muri manda y’imyaka ine yagombaga kuzarangira mu 1965. Mu mwaka wa 1962 ubwo u Rwanda rwabonaga ubwigenge, hatowe Itegeko Nshinga, rishyiraho umubare wa manda ebyiri kuri Perezida, manda imwe ikamara imyaka ine.
Manda yatorewe mu 1961, yarangiye mu 1965 yiyamamariza indi yagombaga kurangira mu 1969 ndetse aranayitorerwa. Mu buryo bugaragara kugeza mu 1969, Kayibanda yari amaze kuyobora manda ebyiri ariko we siko yabibaraga ahubwo yumvaga ko amaze kuyobora manda imwe kuko iya mbere yatowe Itegeko Nshinga ritarajyaho kandi agatorwa n’abadepite aho kuba abaturage.
Imvururu mu ishyaka, intandaro yo gushaka kwegura
Mu 1968, mu ishyaka MDR Parmehutu ari naryo ryari ryemewe mu gihugu, ryavutsemo imvururu, bamwe mu batangiranye ishyaka na Kayibanda batangira kumwivumburaho banenga imiyoborere ye.
Mu nyandiko yo mu 2010 ya Bagaragaza Thadée wabaye umudepite akaba na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga muri Repubulika ya mbere, yagaragaje ko nyuma ya 1965; ruswa, ikimenyane n’indi myitwarire mibi yatangiye kwigaragaza mu bayobozi batandukanye ndetse no mu bucamanza, kugeza aho byavuzwe cyane bikagera no ku baturage bo hasi.
Ibintu byarushijeho kuba bibi mu 1968 ubwo bamwe mu bikomerezwa byo muri Leta ya Kayibanda byabonaga ko afite imigambi yo kwiyamamariza manda ya gatatu kandi Itegeko Nshinga ryaravugaga manda ebyiri gusa.
Muri uwo mwaka, bamwe mu badepite ba MDR Parmehutu bakoze raporo yagaragazaga imikorere mibi ya bamwe mu bayobozi bakuru b’igihugu bashaka ko bamwe begura, ku munsi wa nyuma wo kuyemeza ishyaka ritera ubwoba abadepite bayo birangira raporo batinye kuyemeza.
Igitabo kivuga ku buzima bwa Kayibanda, Toute ma Vie pour vous mes frères cyanditswe na Baudoin Paternostre, kivuga ko Itegeko Nshinga ryabuzaga Kayibanda kongera kwiyamamaza ryavuguruwe muri Gicurasi 1969 rikuraho umubare wa manda ntarengwa, ahubwo manda imwe igenerwa imyaka itanu aho kuba ine nkuko byari bisanzwe ndetse n’imyaka 60 umukandida ushaka kuba Perezida yagombaga kuba atarengeje ivanwamo.
Kuri ba bayobozi n’abarwanashyaka ba MDR Parmehutu bari bamaze kurambirwa Kayibanda, babaye nk’abakubiswe n’inkuba kuko inzozi zo kubona undi Perezida usimbura Kayibanda zari ziyoyotse.
Igitabo cya Paternostre kigira kiti “Ba bantu bakekaga ko guhererekanya ubutegetsi bishoboka cyangwa se bumvaga ko ubutegetsi bwahabwa abandi, bahise babona ko bidashoboka. Batangiye kumushinja irondakarere cyane cyane gutonesha abo baturuka mu gace kamwe ka Gitarama no mu Majyepfo y’igihugu”.
Kayibanda amaze kubona ko bamwe bashinganye ishyaka batangiye kumumenyera, yatangiye kugenda abasimbuza muri Guverinoma ashyiramo abandi bato bari barangije za Kaminuza, noneho umujinya ku bamurwanyaga urushaho kwiyongera.
Ibintu byarushijeho gukomera ubwo n’abasirikare bakuru cyane cyane abo mu bice by’Amajyaruguru batangiraga kwivumbura, bamushinja gutonesha abo bakomoka mu gace kamwe.
Kayibanda bivugwa ko muri iyo myaka ya 1969, yatangiye gucika intege no kugaragaza kwiheba kubera kubona bamwe bahoze ari inshuti ze aribo bari kumurwanya.
Paternostre ati “Hari ubwo kenshi yajyaga agira irungu ryo kuba iruhande rwe atari kumwe na ba bayobozi bakuru bahoranye, yagiye akura mu duce twabo nyuma bakagenda bamwitaza kubera ubuzima.”
Kwigunga no kwiheba kwa Kayibanda, byarakomeye biza kuvamo indwara kuko icyo gihe yasaga n’uhanganye n’ibibazo by’igihugu ariko anahanganye n’abahoze ari inshuti ze batari bakimwishimiye kubera ko yarenze ku masezerano.
