Inyandiko z’ibanga z’Ikigo cy’Ubutasi cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (CIA) zo kuwa 10 Nzeri 1970, zigaragaza ko Kayibanda yageze aho arwara indwara y’umunaniro ukabije w’ubwonko, agasaba ko yegura abaminisitiri be bakabyanga.
Iyi nyandiko igira iti “Biravugwa ko Perezida Kayibanda arwaye umunaniro akaba ari gupanga gufata ikiruhuko akajya mu Burayi. Icyifuzo cye cyo kwegura giherutse kwamaganwa n’abaminisitiri be ahubwo bamusaba kuba ashyizeho Perezida w’agateganyo.”
“Muri iyi minsi ubutegetsi bwa Kayibanda bwacitse intege cyane ku buryo aza gake mu murwa mukuru avuye mu mirima ye kandi asigaye agaragara gake mu ruhame. Ku butegetsi bwa Kayibanda, u Rwanda rwabaye nk’urutagaragara ku buryo bisa nk’aho abanyarwanda bakwishimira impinduka mu buyobozi n’iyo yaba ari inzibacyuho.”
Mu buyobozi bukuru bw’ingabo, abasirikare bo mu bice by’Amajyaruguru n’Iburengerazuba nibo bari biganje. Nabo bari baratangiye gutera umugongo Kayibanda.
Paternostre mu gitabo cye yagarutse ku munaniro Kayibanda yari asigaye agaragaza kugeza ubwo n’abasirikare buririye ku bushobozi buke yari asigaranye.
Ati “Abo basirikare bato babonye umunaniro Kayibanda yari afite n’umutima uhagaze, batangira gutekereza kureka inshingano zabo za gisirikare ahubwo bakajya mu myanya y’ubutegetsi bwa gisivile, biyumvamo uburyo bushya bwo gutuma igihugu gikomeza kujya mbere abandi bashaka kubyuririraho ku nyungu zabo bwite.”
Paternostre avuga ko mu ntangiriro za 1973, buri wese yabonaga ko impinduka z’ubutegetsi mu Rwanda ari ikintu gishoboka cyane cyane cyane hashingiwe ku matora ya Perezida n’ay’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yari ateganyijwe muri Nzeri uwo mwaka ndetse no ku mvururu zari zimaze iminsi mu gihugu, abahutu bakomeje kumenesha abatutsi mu mashuri no mu kazi kandi bigaragara ko ntacyo ubutegetsi bwa Kayibanda bukora ngo buhoshe izo mvururu.
Uko kunanirwa guhosha imvururu z’abahutu bibasiraga abatutsi, nizo Habyarimana yuririyeho ahirika Kayibanda ku butegetsi muri Nyakanga 1973 ariko bikavugwa ko ako kavuyo n’ubundi katerwaga n’abasirikare kugira ngo babone ibirego baheraho bahirika Perezida.

Title: Abakoresha ururimi rw’Ikirera bafite impungenge ko rushobora gucika
Body:
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru mu turere tuvugwamo cyane ururimi rw’Ikirera, bafite impungenge ko urwo rurimi rushobora gucika kubera ko abato batakirukoresha cyane.
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru mu turere tuvugwamo cyane ururimi rw’Ikirera, bafite impungenge ko urwo rurimi rushobora gucika kubera ko abato batakirukoresha cyane.
Nk’uko byemezwa na bamwe mu baturage batuye mu Turere dukoresha urwo rurimi rw’Ikirera nka Musanze na Burera, ngo iyo bicaye hamwe baganira muri uru rurimi bumva bisanzuye cyane bagasabana.
Nyirakagori Thacienne, umukecuru w’imyaka 72 y’amavuko utuye mu Karere ka Musanze, avuga ko ururimi bavuga rurimo Ikinyarwanda cyiza n’ubwo hari abacyumva baruvuga bakabaseka.
Yagize ati “Iyo tugeze ahantu hatari iwacu nko mu yindi Ntara, uragambaga(uravuga) bagahita bamenya aho uturuka, hari n’ibyo tugamba, ukabona badufashe nk’abanyamahanga. Nk’ubu iyo umusore yazanye umugore, tubyitaga gusohoza, mu gihe usanga hari abagamba ngo yasezeranye, yarongoye n’ibindi."
Akomeza ati " Nk’ubu ibyo bita gukubura, twe tubyitaga gukondora, iyo umubyeyi yabyaye abazwe, twe tuvuga ko yashyizwe ku ndiga kuko icyo abandi bitaga icyuma tukita indiga. Iyo turi hamwe dukoresha Ikirera cyacu tuba twisanzuye kandi twumva ari Ikinyarwanda cy’umwimerere"
Munyazikwiye Rabani we yagize ati “Ubu iyo nganiriye n’umuntu nkumva ururimi agamba(avuga) mpita menya aho akomoka, nkamenya ngo akomoka mu Nduga, ku Gisenyi n’ahandi. Dukunze kugamba twongeraho Ga, nka ndabiryaga, amazi garabuze. Guhamagara umuntu tugamba kwakura umuntu n’ibindi, ubundi iki ni Ikinyarwanda cyumvikana"
N’ubwo bavuga ko guhurira ku rurimi rwabo gakondo rw’Ikirera bituma bumva bisanzuye, ngo haracyari bimwe mu bimenyetso bibagaragariza ko rushobora kuzacika burundu, birimo kuba abana babakomokaho basigaye bagira ipfunwe ryo kurukoresha, aho biga ku mashuri bitewe n’uko hari bagenzi babo babaseka.
Ibi ngo bituma iyo babasetse bagerageza kugorora imvugo y’abo bigana bagenzi babo, bigatuma noneho barwica kurushaho. Ikindi ngo ni uko kuba haragiye haza gutura abantu baturutse mu zindi Ntara, nabyo ari kimwe mu byatumye ururimi rwabo rukendera, bikaba bibateye impungenge ko ururimi rwabo rushobora gusigara mu bakuze gusa, naho mu rubyiruko rukibagirana, kandi ariho bakagombye kurubungabungira.
Ibi kandi babihuza no kuba ngo ntaho wasanga rwigishwa, cyangwa ngo rube rufite aho rwanditse mu bitabo, ibintu ngo babona ko kubungabunga ururimi rwabo bitakoroha na gato, bagasaba ko rwahabwa agaciro yaba mu nyandiko, kurwigisha mu mashuri n’ibindi.
Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco (RALC) iherutse gutangaza ko indimi shami zishamikiye ku Kinyarwanda nk’Ikigoyi, Ikirera n’izindi, zikwiye kwitabwaho kuko ari umutungo w’Igihugu ushobora no kugira akamaro mu rwego rwo gukungahaza Ikinyarwanda.
RALC ivuga ko izo ndimi shami ari nk’ikigega cyajya cyitabazwa mu kongera andi magambo mu Kinyarwanda aho kujya kuyatira mu ndimi z’amahanga.
Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco itangaza ko ifite ikigega cy’amagambo ibihumbi 97 akoreshwa mu myuga inyuranye aho kigenda gikurwamo amagambo ashyirwa mu nkoranyamagambo.

Title: Itandukaniro ry’imitako gakondo y’Abanyarwanda bo hambere n’icyo yabaga isobanuye
Body:
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Inzu Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda giherutse kumurika igitabo gikubiyemo Ingeri z’Imitako Gakondo yakoreshwaga n’Abanyarwanda mu gihe cyo hambere bagamije kongerera ubwiza ikintu runaka bawutatseho.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Inzu Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda giherutse kumurika igitabo gikubiyemo Ingeri z’Imitako Gakondo yakoreshwaga n’Abanyarwanda mu gihe cyo hambere bagamije kongerera ubwiza ikintu runaka bawutatseho.
Icyo gitabo gikubiyemo imitako igera ku 137 y’ubwoko butandukanye cyasohotse mu 2019; buri umwe ufite umwihariko wawo bitewe n’imiterere, uburyo ukoze n’amabara awugize.
Benshi bayizi ku izina ry’Imigongo ariko nk’uko bigaragara muri icyo gitabo cyitwa "Ingeri z’Imitako Gakondo" iyo mitako yose ntabwo yitwa imigongo ahubwo imigongo nayo ni bumwe mu bwoko bw’imitako.
Nk’uko bigaragara muri icyo gitabo harimo imitako yitwa Umwashi, Amababa y’Intashya, Umuhigo, Igitoki, Amanyamanza, Ibaba, Itangaza, Ibigobe by’uruzi, Inyemera n’Akarizo k’ingwe.
Hari kandi Ishobe, Igembe, Igishyamirane, Basangira, Intege z’Abasaza, Imikako, Ingondo, Umugongo w’Inzovu, Ibigobe by’Uruzi, Ubusonga, Itangaza n’iyindi.
Umushakashatsi mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Inzu Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda akaba ari na we wayoboye itsinda ry’abanditse icyo gitabo, Ntagwabira André, yavuze ko bacyanditse bafite intego eshatu arizo gusigasira amateka, kuyarinda no kuyamenyesha abakiri bato.
Yasobanuye ko iyo mitako n’ubu ikoreshwa kandi ibisobanuro byayo bitahindutse ahubwo ikigamijwe ari ukugira ngo hatazagira abayiyitirira cyangwa bakayivangira bagatuma ita umwimerere wayo.
Ati “Iyi mitako n’ubu iracyakoreshwa kandi ibisobanuro byayo biracyari bya bindi n’ubwo benshi batakibimenya.”
Muri yo yasobanuye igera ku 10 avuga n’akamaro kayo ahereye k’uwitwa ‘Ibaba’ avuga ko ari umutako gakondo ushushe nk’icyubi cy’inyoni iguruka ari nayo mpamvu wahawe iryo zina.
Naho ‘Itangaza’ yavuze ko ari umutako ufite imvano ku ijambo rikomoka ku nshinga ‘gutangaza’ isobanura gushimisha cyangwa kureshya abareba, gutamuruka kw’ahantu hatabonaga cyangwa mu gitondo.
Ati “Mu yandi magambo, uyu mutako witwa itangaza kubera ko utangaza abawubonye.”
Umutako witwa ‘Igishyamirane’ ufite inkomoko ku ijambo igishyamirane rikomoka ku nshinga ‘gushyama’ bisobanura kwibanga kw’inka ishaka kurwana cyangwa kwica umuntu. Uyu mutako witwa igishyamirane kubera ko ushushe nk’amahembe y’ibimasa bishyamiranye.
Undi mutako gakondo witwa ‘Inyemera’ cyangwa ‘Impala’ wibutsa uko inyamaswa y’impala iba imeze mu kirere iyo yiruka isimbuka cyane.
Hari kandi uwitwa ‘Ibigobe by’uruzi’ ukomoka ku ijambo ikigobe (ibigobe mu bwinshi) rivuga igice cy’uruzi cyangwa ikiyaga cyinjira mu butaka.
Ntagwabira ati “Ibigobe by’uruzi rero ni ahantu uruzi rwaremye ibigonzi. Umutako gakondo witwa utyo wahawe iryo zina kubera ko imisusire yawo yibutsa ibigonzi by’uruzi.”
Umutako gakondo w’Abanyarwanda witwa ‘Akarizo k’ingwe’ wakomotse kuri iyo nyamaswa y’inkazi iba mu ishyamba. Igira umurizo muremure uhora uberamye kandi umutwe wawo uhese ureba hejuru. Uwo mutako nawo uba ari muremure, uberamye kandi uhese.
Iyo miterere yawo isa n’iy’umurizo w’iyo nyamaswa niyo ituma bawita akarizo k’ingwe.
Muri icyo gitabo harimo n’umutako gakondo witwa ‘Ishobe’ bikomoka ku nshinga ‘gushoberwa’ isobanura kujya mu kaga ukananirwa kukivanamo. Wahawe iryo zina kubera ko ugoranye kuwukora. Ntagwabira ati “Umutako w’ishobe ugoranye gukora kurusha indi witwa iryuzuye cyangwa ishobe ryuzuye.”
Undi mutako ni uwitwa ‘Igitoke’ kuko ufite ishusho isa n’iseri ry’igitoke gifite amabere manini.
Hari kandi n’umutako witwa ‘Inkora y’Abahigi’; mu rurimi rw’Ikinyarwanda, ijambo inkora risobanura ikirari cy’ahantu haciye itsinda ry’abantu, amatungo cyangwa inyamaswa.
Uwo mutako ugaragaza ishusho y’ikirari kuko ari umurongo uvunaguye ariko ukomeza guhera ku ruhande rumwe rw’igikoresho utatseho kugeza ku rundi.
Umutako wundi ugaragara muri icyo gitabo cy’abashakashatsi ni ‘Umutweka’ ukomoka ku myenda y’Abadage.
Izina itweka rikomoka ku ijambo umutweka bisobanura ubwoko bw’imyenda yadukanywe n’Abadage mu Rwanda mbere ya 1916. Kuri iyo myenda habagaho amabara afite impande enye; abanyabugeni n’abanyabukorikori b’Abanyarwanda bagakora imitako isa nayo bayigana, iyo mitako ikitwa itweka. Umutako w’itweka urimo ubwoko bwitwa ishobe.
Umushakashatsi mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Inzu Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda, Ntagwabira André, yavuze ko igitabo gikubiyemo iyo mitako n’ibisobanuro byayo bacyanditse mu gihe cy’umwaka umwe ari itsinda ry’abashakashatsi barindwi.
Yasobanuye ko n’ubwo icyo gitabo gikubiyemo imitako 137 hari indi bavumbuye nyuma bityo bakaba nayo bateganya kuyishyira mu kindi gitabo bazandika.
Kugeza ubu Akarere ka Nyanza kafashe umwanzuro wo kurimbisha inzu n’inyubako ziri mu Mujyi wa Nyanza hagamijwe kwimakaza isuku no kugaragaza ko aho hantu ari igicumbi cy’umuco kuva hambere.
Inkuru wasoma: Ikigo cy’Inzu Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda cyamuritse igitabo gikubiyemo ingeri z’imitako gakondo

Title: Imiterere y’amasano y’ibanze ya Kinyarwanda
Body:
Amasano ya Kinyarwanda ni amwe mu ashobora kuzimira hatabayeho uburyo bunoze bwo kuyigisha abakiri bato ngo nabo bazayahereze abo bazabyara.
Amasano ya Kinyarwanda ni amwe mu ashobora kuzimira hatabayeho uburyo bunoze bwo kuyigisha abakiri bato ngo nabo bazayahereze abo bazabyara.
Kubera kwinjirirwa n’indimi z’amahanga, amasano nyarwanda agenda atakara, ugasanga aho kwita umuntu ‘Mama wacu’ abana baramwita Tante cyangwa Aunt, mubyara wawe ngo ni ‘cousin’ n’ibindi.
Ubusanzwe mu muco nyarwanda umwana yakuraga azi amasano n’abo mu muryango akomokamo bikamufasha kumenya uko yitwara kuri buri wese, ibyo aziririjwe kumukorera n’ibindi.
Ibyo kandi byajyanaga n’umuco, ku buryo ayo masano yageraga no ku gushyingirwa, hakaba abo umuco wemerera umuntu kuba yashyingiranwa na we n’abo bibujijwe rwose.
Mu muco nyarwanda habamo ubwoko bubiri bw’amasano, aya bugufi n’aya kure. Akenshi ahabwaga umwanya ukomeye ni aya bugufi nubwo hari n’aho aya kure yarebwagaho cyane.
Mu masano ya bugufi, hazaga data, uwo akaba ari umubyeyi w’umugabo. Mama, ni umubyeyi w’umugore. Mu yandi ya bugufi hari:
Mama wacu: Ni umuvandimwe wa Mama w’igitsina-gore. Iyi sano ishobora kugera no kwa ba Sewabo wa Mama.
 Data wacu: Ni umuvandimwe wa Data w’igitsina-gabo. Iyi sano ishobora kugera no ku kwa ba Se wabo wa Data.
Masenge: Ni umuvandimwe wa Data w’Igitsina-gore (Mushiki wa Data). Iyi sano ishobora kugera no kwa ba Se wabo wa Data.
Marume: Ni umuvandimwe wa Mama w’igitsina-gabo (Musaza wa Mama). Iyi sano ishobora kugera no kwa ba Se wabo wa Mama.
 Sogokuru: Ni umubyeyi w’igitsina-gabo ubyara Data cyangwa se Mama. Iyi sano ishobora kugera no ku bavukana na we kugera no kwa ba Sewabo.
Nyogokuru: Ni umubyeyi w’igitsina-gore ubyara Data cyangwa se Mama. Iyi sano ishobora kugera no ku bavukana na we kugera no kwa ba Se wabo.
Mushiki wanjye: Ni uwo tuvukana duhuje ababyeyi bombi w’igitsina-gore, ashobora no kuba avuka ku mwihariko wa Mama cyangwa se wa Data, ni ukuvuga tudasangiye ababyeyi bombi. Undi ushobora guhabwa iyo sano, ni uw’igitsina-gore ukomoka ku bavandimwe ba Mama b’igitsina-gore cyangwa se abavandimwe ba Data b’igitsina-gabo.
Musaza wanjye: Ni uwo tuvukana duhuje ababyeyi bombi w’igitsina-gabo, ashobora no kuba avuka ku mwihariko wa Mama cyangwa se wa Data, ni ukuvuga tudasangiye ababyeyi bombi. Undi ushobora guhabwa iyo sano,ni uw’igitsina-gabo ukomoka ku bavandimwe ba Mama b’igitsina-gore cyangwa se abavandimwe ba Data b’igitsina-gabo.
Murumuna wanjye:  Ni uwo tuvukana duhuje ababyeyi bombi, ariko muruta ubukuru, ashobora no kuba avuka ku mwihariko wa Mama cyangwa se wa Data, ni ukuvuga tudasangiye ababyeyi bombi. Undi ushobora guhabwa iyo sano, ni uw’igitsina-gabo ukomoka ku bavandimwe ba Mama b’igitsina-gore cyangwa se abavandimwe ba Data b’igitsina-gabo, ariko muruta ubukuru, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Mukuru wanjye: Ni uwo tuvukana duhuje ababyeyi bombi, ashobora no kuba avuka ku mwihariko wa Mama cyangwa se wa Data, ni ukuvuga tudasangiye ababyeyi bombi. Undi ushobora guhabwa iyo sano, ni uw’igitsina-gabo ukomoka ku bavandimwe ba Mama b’igitsina-gore cyangwa se abavandimwe ba Data b’igitsina-gabo ariko anduta ubukuru, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo). Iyo Sano ikoreshwa kandi ku bakomoka kwa Data wacu cyangwa se kwa Mama wacu, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Mukuru wanjye wo kwa Mama wacu: Ni umuvandimwe unduta ubukuru, ariko akomoka kwa kwa Mama wacu, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Mukuru wanjye wo kwa Data wacu: Ni umuvandimwe nduta ubukuru, ariko akomoka kwa kwa Data wacu, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Murumuna wanjye wo kwa Mama wacu: Ni umuvandimwe nduta ubukuru, ariko akomoka kwa kwa Mama wacu, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Murumuna wanjye wo kwa Data wacu: Ni umuvandimwe nduta ubukuru, ariko akomoka kwa kwa Data wacu, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Amasano ya kure-kuziguye
Muramu wawe: Ni umuvandimwe w’umugore wawe, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gabo na gore). Iyi sano ishobora kugera no kwa ba Se wabo w’umugore wawe. Iyi sano kandi abayifitanye ni abo muva inda imwe bose b’ibitsina byombi.
Muramukazi wawe: Ni umuntu w’igitsina –gore uva inda imwe n’umugabo wawe, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku gitsina gore gusa. Iyi sano ishobora kugera no kwa ba Sewabo w’umugabo wawe. Iyi sano kandi aba ayifitanye n’abo muva inda imwe bose b’ibitsina byombi.
Mubyara wawe: Ni umukobwa cyangwa se umuhungu uvuka kwa Nyokorome cyangwa se kwa Nyogosenge. Iyo sano ishobora no kugera ku bisanira byo kwa ba Sewabo wa Nyokorome cyangwa se cyangwa wa Nyogosenge.
Amasano ya kure kutaziguye
Umwinjira: Ni umugabo washatse mama wawe nyuma y’urupfu rwa So, ariko akamutungira mu rugo rwa So. Iyo amutwaye iwe, aba yabaye umugore we undi ari umugabe.
Icyo gihe abana babyaranye bose baba ari abavandimwe bawe, musangiye amaraso ya mama wawe.
Mukeba wa mama wawe: Ni undi mugore wa So cyangwa se uwo babyaranye. Abana abyaye baba bafitanye isano ya hafi na we. Iyi sano na none igera no ku bagore ba Baramu bawe.
Musanzire wa So: Ni umuntu w’igitsina gabo washatse mu muryango umwe na So (agashaka Nyokowanyu), muri make abagore babo bavukana. Bakunze no kubita “Abendahamwe”. Abana bamuvutseho muba mufitanye isano ya bugufi.
Mukaso: Ni umugore wa Kabiri wa So, ashobora kuba yaramushatse umugore we wa mbere yarapfuye cyangwa se akiriho. Icyo gihe abana babyaranye bose baba ari abavandimwe bawe, musangiye amaraso kuri So.
Sobukwe: Ni umugabo ubyara uwo mwashakanye, iyi nyito ikoreshwa n’ibitsina byombi. Iyi Sano irakomeza ikazagera no ku bo bavukana no kubo bava inda imwe kwa Se wabo.
Nyokobukwe: Ni umugore ubyara uwo mwashakanye, iyi nyito ikoreshwa n’ibitsina byombi. Iyi Sano irakomeza ikazagera no ku bo bavukana no ku bo bava inda imwe kwa Se wabo.
Umukwe: Ni umugabo washatse umukobwa wawe. Iyi sano irakomeza ikagera no ku bo bavukana, ndetse ikazagera no ku bashatse n’abakobwa ubereye Se wabo cyangwa Nyinawabo.
Umukazana: Ni umugore washatswe n’umuhungu wawe. Iyi sano irakomeza ikagera no ku bo bavukana ndetse ikazagera no ku bashatswe n’abagabo ubereye Se wabo cyangwa Nyinawabo.

Title: Zimwe mu ngeso zibangamiye ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda muri iki gihe
Body:
Ubukwe ni intangiriro y’ishingwa ry’umuryango, ukaba icyizere ku gukomeza kwaguka kw’igihugu kuko abashyingiwe baba bitezweho kwibaruka, bakarerera neza igihugu kigakomeza kubaho no gutera imbere.
Ubukwe ni intangiriro y’ishingwa ry’umuryango, ukaba icyizere ku gukomeza kwaguka kw’igihugu kuko abashyingiwe baba bitezweho kwibaruka, bakarerera neza igihugu kigakomeza kubaho no gutera imbere.
Uko iminsi ishira indi igataha, ikoranabuhanga rikomeza kwiyongera imico ikagenda ihura, bikoroha gutira no kwigana iby’abandi. Ibi hari ubwo bishora Abanyarwanda mu rwiganwa rudafite ubushishozi, mu itira ritagira ishingiro no mu ngeso zihutaza indangagaciro na kirazira by’umuco nyarwanda.
Kugeza ubu hari ingeso zisa n’izinjiye muri bamwe mu rubyiruko rw’iki gihe, ku buryo hari impungenge ko izo ngeso zishobora kugira ingaruka ku ishingwa ry’ingo mu minsi iri imbere nubwo hari n’aho byatangiye kwigaragaza.
Igitabo ‘Ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda, 2018’ cy’Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’muco, (RALC) , kigaragaza ko muri izo ngeso mbi harimo nko kuryamana mbere yo gushyingirwa, kutagira isoni zo kuryamana n’abakubyaye cyangwa abo ubyaye, icyo ubu abantu bita ubupfubuzi n’ubutinganyi.
Ubusambanyi 
RALC igaragaza ko mu bihugu by’amahanga, akenshi umusore n’inkumi bakundana kuryamana ntacyo biba bitwaye kuri bo. Ni imico yabo mu bihugu byabo, ifite aho ikomoka.
Bitewe n’iterambere ryaba iry’ikoranabuhanga n’itangazamakuru ry’ibyo bihugu, izo ngeso zatangiye kwinjira mu baturage b’ahandi ku isi cyane cyane urubyiruko.
RALC ivuga ko ibyo bigira ingaruka ku myumvire y’abateganya kurushinga nko gutinyuka ibyo batinyaga birebana n’ubukwe.
Akamenyero ko kuryamana mbere yo kubana byemewe n’amategeko gaturuka ku mibereho urubyiruko rw’ubu rubamo yo kwibana no kuba kure y’imiryango yabo. Abana batangira kubana umunsi ku wundi, ku mashuri bakiri mu gihe cy’ubwangavu n’ubugimbi, kugeza biga amashuri ya za kaminuza bakibana. Na nyuma y’amashuri urubyiruko rukomeza kwibana mu kazi.
Mu gitabo, RALC ivuga ko umusore n’inkumi bagera igihe cyo kubana baranyuze mu buzima bwinshi butuma bisanzuranaho kandi bigasa nk’aho nta cyo bitwaye kuryamana ku bitwa ko bakundana. Bagera igihe cyo kubana, abenshi mu bakobwa baratwaye inda bigatuma bakora ubukwe buhutiyeho.
Gupfubura
Indi myitwarire idahwitse ibangamira ubukwe, RALC ivuga ko ari iya bamwe mu bakuze bashukisha urubyiruko amafaranga, impano n’ibindi bintu bifite agaciro bagamije kurushora mu busambanyi.
Ibi bigaragarira ku bagabo bakuze bitwa shugadadi (Sugar daddy) n’abagore bitwa shugamami (Sugar Mummy). Mu muryango nyarwanda birasanzwe ko abantu bakuru bashyikirana n’abato ariko hakabaho imipaka igenga kubahana no gukurikiza amahame ngengamyitwarire y’umuco w’Igihugu.
Gusa uko iminsi ihita, hari bamwe mu bakuze barengera bakagirana imishyikirano idakwiye n’urubyiruko kugeza barushoye mu ngeso mbi z’ubusambanyi.
Ingeso y’ubusambanyi hagati y’abakuze n’abato kandi ntisigana n’indi yo gupfubura, aho umugore utanyuzwe n’umugabo we mu gihe cy’imibonano mpuzabitsina hari ubwo ashaka undi mugabo yishyura akamukemurira icyo kibazo.
Uwo mugabo cyangwa umusore wishyurwa azwi ku izina ry’“umupfubuzi” cyangwa “umwunganizi”. Ni ingeso itavugwa cyane ariko iriho ndetse hari bamwe mu basore bagiye biyemerera ku mugaragaro ko bahoze ari abapfubuzi.
Mu nama nyunguranabitekerezo yabaye mu Ukuboza 2018 yahuje abayobozi b’inzego za Leta n’abafatanyabikorwa yigaga ku bibazo bibangamiye umuryango nyarwanda no kwihutisha iterambere rishingiye ku muryango utekanye, Depite Nizeyimana Pie yasabye Guverinoma kugira igikorwa ubupfubuzi bukarwanywa nk’uburaya kuko busenya imiryango.
Ubwo RALC yakoraga ubushakashatsi ku bukwe bwa Kinyarwanda, Abanyarwanda bifuje ko hajyaho amategeko ahana abantu biyandarika cyangwa bakora imirimo y’urukozasoni, ari uburaya ndetse n’ubupfubuzi.
Izi ngeso zigira ingaruka ku bukwe bwa Kinyarwanda kubera ko nko kuryamana k’umusore n’umukobwa mbere yo kubana byemewe n’amategeko, bituma bakora ubukwe buhutiweho kubera ko hari ubwo umukobwa aba yaratwaye inda. Ibyo ubwabyo bishobora kugabanya ubwizerane hagati y’abashakanye kuko hari ubwo umwe na nyuma yo kubana akomeza gutekereza ko mugenzi we yamucaga inyuma.
Mu gihe umusore yishoye mu bupfubuzi biragoye ngo atekereze kubyo gushinga urugo kubera ko aba abona ibyo akeneye byose bitamugoye. Uwabaye umupfubuzi yubatse na we, nta cyizere ko azakomeza kwita ku muryango we.
No ku bakobwa cyangwa abagore ni uko, harimo abahitamo kwibana kubera ko baba bumva bihagije batifuza kugorwa n’umugabo n’amahame y’umuco agenga abashakanye.
Umugore wishoye mu bapfubuzi afite umugabo nabwo urugo ruba rusa nk’urwubatse ku manga, kuko iyo bimenyekanye bibyara amakimbirane yo mu muryango. Umugore wagiye mu gupfuburwa kandi biragoye ngo atekereze indi mishinga iteza urugo rwe imbere.

Title: Umwihariko w’umugenzo wo gukirana wakorwaga n’abageni nyuma yo gushyingirwa
Body:
Ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda hambere, bwari imbumbe y’ibikorwa byinshi bitandukanye ariko byuzuzanya bigamije gusigasira umuco n’indangagaciro z’umuryango nyarwanda, hubakwa urugo rushya ruzibaruka amaboko azubaka igihugu.
Ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda hambere, bwari imbumbe y’ibikorwa byinshi bitandukanye ariko byuzuzanya bigamije gusigasira umuco n’indangagaciro z’umuryango nyarwanda, hubakwa urugo rushya ruzibaruka amaboko azubaka igihugu.
Gukirana ni umwe mu migenzo yakorwaga n’abageni bo hambere, bigakorwa mbere yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina bwa mbere babaye umugabo n’umugore.
Bwari uburyo umugeni yakoreshaga, akabanza kwiyima umugabo we mu gihe bagiye kubonana bwa mbere.
Mu gihe umukobwa agiye gushyingirwa, iwabo bamuzanaga bitwaje amavuta mu giseke, bagera ku mukwe bakayasiga umukobwa wabo ari menshi ari byo bitaga gutotobeka kugira ngo umugabo we namufata intoki ze zinyerere.
Mu muco nyarwanda cyaraziraga ko umukobwa ahita yemera kubonana n’umugabo kuko bari gukeka ko asanzwe yiyandarika. Babanzaga gukirana, umukobwa akanga ko babonana, ariko akurikije impanuro yabaga yabanje guhabwa na nyirasenge, yazaga kwemera nyuma.
Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco, RALC mu gitabo “Ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda, 2018”, igaragaza ko hari ibice bimwe by’Igihugu nko mu Bugesera, aho byari ishema ku mukobwa ko ananira umusore, akazamwemerera ko babonana ari uko abanje kugira icyo amugabira nk’itungo cyangwa umurima.
 Icyo kintu yahabwaga kuko yananiye umugabo cyabaga ari icye bwite n’iyo yasendwaga yarakijyanaga.
Nubwo umugeni yabanzaga kunanira umugabo, yazaga kugera aho akemera bakaryamana ku nshuro ya mbere.
Ni umugenzo mu myumvire umuntu ashobora gukeka ko ntacyo wari umaze kubera ko n’ubundi umugeni yabaga yamaze gushyingirwa atari busubire iwabo ariko wari ufite igisobanuro gikomeye mu muco.
Kuba umugeni yarabanzaga kunanira umugabo, byahaga icyizere umugabo we ko nta ngeso mbi yigeze ajyamo kandi ko n’undi wese uzashaka kumufata ku ngufu atazabigeraho.
Mu gitondo, iwabo w’umukobwa bashakaga inzoga n’ipfukire bakabijyana iwabo w’umukwe bakajya kurisha umugeni kuko yabaga anywa amata gusa cyangwa arya duke cyane kuko kugira umutima n’isoni byamubuzaga kugira icyo arya. Ab’iwabo ni bo bazaga kumumara isoni, bakamusangiza n’umugabo we.

Title: Ikigo cy’Inzu Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda cyamuritse igitabo gikubiyemo ingeri z’imitako gakondo
Body:
Hagamijwe kubungabunga amateka y’u Rwanda no kuyasigasira, Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Inzu Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda cyamuritse ku mugaragaro igitabo gikubiyemo Ingeri z’Imitako Gakondo.
Hagamijwe kubungabunga amateka y’u Rwanda no kuyasigasira, Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Inzu Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda cyamuritse ku mugaragaro igitabo gikubiyemo Ingeri z’Imitako Gakondo.
Ni igikorwa cyabereye mu Ngoro Ndangamurage igaragaza amateka y’Ibwami iri mu Rukari mu Karere ka Nyanza.
Umuyobozi Mukuru Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda, Amb. Masozera Robert, yavuze ko bahisemo kwandika icyo gitabo no kugishyira hanze kugira ngo amateka y’u Rwanda abungwabungwe atazazimira.
Ati “Noneho turavuga ngo reka dukore igitabo twegeranye amabara y’imitako gakondo yose dukore urutonde rwayo noneho tubyandikishe; byandikwe mu murage ukwiye kubungwabungwa byihutirwa kugira ngo abawiyitirira cyangwa abashaka kuwukoresha mu buryo budakuriije amategeko bajye babanza nibura babisabire uruhushya.”
Imitako gakondo ikubiye muri icyo gitabo igera ku 136; benshi bayizi ku izina ry’Imigongo ariko nk’uko byasobanuwe yitwa “Imitako Gakondo” kuko imigongo ahubwo nayo ari bumwe mu bwoko bw’imitako.
Amwe mu mazina yayo twavuga ni Amababa y’Intashya; Umuhigo; Umwashi; Igitoki; Intege z’abasaza; Itweka; Amaso y’Inuma; Iraza; Ingeembe; Ibigobe by’Uruzi; Akarizo k’Ingwe; Umugore wishe Inzu.
Harimo kandi iyitwa Amanyamanza; Umwashi; Ibishyamirane; Basangira; Imikako; Ingondo; Umugongo w’Inzovu; Ubusonga; Itangaza; n’iyindi.
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Karere ka Nyanza bari bitabiriye imurikwa ry’icyo gitabo bavuze ko ari igikorwa cyiza kizabafasha kubungabunga amateka ndetse by’umwihariko bakayifashisha mu kurimbisha umujyi wabo.
Uwihinema Béatrice ati “Ibi ni ugusigasira umuco wacu kugira ngo udacika n’abana bazabashe kuwukurikirana; nibabona ibi bazabibaza ababyeyi babasobanurire ko ari umuco nyarwanda. Ibi birakwiye kugira ngo abana bacu badafata iby’inzaduka bakibagirwa iby’iwabo.”
Musengimana Gérard nawe yagize ati “Nyanza ni igicumbi cy’amateka; ubu birumvikana ko tugiye kubyitaho cyane kuko twatangiye no gutaka inzu zacu mu mujyi dukoresheje iyi mitako gakondo.”
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyanza, Ntazinda Erasme, yavuze ko mu gukomeza guharanira ko iyo mitako gakondo itazima bahisemo kuyifashisha mu gusukura mujyi bashyigikira ko Nyanza iba igicumbi cy’umuco.
Yavuze ko nk’ubuyobozi bazakomeza gutoza abaturage gukoresha neza iyo mitako gakondo birinda kuyivangavanga uko biboneye.

Title: Amateka y’u Bungwe bw’Abenengwe, kimwe mu bihugu byabimburiye ibindi mu Rwanda
Body:
U Bungwe ni kimwe mu bihugu byahozeho mu Rwanda, dore ko ari kimwe mu bya mbere byahanzwe u Rwanda rutaritwa u Rwanda tuzi ubu, kikaba igihugu cy’igihangange kuko cyageraga no mu Burundi bw’ubu.
U Bungwe ni kimwe mu bihugu byahozeho mu Rwanda, dore ko ari kimwe mu bya mbere byahanzwe u Rwanda rutaritwa u Rwanda tuzi ubu, kikaba igihugu cy’igihangange kuko cyageraga no mu Burundi bw’ubu.
Igihugu cy’u Bungwe cyahanzwe ahasaga mu mwaka wa 300 mu kibariro cy’ibihe byacu. Umwami uzwi mu mateka y’u Bungwe mu gihe cy’umwaduko w’ingoma Nyiginya ni uwitwa Rwamba.
Ibitabo “mizi y’u Rwanda”, umutumba wa mbere ndetse n’igitabo “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro’’ byombi by’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, bigaragaza ko u Bungwe bwari igihugu kitisukirwa, benecyo bari barahaye akabyiniriro k’u Bungwe bw’Abenengwe.
Abami batwaye igihugu cy’u Bungwe, kugeza gitsindwa n’u Rwanda barimo Mungwe, Mungwe, Karama, Rwamba, Samukende na Rubuga. Ingoma Ngabe y’u Bungwe nk’ikirango cy’igihugu cyabo yari “Nyamibande”.
U Bungwe nicyo gihugu cyahanzwe mu bya mbere, mu bihugu byari bigize u Rwanda. Icyo gihugu cyagengwaga n’Abenengwe bakura igisekuruza cyabo kuri Mungwe (Muntu Ngwe) wari murumuna wa Rurenge umukurambere w’Abasinga b’Abasangwabutaka wahanze igihugu cy’u Budaha n’u Bwishaza.
U Bungwe cyari igihugu kibumbye uturere dutandatu. Muri two hari u Busanza bw’Amajyepfo, kuri bu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Ndora, Mamba, Gishubi, Kibilizi na Muganza yo mu Karere ka Gisagara.
U Busanza bw’Amajyaruguru nabwo bwari akarere k’ingoma y’u Bungwe. Kuri ubu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Maraba, Simbi, Ruhashya, Rusatira na Mbazi yo mu Karere ka Huye, ndetse n’Imirenge ya Save, Musha na Gikonko yo mu Karere ka Gisagara.
U Bufundu bwari akarere k’ingoma y’u Bungwe, kuri bu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Tare, Kamegeri, Kitabi, Uwinkingi, Buruhukiro, Kibirizi, Musebeye, Kibumbwe, Mbazi na Cyanika yo mu Karere ka Nyamagabe
Mu turere twari tugize igihugu cy’u Bungwe harimo n’Akarere ka Nyaruguru. Kuri bu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Rusenge, Mata, Ruramba na Kibeho yo mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, ukongeraho imirenge ya Gishamvu, Huye, Karama, Ngoma, Tumba na Mukura yo mu Karere ka Huye
Akandi karere kabarirwaga mu ngoma y’u Bungwe ni Bashumba-Nyakare. Kuri ubu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Ngera, Nyagisozi na Ngoma yo mu Karere ka Nyarugururu, ukongeraho n’imirenge ya Nyanza, Kigembe, Mukindo, Mugombwa na Kansi yo mu Karere ka Gisagara.
Akarere k’u Buyenzi nako kari kamwe mu tugize igihugu cy’u Bungwe. Kuri bu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Kivu, Muganza, Nyabimata, Ruheru, Busanze, Munini na Cyahinda yo mu Karere ka Nyaruguru.
Igihugu cy’u Bungwe, cyagengwaga n’ibikomangoma by’Abenengwe, ikirangamuryango cyabo cyari Ingwe . Umwami wariho ubwo Ingoma Nyiginya y’ i Gasabo yadukaga yitwaga Rwamba ari na we wa mbere wafashe umukobwa we Nyirampirangwe akamushyingira Gihanga Ngomijana, wagengaga ingoma y’i Gasabo akamubera umukwe.
Rwamba yari atuye muri Nyakizu ni ukuvuga, gakondo nkuru yabo, ari nayo yabaye ibimburiro ry’ihangwa ry’icyo gihugu cyahanzwe na Mungwe watuye mu Bisi bya Nyakibanda (Ubu ni mu Karere ka Huye mu Murenge wa Gishamvu).
Undi Mwenengwe wategekaga igihugu cye kugeza gitsindwa n’ingoma Nyiginya ni Rubuga rwa Samukende, umuhungu wa Benginzage bakunze kwita Nyagakecuru na Samukende bo mu Bisi bya Huye.
Abenengwe nibo bambutse uruzi rw’Akanyaru, bajya guhanga ibihugu byabo i Ngozi-Kayanza mu Burundi. Abenengwe baje mu Bungwe basanga igihugu kikiri amashyaba ya kimeza, baragitema, baragikonda kugeza bakigize igihugu gituwe.
Mu bihe by’iyaguka ry’u Rwanda, ubwo ibitero byo kwagura igihugu no kugihuza, uturere twaremaga ingoma y’u Bungwe twaremye ingoma bitaga ingoma z’abiyunze . Abazitwaraga bari bameze nk’Abatware b’uduce (zone) zabaga zifatanyije uturere tubiri mu rwego rwo gukaza umurengo no kongera imbaraga mu butegetsi bwabo, kugira ngo igihugu cy’u Rwanda cyabicaga bigacika muri ibyo bihe, kitazapfa kubavogera.
Iyo ngoma y’Abiyunze y’u Bungwe yari igizwe n’u Busanza bwa Nkuba ya Bagumana ( watwaraga u Busanza bw’Epfo n’ubwa Ruguru), u Bufundu bwa Rubuga rwa Kagogo ( watwaraga u Bufundu n’u Buyenzi), n’u Bungwe bwa Rubuga rwa Samukende ( bwari bugizwe na Bahumba-Nyakare na Nyaruguru).
Mu bice bikurikira, tuzabatekerereza indunduro y’ingoma y’u Bungwe.

Title: Dr Kimonyo yagarutse ku bibazo u Rwanda rwanyuzemo mu rugendo rwo kwiyubaka
Body:
Umwanditsi, inzobere muri politiki akaba n’umujyanama wa Perezida, Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yagaragaje ko nubwo u Rwanda hari ibihe bikomeye kandi bibi rwanyuzemo, hari icyizere ko ibyagezweho bizasigasirwa kubera ko urubyiruko rwongeye kwiyumvamo ubunyarwanda.
Umwanditsi, inzobere muri politiki akaba n’umujyanama wa Perezida, Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yagaragaje ko nubwo u Rwanda hari ibihe bikomeye kandi bibi rwanyuzemo, hari icyizere ko ibyagezweho bizasigasirwa kubera ko urubyiruko rwongeye kwiyumvamo ubunyarwanda.
Ibi yabitangaje ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu mu muhuro w’abanditsi ugamije kungurana ibitekerezo (scène littéraire) by’umwihariko haganirwa ku gitabo cye ‘Rwanda demain ! : Une longue marche vers la transformation’ kivuga ku mbogamizi n’ibitekerezo byiza byaranze inzira yo kongera kwiyubaka k’u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Uyu muhuro (scène littéraire) wateguwe n’umwanditsi akaba n’umunyarwenya Ntarindwa Diogène uzwi nka Atome mu biganiro akunze gutegura bivuga ku buvanganzo n’ubwanditsi bizwi nka ‘Atomiom’.
Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yagarutse ku bihe bibi u Rwanda rwanyuzemo, ahera mu mwaka wa 1959 ubwo Abatutsi bameneshwaga mu gihugu bikozwe n’abari bari mu mashyaka nka Parmehutu ku bufasha bahabwaga n’Ababiligi.
Kimonyo yavuze uburyo Abatutsi babaye impunzi muri icyo gihe babayeho nabi cyane mu bihugu bahungiyemo dore ko nta n’imiryango yita ku mpunzi yari ihari, byatumye bamwe bakurizamo gupfa kubera imibereho mibi.
Ati “Impunzi zavuye mu Rwanda zabayeho nabi cyane, zicwa n’inzara n’indwara n’ibisimba haba muri Uganda,Tanzania n’i Burundi. Muri Congo ho bazijyanye ahantu habi cyane, ntabwo bashakaga kubaha ahantu hameze neza, babashyize ahantu hatari aho guturwa”.
Dr Kimonyo yavuze ko impunzi zakomeje guhanyanyaza, mu myaka ya 1960 zirisuganya zigaba ibitero byiswe iby’Inyenzi ariko ntibyazihira.
Zakomeje kubaho mu buzima bubi mu mahanga, bigeze mu myaka ya 1980, haba ibibazo bya Politiki hirya no hino muri Afurika, impunzi z’Abanyarwanda zongera gufatwa nabi, ari nabwo abari urubyiruko muri zo icyo gihe bishyize hamwe, bagashinga FPR Inkotanyi bafite umugambi wo gusubira mu gihugu cyabo, kugeza ubwo batangije urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu no guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Gutsindwa kwa Guverinoma ya Twagiramungu no kugumuka mu banyamuryango ba FPR
Muri uwo muhuro, Dr Kimonyo yagarutse ku bihe bikomeye politiki y’u Rwanda yanyuzemo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, cyane cyane ubwo hari hamaze gushyirwaho Guverinoma y’Ubumwe.
Ni guverinoma yari igizwe n’amashyaka atarijanditse muri Jenoside, ku isonga arimo MDR ya Twagiramungu Faustin ari na we wagizwe Minisitiri w’Intebe.
Nta mwaka washize, aba mbere batangiye kwegura hashize amezi make igiyeho kubera kutumvikana.
Dr Kimonyo avuga ko uko kutumvikana kwatewe n’uburyo abari muri Guverinoma bari bafite ibyerekezo bitandukanye nyamara bagomba guha igihugu icyerekezo kimwe.
Ati “Guveirnoma y’ubumwe yagize gutsindwa kubiri. Ugutsindwa kwa mbere ni ukwa politiki kubera ko abantu bamwe batumvikanaga muri Guverinoma cyane cyane FPR na MDR kubera impamvu zitandukanye, nk’ikibazo cy’umutekano uburyo cyari kiri gukemurwa. Ayo mashyaka yombi kandi ntiyari afite imigambi imwe, ntabwo yabonaga ahazaza h’u Rwanda kimwe.”
Twagiramungu yeguye muri Kanama mu 1995, bukeye abandi ba minisitiri bavanwa muri Guverinoma.
Dr Kimonyo avuga ko mu myaka ya 1997/1998 haje kubaho ikindi kibazo cyo kugumuka kwa bamwe mu bari abayoboke ba FPR Inkotanyi, batangira kurya ruswa mu ishyaka haza umwuka mubi.
Ati “ Hari indi Guverinoma yagiyeho ariko nayo iza gutsindwa, ibangamirwa na bamwe mu banyamuryango ba FPR bari bagumutse mu 1997/1998 , bamwe bamagana ibintu bya ruswa byari bitangiye gukomera cyane. FPR yahise ijya mu bihe bibi cyane, ishaka uko yabivamo havanwaho abantu bakekwagaho ruswa.”
Ibibazo byadindizaga Guverinoma bimaze kuvaho, nibwo hatangiye gutekerezwa ku hazaza h’igihugu, hatangizwa ibiganiro byo mu Urugwiro ari nabyo byacuriwemo icyerecyezo 2020 kiri gusozwa.
Guverinoma y’Ubumwe yarangiye mu 2003 ubwo hatorwaga Itegeko Nshinga hakaba n’amatora ya Perezida, ya mbere kuva Jenoside yarangira.
Kimonyo yemeza ko urebye aho u Rwanda rugeze, n’imyumvire urubyiruko rw’ubu rufite, nta kabuza ko ibyagezweho bizakomeza gusigasirwa no kongerwa.
Ati “Urasanga rubyiruko rutangiye kwitabira ibintu by’umuco kandi no kuva cyera, haba mu gushinga FPR, kurwanya igitugu no kubaka igihugu, umuco w’ubunyarwanda no gukunda igihugu nibyo byari umusingi w’ibyo twashoboye kugeraho. Urasanga urubyiruko muri iyi minsi rutangiye kwitabira iby’umuco.”
Yashishikarije urubyiruko kujya rwitabira ibiganiro nk’ibyo bigaruka ku byaranze u Rwanda, kugira ngo rwige uko ibyagezweho byakozwe n’uko rwarushaho kubyongera.
Uretse igitabo ‘‘Rwanda demain !’ Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo asanganywe ikindi gitabo cyitwa ‘Rwanda : Un génocide populaire’ yasohoye mu 2008.

Title: Byinshi ku rurimi rw’Ikirashi n’uko ruvugwa mu Karere ka Kirehe
Body:
Ikirashi ni ururimi shami rw’Ikinyarwanda ruvugwa n’abaturage bitwa ‘Abarashi’ batuye mu Karere ka Kirehe, mu mirenge ya Mpanga na Nasho, ahahoze ari mu Gisaka.
Ikirashi ni ururimi shami rw’Ikinyarwanda ruvugwa n’abaturage bitwa ‘Abarashi’ batuye mu Karere ka Kirehe, mu mirenge ya Mpanga na Nasho, ahahoze ari mu Gisaka.
Ni ururimi rujya gusa neza n’Ikinyankole, Igihaya n’Ikinyambo nka zimwe mu ndimi zikoreshwa muri Uganda na Tanzania.
Abarukoresha bafite agahinda baterwa n’uko abato batagishaka kurumenya ngo kuko ku ishuri batarukoresha bakibaza uburyo nibasaza ruzakendera bikabababaza.
IGIHE yaganiriye na bamwe mu barukoresha batubwira amagambo amwe n’amwe n’ibisobanuro byayo mu Kinyarwanda.
Gusuhuzanya mu Kirashi iyo ari mugitondo bakoresha ‘Murayire ge, haba hacyeye bagakoresha ‘ Aganda’ cyangwa ‘Musibire ge’ kubwira umuntu uti “ Amakuru ki uvuga Agandi shi, Mwiriwe mute bavuga Mwasiba kurungi.
Iyo ushaka kubwira umuntu uti ‘uvuye he’ bakoresha Waruga hi, muryoherwe ni Munuriwe.
Ibice by’umubiri nk’izuru ryitwa Enyindo, ukutwi ni ugutwi, irisho ni ijisho, urutoki rw’insina ni Engemu, amasaka yitwa umugusha, amashaza akitwa ubushaza, ibishyimbo byitwa ibiharage, ibitoki ni ibitiki, ihene ni Embuzi, inka ni Ente.
Mfashingabo Mathiew w’imyaka 54 usanzwe ari umukozi w’Akarere ka Kirehe ushinzwe ibihingwa Ngengabukungu ni umwe mu bavuka mu Kagari ka Kankobwa aho yakuze asanga ababyeyi be bakoresha Ikirashi cyane kuruta uko bakoresha ikinyarwanda.
Avuga ko ubwo yajyaga gutangira amashuri abanza byamutonze cyane bitewe n’uko atari azi ikinyarwanda bikajya bisaba abarimu kumufasha kumenya amwe mu magambo y’ikinyarwanda.
Asobanura ko uko imyaka yagiye yigira hejuru Ikirashi cyagiye gicika intege bitewe n’uko urubyiruko rwari kukimenyekanisha wasangaga rutinya kukivuga ngo bataruseka bagahitamo gukoresha ikinyarwanda.
Yasobanuye ko kandi uru rurimi rufite izindi ndimi gakondo zimeze nka rwo zikoreshwa no mu bindi bihugu nka Uganda na Tanzania.
Ati “Ubu ikirashi kivugwa cyane mu tugari twa Kankobwa na Nyakabungo duherereye mu Murenge wa Mpanga kikanavugwa muri Ntaruka na Gashiru mu Murenge wa Nasho. Ni uduce duto kuko abakivugaga benshi barashaje”.
Mfashingabo avuga ko abavuga ikirashi bagabanutse cyane bitewe n’uko abakivugaga benshi bashaje abandi bakivanga n’abandi banyarwanda bigatuma bareka kukivuga, agasaba leta gushaka uko bahuza abantu bakikivuga kigasigasirwa ku buryo kitazakendera.
Ishisha Venuste w’imyaka 60 uvuka mu Kagari ka Nyakabungo we avuga ko kuva akimenya ubwenge yasanze ababyeyi be bavuga ikirashi, avuga ko umuco w’abarashi ufite byinshi uhuriyeho n’abanyarwanda gusa bigatandukanywa n’utuntu duto.
Ati “Nk’iwacu kera iyo umwana yavukaga habagaho gusangira guhambaye bakakuzanira ibicuma by’inzoga mbere yuko umubyeyi yonsa umwana bwa mbere yabanzaga gucurura kuri ya nzoga. N’ubu abo duturanye mu ngo eshanu, esheshatu turabikora ndetse tugasangira nk’abarashi.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Twifuza ko hakwandikwa igitabo tukanoza ruriya rurimi rwacu kugira ngo ntiruzacike kuko abana bato ntabwo bakikivuga benshi bavuga ikinyarwanda gisanzwe. Abakobwa bacu benshi twabashyingiye abanyarwanda bituma bareka kugikoresha kigenda gikendera ariko hari abana bake bakivuga nubwo atari kinshi.”
Umunyamabanga wa leta muri Minisiteri y’urubyiruko n’umuco Bamporiki Edouard avuga ko abakoresha indimi shami bakwiye kwitabwaho ngo kuko indimi shami zibitse ubumwe bwa bene zo.
Avuga ko kuba indimi shami zo mu Rwanda abazikoresha banakoresha ikinyarwanda bikwiriye gufatwa nk’ubukungu.
Ati “Abakoresha ururimi shami rw’ikirashi twabashishikariza ko uyu muco bawukomeraho kuko ni umuco ubahuza wubaka ubumwe bwabo n’ubuvandimwe bwabo ntabwo ukwiye gucika tukanaboneraho kubaka uw’abanyarwanda bose ariko duhereye kuri wa muco wacu uduhuza.”
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda habarirwa indimi shami zitandukanye nk’igikiga, ikigoyi, ikirera, amashi, ikirashi n’izindi nyinshi zitandukanye.

Title: Imiryango ikomeye yakomotse ku muryango w’umwami Cyilima II Rujugira
Body:
Mu mateka y’abakurambere bafashije u Rwanda kuba igihangange, hari imiryango yagiye ihamya ibigwi n’ibirindiro, ikagira amavugwa ku bw’ibigwi n’ibirindiro babaga barakoreye igihugu, hagati mu muryango mugari bakomokamo.
Mu mateka y’abakurambere bafashije u Rwanda kuba igihangange, hari imiryango yagiye ihamya ibigwi n’ibirindiro, ikagira amavugwa ku bw’ibigwi n’ibirindiro babaga barakoreye igihugu, hagati mu muryango mugari bakomokamo.
Cyilima Rujugira ni umwami wayoboye u Rwanda ahagana mu 1675 kugeza mu 1708, akaba umwe mu bakomotsweho imiryango myinshi kandi yagiye ikomera mu Rwanda.
Ni umwami wa 19 mu bami 28 bategetse u Rwanda, akaba n’umwami wa 19 mu bantu 34 bagize uruhare mu mushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda. Izina rye ry’ubutwari ryari “Impeshakurama’’.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Iyororoka ry’Abanyarwanda, inkomoko y’imiryango migari ’’ ndetse n’igitabo “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro’’ byombi dukesha Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, Cyilima II Rujugira ni mwene Yuhi Mazimpaka za Mibambwe Gisanura, Umwami w’umunyiginya wo mu nzu y’Abaganzu na Kirongoro cya Kagoro, ukomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abega.
Amateka atugaragariza ko Umwami Rujugirwa rwa Mazimpaka, yabyaye abana benshi biganjemo Abahungu basaga batandatu barimo Gihana Nyamihana, Baziga, Mudenge, Gashikazi, Sharangabo na Ndabarasa ari nabyo byatumye inzu zimukomokaho ziba nyinshi.
Umuryango w’umwami Cyilima Rujugira wabayemo ingabo z’ibikongote ku ngoma ye n’iy’umuhungu we Kigeli Ndabarasa wamuzunguye ku ngoma. Banabaye abagaba b’ingabo z’intahusha mu gihe cye. Imitwe y’Ingabo yatwarwaga n’abana be harimo Abakemba batwarwaga na Sharangabo ya Cyilima Rujugira, Imvejuru zatwarwaga na Sharangabo ya Cyilima Rujugira, Indirira( Rugamba) zatwarwaga na Muciye ya Serutaro rwa Mukuku wa Mazimpaka, Abarima batwarwaga na Mitunga ya Cyilima Rujugira n’umugabo we Seruhuga, Abatanyagwa batwarwaga na Gihana cya Cyilima Rujugira, Intarindwa zatwarwaga na Ndabarasa ba Cyilima Rujugira, Ababito batwarwaga na Ndabarasa ba Cyilima Rujugira, Indara zatwarwaga na Cyilima Rujugira rwa Yuhi Mazimpaka n’Ababanda batwarwaga na Cyilima Rujugira rwa Yuhi Mazimpaka
Mu muryango w’igihangange wa Cyilima Rujugira niho ahakomoka umutabazi w’Umucengeri Gihana Nyamihana wari umuhungu w’imfura ye, akaba n’umugabo wa Nyiratunga waje kuba umugabekazi wa Yuhi Gahindiro, wemeye kumena amaraso ye kugira ngo u Rwanda rutsinde igitero cy’ibihugu bine byari byishyize hamwe ngo bihanagureho u Rwanda, aribyo u Burundi, i Gisaka, u Bugesera na Ndorwa. Igitero cyagabwe ahasaga mu wa 1691.
Aba bagabo b’Intarumikwa bafite inkomoko kwa Cyilima Rujugira, nibo babaye inkomoko y’inzu z’imiryango zo kwa Rujugira zikomoka mu muryango mugari w’Abanyiginya.
Inzu z’imiryango zikomoka kwa Cyilima Rujugira zirimo Abanyiginya b’Abadenge bakomoka kuri Mudenge wa Cyilima Rujugira; Abanyiginya b’Abakore bakomoka kuri Kanyankore ka Kanyoni ka Baziga ba Cyilima Rujugira; Abangiginya b’Abahabanyi bakomoka kuri Bihabanyi bya Gashikazi ka Cyilima Rujugira; Abanyiginya b’Abamo bakomoka kuri Rwamo rwa Gihana cya Cyilima Rujugira; Abanyiginya b’Abanana bakomoka kuri Munana wa Gihana cya Cyilima Rujugira; Abanyigiya b’Abasharangabo bakomoka kuri Sharangabo ya Cyilima Rujugira; Abanyigiya b’Abarasa bakomoka kuri Ndabarasa ba Cyilima Rujugira;
Izindi nzu zihamye mu mateka y’u Rwanda zikomoka kwa Cyilima Rujugira, harimo n’izo kwa Kigeli Ndabarasa umuhungu we w’ubuheta nawe wabaye umwami. Mu nzu z’imiryango zamukomotseho harimo Abanyiginya b’Abanyemina bakomoka kuri Nyemina ya Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya b’Abahebera bakomoka kuri Bihebera bya Semugaza wa Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya b’Abarabyo bakomoka kuri Burabyo bwa Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya b’Abanyabiguma bakomoka kuri Rwanyabiguma rwa Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya b’Abaryinyonza bakomoka kuri Baryinyonza ba Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya b’Abazenga bakomoka kuri Kazenga ka Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya b’Abamanuka bakomoka kuri Kimanuka cya Kigeli Ndabarasa;
Ngaho iyo mwama mukuru wa Cyilima Rujugira mu mizi yanyu mikuru.

Title: Ingoro y’Abami yo mu Rukali yakiriye Inyambo Perezida Kagame yayigabiye
Body:
Ingoro y’Umurage w’Amateka y’Abami iherereye mu Karere ka Nyanza mu Rukali yatangaje ko yakiriye imfizi y’Inyambo yagabiwe na Perezida Kagame hagamijwe ko zororoka no kuzimurikira abanyarwanda ngo barusheho gusobanukirwa amateka y’ibwami n’icyo Inyambo zari zisobanuye.
Ingoro y’Umurage w’Amateka y’Abami iherereye mu Karere ka Nyanza mu Rukali yatangaje ko yakiriye imfizi y’Inyambo yagabiwe na Perezida Kagame hagamijwe ko zororoka no kuzimurikira abanyarwanda ngo barusheho gusobanukirwa amateka y’ibwami n’icyo Inyambo zari zisobanuye.
Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda cyatangaje ko Perezida Kagame akigabiye iyo mfizi nyuma yo kubona ko ikenewe muri gahunda asanzwe agira zo gukurikirana ibikorwa bibera mu ngoro y’abami yo mu Rukali akabona ko hakenewe imfizi nziza kugira ngo zororoke n’abazisura babyishimire.
Kuwa Gatandatu tariki 8 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo iyo mfizi yagejejwe mu nyambo zo muri iyo ngoro iherereye mu Karere ka Nyanza hazwi nko mu Rukali, yakirwa n’umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Umurage, Amb. Robert Masozera.
Uyu munsi mu Rukali habaye umuhango wo kwakira imfizi y’inyambo Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika @PaulKagame yagabiye #IngoroY’UmurageW’AmatekaY’Abami iherereye @NyanzaDistrict @RwandaSouth @YouthCultureRW pic.twitter.com/DrGJnJxC58
— Museums of Rwanda (@RwandaMuseums) February 8, 2020
Gahongayire Yvonne, Ushinzwe Ingoro y’Abami yo mu Rukali, yabwiye IGIHE ko biri muri gahunda ya leta yo guteza imbere inyambo zisobanuye byinshi mu mateka n’umuco by’u Rwanda.
Ati "Ririya shyo rero bari babibonye ko rikeneye inyambo kugira ngo zinororoke. Ni imfizi nziza bari bayitwemereye kugira ngo n’abadusura bazibone kuko hari abanyarwanda benshi batazizi. Ni imfizi nziza izatubyarira Inyambo nziza."
Yavuze ko kubona imfizi nziza bifite icyo bisobanuye ku muco bari gusigasira wo kugarura Inyambo no gusobanurira abanyarwanda amateka yazo.
 Ati "Kuba yajemo ni ishema ku kigo cy’Ingoro z’umurage, ni ishema by’umwihariko ku ngoro y’abami yo mu Rukali kuko twifuje kugarura umuco w’ubworozi no kwereka abantu uko inyambo zabaga zimeze n’icyo bisobanuye.”
Yavuze ko izongera abasura iyo ngoro ndetse ashishikariza abanyarwanda kwitabira kuzisura kugira ngo basobanukirwe amateka yazo.
 Ati “Abanyarwanda baze barebe bamenye uko inka zabagaho, bamenye ngo inyambo zari zisobanuye iki ku mwami. Tuniteze n’abashyitsi benshi kuko ni imfizi nziza. Bazaba benshi baza kuyireba kuko uko isa byonyine birakurura abantu.”
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Umurage, Amb. Robert Masozera; yashimiye Perezida wa Repubulika kuba yarahaye Abanyarwanda Ingoro nziza y’Umurage W’Amateka y’Abami imurikwamo inyambo, zari zaribagiranye mu muco n’amateka by’u Rwanda.
 U Rwanda rwiyemeje kugarura inyambo, aho rwashyizeho n’urwuri zororerwamo rwa Gako ruherereye mu Karere ka Bugesera kugeza ubu rufite ishyo rimwe.

Title: U Bufaransa: Hasohotse igitabo gikubiyemo inyandiko zo mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
Body:
Hasohotse igitabo cyiswe ‘Nuit Brouillard sur le Rwanda’ ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda ‘Ijoro ry’uje ibihu’, gikubiyemo inyandiko zanditswe n’umunyamakuru w’Umufaransa, Jean Chatain, wakoreraga igitangazamakuru ‘L’Humanité’ mu gihe hakorwaga ubwicanyi muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Hasohotse igitabo cyiswe ‘Nuit Brouillard sur le Rwanda’ ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda ‘Ijoro ry’uje ibihu’, gikubiyemo inyandiko zanditswe n’umunyamakuru w’Umufaransa, Jean Chatain, wakoreraga igitangazamakuru ‘L’Humanité’ mu gihe hakorwaga ubwicanyi muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Jean Chatain mu kazi yakoze kagaragara mui iki gitabo, harimo kwerekana ukuntu ubugome burenze kamere bwari bwarinjijwe mu nterahamwe n’utundi dutsiko twakoraga ubwicanyi dufashijwe na Leta yari iriho icyo gihe, tukaza kurwanywa n’izari ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi icyo gihe.
Izo ngabo zagendaga zihura n’imirambo inzira zose udasize iyacaga mu Akagera, isoko ya Nil, ibintu bihura neza n’ibyo Léon Mugesera yari yarahanuye muri mitingi yo ku Kabaya mu 1992 ko Abatutsi bazatemwa bakanyuzwa iy’ubusamo baciye mu ruzi rwa Nil, bagana aho bakomoka muri Abssinie.
Ibyanditswe na Jean Chatain usanga mu nyadiko iri muri iki gitabo, bituma habaho kwibaza uko ubuyobozi bw’icyo gihe bwa Leta y’u Bufaransa, bwirengagije abicwaga bazira ko ari Abatutsi, ahubwo aho kubakiza bagatabara abicaga n’ababayoboraga babaha ibikoresho n’ibindi bari bakeneye.
Umwanditsi yerekana kandi agasanga abakoloni baragendeye ku mahame amwe n’amwe bagahembera urwango bagacamo amoko ibice, bakabiba urwango rutagira ingano hagati y’abanyarwanda ari rwo ba Léon Mugesera bagendeyeho babiba ubwicanyi bwo gutema amajosi n’imitwe by’Abatutsi bakabajugunya muri Nyabarongo bagana mu ruzi rwa Nil.
Yibutsa mu nyandiko ze uko abasirikare b’u Bufaransa, babaga boherejwe mu bihe bitandukanye babaga baje gufasha by’umwihariko iyo Leta yabaga iri mu itegurwa rya jenoside.
Aha arabigarukaho mu buryo bwimbitse muri izo nyandiko ze ziri mu gitabo mu buryo bwimbitse.
Jean Chatain ni umwe mu banyamakuru bake bageze mu Rwanda muri icyo gihe cya jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi batanze ubuhamya bw’ibyo babonye mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha ububi burenze kamere bw’ibyabaga bibera ingabo za FPR, akaga kuko bagendaga bahura na byo mu nzira yo gushaka ko hagira urokoka no gushaka guhagarika ubwicanyi.
Uyu munyamakuru nubwo yifuzaga kubona iki gitabo cye gisohoka, ntiyagize ayo mahirwe kuko yitabye tariki ya 5 Ukuboza 2019 akikirangiza.
Iki gitabo kandi kirimwo inyandiko bita Iriburiro (Préface) y’umwanditsi ku mateka ya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi uzwi cyane mu Bufaransa witwa Jacques Morel ari nawe ugikorera ubuvugizi muri ibi bihe kiri gushyirwa hanze.
Uyu yanditse igitabo kinini cyamenyekanye cyane yise ‘La France au Cœur du génocide des Tutsi’.
Usangamo uko ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 9 Mata 1994, i Kigali abaturage batangiye kwicwa, ibiganiro byo kuwa 30 Mata 1994, ku Mulindi, uyu munyamakuru yagiranye n’abayobozi ba FPR.
Hari aho Mgr Rubwejanga yavuze ku mpunzi 800 ziciwe muri évêché. Ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 3 Gicurasi 1994, ubuhamya bwatanzwe n’abapadiri ku bugome bwarimo bubera mu Rwanda, ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 6 Gicurasi 1994, ikiganiro Paul Kagame yahaye abanyamakuru ku mupaka w’u Rwanda na Tanzania, tariki ya 9 Gicurasi 1994 amaraso menshi yaramenetse, harimo kandi ibya Radio rutwitsi RTLM kuri paji ya 75.
Muri iki gitabo unasangamo ibibazo byabajijwe uwari wungirije umuyobozi wa FPR icyo gihe kuri paji ya 89, ibohorwa ry’Umujyi wa Byumba tariki ya 11 Gicurasi 1994, urupfu rw’umwamikazi Gicanda kuri paji ya 117, iyicwa ry’itsinda ry’Abanyamakuru ku wa Mbere tariki ya 23 Gicurasi 1994 n’ibindi.
Iki gitabo cyashyizwe hanze n’inzu y’ibitabo yitwa ‘Edition Izuba’ muri Mutarama 2020, gifite amapaji 283.
