Title: Impamvu umwami Rwabugili yafatwaga nk’umugome, agakunda abagore
Body:
Abanyamateka bakunda kuvuga amateka ya Rwabugili basa nk’aho bamunenga ngo kuko yari umwicanyi ruharwa mu gihe cyose yamaze ku ngoma ye.
Abanyamateka bakunda kuvuga amateka ya Rwabugili basa nk’aho bamunenga ngo kuko yari umwicanyi ruharwa mu gihe cyose yamaze ku ngoma ye.
Babihera ku buryo nta mbabazi yagiraga ku rugamba, yicaga uwo bahanganye wese cyangwa uwo bamubwiye ko ari umugome nta gushishoza.
Niko umwami wabaye indwanyi koko, agakunda abagore byahebuje dore ko ari bo yishingikirizaga mu butasi, bakamuha amakuru y’abamupangira imigambi mibisha.
Hejuru ya byose, Rwabugili yakundaga abana kuruta. Igitabo “Intwari z’Imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda ruhagamya igitinyiro” cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, kigaragaza ko impamvu ya mbere yatumye Rwabugili afatwa nk’umwami w’umugome ari uko yapfushije nyina akiri muto ahasaga mu wa 1876, kandi agikeneye ukomeza kumuba hafi ngo bangaze amahanga, kandi agomba kumufasha gutegeka nk’uko ihame ry’iyimikabami ryari riri ku buyobozi bw’u Rwanda.
Iryo hame ryavugaga ko umwami yagombaga gutegekana na nyina, yaba atakiriho bakamushakira undi ukomoka mu muryango wo kwa nyina cyangwa se undi mugore w’umwami watanze ariko uri mu bwoko bw’ibibanda byagombaga kuvamo Abagabekazi.
Ibinyoma byageretswe kuri nyina, bigatuma atanga, nyuma yaho agenzuriye agasanga baramubeshyeraga, byatumye mu mibereho ye ntawe yizera. Kuko mu babeshyeye nyina Murorunkwere ko atwite inda y’umugaragu we Seruteganya, harimo abagore be batatu yakundaga [Nyiramarora, Nyiramparaye na Nyiraburunga wari kuzaba Umugabekazi ku ngoma izakurikiraho] kandi bari n’abisengeneza b’Umugabekazi Murorunkwere,
Impamvu ya kabiri y’ubugome bwa Rwabugili, ni uko yarwanyijwe na se wabo Nkoronko, hakiyongeraho na Mukuru we Nyamwesa ya Rwogera bashaka kumwambura ingoma. Byatumye mu buzima bwe abaho azi neza ko nta muntu umukunda, nta n’uwamucira akari urutega. Abaho agomba kwirwanaho mu buzima bwe bwose, kugeza asezeye ku Isi.
Yageze aho yanga gushaka undi mugabekazi wagombaga gusimbura nyina bagategekana, ahitamo gutegeka wenyine atagira umugabekazi.
Impamvu ya Gatatu y’ubugome bwa Rwabugili, ni uko muri ibyo bihe by’iyima rye, bimwe mu bihugu byari bikomeye byigaruriwe na ba sekuruza, byari bitangiye kwigomeka ngo byigaranzure u Rwanda bisubirane ubwigenge bwabyo. Kandi ibyo ntibyagombaga gushoboka, kuko umugambi w’igihe kirekire wo kurwanya akajagari k’uduhugu tutubakitse abami b’i Gasabo bari baratangije, wagombaga gusohozwa nta kiwukomye mu nkokora.
Mu gihe nyina Murorunkwere yatangaga, nibwo ibyo bitero byari bigitangira, noneho Rwabugili akumva ibitero hirya no hino, akumva ngo aba n’aba bigometse banga gutanga amakoro y’ibwami, noneho byose byamuhuriraho bigatuma afata umwanzuro wihuse wo kugaba ibitero ntawe abigishijeho inama, kugira ngo acungure igihe cye.
Kutagira uwo yizera, kwifatira ibyemezo wenyine, kuzahazwa n’amahanga yamuteraga yiyungikanya, byatumye afata ibyemezo bikaze byo kujya agaba ibitero bitagira Umucengeri. Mu mateka y’Ingoma ya Rwabugili n’ay’ibitero yagabye mu mahanga, agaragaza ko nta Mutabazi w’Umucengeri wabaye ku ngoma ye.
Impamvu ya Kane ariko yo idakanganye, nuko mu buzima bwe bw’abato, yabubayemo yiga imikino njyarugamba gusa, ari nako akora imyitozo yo kurushyira mu bikorwa, bijyanye no gufata inshingano yo kuyobora akiri muto, aho yabikoraga ayobora abana b’urungano rwe. Ibyo nabyo byatumye ashira ubwoba hakiri kare kandi akiri muto, hamwe n’Ingabo z’Ingangurarugo bakuranye mu muryango w’ibwami kwa Rwogera.
Aha rero akaba ariho umuntu yakorera ubusesenguzi bwatuma Rwabugili akurwaho ikinegu. Kuko izo ngorane zose yahuye nazo mu iyima rye, nizo zatumye aba Umutabazi w’Umucunguzi uhiye koko! Yitegura gutabarira u Rwanda nta na kimwe kimwisobye, kandi agakubita atababarira, akegura icumu rizira kunamuka.
Kugira abanzi benshi kandi bo mu muryango we, byatumye arushaho kugira amakenga cyane agahora yiteguye guhangana n’uwamuvuguruza ku byemezo byo gutabarira igihugu yabaga yafashe, cyangwa se uwo ariwe wese washakaga kwigomeka ku butegetsi bwe.
Iyo mibereho igoranye Rwabugili yimanye Ingoma, yatumye aba mu bami bagabye ibitero bitasabye ko haboneka Umucengeri, kuko yabigabaga huti huti kubera ko byari byinshi, bigatuma atabona umwanya wo gushaka Umucengeri wamena amaraso ye kugira ngo u Rwanda rwigarurire ibindi bihugu.
Nubwo yateraga atabanje kohereza abacengeri, ibitero byose yagabye byaramuhiriye kugeza ku ndunduro y’ubuzima bwe, nta na kimwe yatsinzwemo.

Title: Uko ‘Girinka’ yifashishijwe mu guhangana n’ubukene mu mateka y’u Rwanda
Body:
Inka yagiye igira amateka akomeye bikozwe n’abami b’u Rwanda, mu rwego rwo kuziteza imbere, kugira ngo ibe urufatiro rw’ubukungu n’umutekano w’igihugu.
Inka yagiye igira amateka akomeye bikozwe n’abami b’u Rwanda, mu rwego rwo kuziteza imbere, kugira ngo ibe urufatiro rw’ubukungu n’umutekano w’igihugu.
Inka yabaye ishingiro n’inkingi ya mwamba mu kugena ahazaza h’u Rwanda, aho Gihanga I Ngomijana wahanze ingoma y’i Gasabo, yahaye umurongo ubworozi bw’inka mu rwego ruhanitse, anazigira ikintu gitagatifu mu mateka y’u Rwanda.
Inka yabaye ishingiro mu kubaka ubukungu bw’igihugu, ububanyi n’amahanga, kurwanya ubukene mu benegihugu, umuhuza w’imiryango n’igikoresho cya Politiki yo kwigarurira ibihugu bigera kuri 29 byariho mu bihe by’ihangwa ry’igihugu cya Gasabo.
Mu gitabo “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro” n’ikindi cyitwa “Ikeshamvugo mu Kinyarwanda” byombi by’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, hagaragaramo ko kubera icyo cyerekezo Gihanga yahaye Inka, byatumye aca iteka ko inka zigomba kuba nyinshi mu gihugu kandi buri muturage akabasha kugezwaho ibyiza bizikomokaho.
Gihanga yaciye iteka rishyiraho gahunda yo guteza imbere ubworozi bw’inka no kuzigaba. Iyo gahunda yayise “Gabirwa’’, ari nayo yabaye inkomoko y’izina ry’Umurenge wa Jabana n’ubundi bisobanura “Gabirwa”. Guhera ubwo umuco wo kugabirana inka wimakazwa guhera ubwo, aho yabitoje ahereye ku gihugu cy’igituranyi cy’u Buliza cyane cyane mu Murenge wa Jabana.
Gahunda ya Gabirwa, niyo Gahunda ya mbere yashyizweho mu mateka y’u Rwanda, yo guteza imbere ubworozi bw’inka no kuzigaba.
Uko imyaka yarushagaho kwicuma ari nako umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda urushaho kujya mbere, niko inka zarushagaho kugira ibigwi, ari no kuba nyinshi no kurushaho gukemura byinshi mu bibazo igihugu cyari gifite.
Ku ngoma ya Mibambwe Gisanura, yifashishije inka arwanya imirire mibi, aho yashyizeho amashyo akamirwa abakene, aho buri gitondo batondaga umurongo baje iwe mu Ruhango ndetse n’ahandi henshi yagiye ashyira ayo mashyo y’inka, baje gukamisha. Ibyo byatumye abaturage bakurizaho kumwita “Rugabishabirenge” kuko yagiraga ubuntu bwinshi.
Mu bihe by’ingoma ya Yuhi Gahindiro inka yagize ibigwi bikomeye inahabwa n’ishingano nyinshi cyane cyane mu kubaka ubukungu bw’igihugu, ubuhahirane n’ubutwererane bw’abenegihugu n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage, ugereranyije n’abamubanjirije. Ku ngoma ye, yaciye amateka menshi agamije ahanini imibereho myiza y’abaturage.
Hari nk’aho yagize ati “Nta munyarwanda ukwiye kubaho atagira inka, amata, umugabo, umugore, abana n’ibindi.” Mu gushyira mu bikorwa iryo teka, buri muntu wese yahawe inka yo korora, udafite umugabo kubera impamvu runaka baramushyingira, udafite umugore nawe nuko n’abadafite abana ku mpamvu zo kuba inshike n’iz’ubugumba, ababyaye benshi bakabaha abana, abadafite amata kubera inka zabo zatetse cyangwa se zitarabyara, bakayoboka iyo kwa Gahindiro cyangwa se ku batware be, bakajya gukamisha.
Mu bihe by’ingoma ye, ni ukuvuga ahasaga mu wa 1746-1802, yaciye iteka rishyiraho gahunda ya “Girinka” naryo rifite umurongo wo guteza imbere ubworozi bw’inka no kuziha umurongo wo kuba urufatiro rwubakirwaho ubukungu bw’ikirenga bw’igihugu n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage.
Kugira ngo iryo teka ryaciwe na Gahindiro ka Sentabyo rikwire kandi rikurikizwe, yarishyize mu ndamukanyo y’Abanyarwanda. Aho bagombaga kuramukanye bifurizanya ibyo byiza byatuwe mu iteka ry’umwami Yuhi Gahindiro. Baramukanyagaga bagira bati “Girinka, Girabana, Giramata, Girumugabo, Girumugore” n’izindi.
Gahunda yaciwe n’iteka rya Yuhi Gahindiro, niyo yiswe “Girinka”, iba gahunda ya gatatu mu mateka y’u Rwanda igamije guteza imbere ubworozi bw’inka.
No mu bihe bya Repubulika, cyane cyane mu bihe byo kongera kubaho k’u Rwanda, nyuma y’uko hahagaritswe Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Umukuru w’igihugu cy’u Rwanda Paul Kagame, ntiyatanzwe no gufata ibyiza biri mu muco n’amateka y’abakurambere mpangarwanda, ngo abyifashishe mu kubaka igihugu no kukizahura dore ko cyari kivuye habi.
Byatumye mu 2006 asaba ko buri munyarwanda agomba gutunga inka, ikaba ishingiro ryo kurwanya ubukene, kwimakaza imibereho myiza y’abaturage no kurwanya imirire mibi. Muri uwo mwaka, nibwo yatangije gahunda ya “ Girinka’’ irongera igira ishyikizo mu mibereho y’Abanyarwanda. Niyo gahunda ya kane mu mateka y’u Rwanda, yeteje imbere ubworozi bw’inka mu Rwanda.
Izi gahunda zose, yaba iya Gihanga, yaba iya Gisanura, yaba iya Gahindiro ndetse n’iya Kagame, zose zari zifite icyo zihuriyeho. Inka zahabwaga abaturage zose zabaga ari iz’ubuntu, ariko uyihawe akazagabira mugenzi we, nawe agatunga agatunganirwa, agahorana amata ku ruhimbi.
Haba mu bihe by’abami, no mu bihe bya Repubulika, inka iracyabonwa nk’igikoresho cyarwanya ubukene cyane mu Banyarwanda, kikaba n’ishingiro ryo kwigira n’imibereho myiza yuje ubuzima buzira umuze.

Title: Hagiye kumurikwa igitabo gihishura amabanga y’imiryango ishaka icyubahiro igahishira abana bahohotewe
Body:
Igitabo cyiswe L’oncle Gynécologue kivuga umwana w’umukobwa wahohotewe inshuro ebyiri ariko agatereranwa n’umuryango we, washakaga kurinda icyubahiro cyawo kigiye kumurikirwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Igitabo cyiswe L’oncle Gynécologue kivuga umwana w’umukobwa wahohotewe inshuro ebyiri ariko agatereranwa n’umuryango we, washakaga kurinda icyubahiro cyawo kigiye kumurikirwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Ni igitabo Numuhire Caroline yanditse mu myaka 10 ishize ubwo yatangiraga amasomo ye ya kaminuza. Umwanditsi nta bushobozi cyangwa ubundi bufasha yari afite ariko amahitamo y’ingingo cyibanzeho ishingiye ku nkuru ndende yatangariwe na benshi bijyanye n’ubuhanga cyandikanye.
Inkuru mpimbano ikubiye muri L’oncle Gynécologue ivuga ku mwana w’umukobwa watewe inda n’umusore bakundanaga yajya kwipimisha kugira ngo amenye uko ahagaze, agasaba ubufasha nyirarume witwa Mathias akahahurira n’ibyago birenze ibyo yari afite kuko amufata ku ngufu.
Ntarindwa Diogène wamamaye nka Atome mu gusetsa ni we uzafasha Numuhire kumurika icyo gitabo muri Kigali.
Uyu munyarwenya ubihuza no kwandika avuga ko atari asanzwe aziranye na Numuhire ahubwo na we yakuruwe n’ubuhanga buri muri icyo gitabo ahitamo gushaka inzira yo gusakaza ubutumwa bukirimo ku bantu benshi.
Ati “Ku myaka ye ni ibintu bidasanzwe, ni igitabo cyandikanywe ubuhanga ku buryo ugitangiye agisoma kugeza akirangije. Yacyanditse ku buryo kigutera amatsiko ugashyirwa ari uko ukirangije. Sinari muzi naramumenye numva ari uwo gushyigikirwa kugira ngo atabyihererana.”
Yakomeje avuga ko inkuru yuko Numuhire yacyanditse azayigarukaho mu imurikwa ryacyo izafasha n’abandi kugira umuhate wo kwandika.
Ati “Njyewe nahuye n’uwo mukobwa ambwira ibyo yanditse ndamubwira nti ‘ibyo bintu ntubyihererane kandi hanze aha hari abandi bana bafite impano zo kwandika kugira ngo bamenye ko hari uwababanjirije bamufatireho urugero biba ari byiza. Kumva ko ari igitabo cyanditswe n’umwana w’umukobwa nta bundi bushobozi uretse ko ari uko yiyumvagamo iyo mpano. Numvise ari ikintu cyo gushyigikira.”
Igikorwa cyo kumurika icyo gitabo giteganyijwe kubera kuri Westerwelle Start up Haus Kigali mu nyubako ya Fair View Building ku Kimihurura guhera saa Kumi n’Ebyiri z’umugoroba wo ku wa 29 Mutarama 2020.
Numuhire yavukiye muri Butare mu 1988. Yize ibijyanye n’Iterambere ry’Icyaro n’Ubuzima mu yahoze ari Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda. Yananditse ibindi bitabo birimo "Mirror Of Stolen Hearts’’
Yabaye Umuyobozi wa Generation Rise, umuryango wita ku burezi bw’umukobwa umufasha kugira ubumenyi bumuganisha ku ntego z’ubuzima, kwitinyuka, kwigirira icyizere no kuvugira mu ruhame.
Kumurika icyo gitabo biri mu bikorwa by’uruhererekane Ntarindwa yise L’Atomiom byo guteza imbere imishinga y’indashyikirwa y’abakiri bato mu buryo bukwiriye.
L’Atomiom izabanza kwibanda ku kumurika ibitabo mu bikorwa byiswe "Scène Littéraire’’ bigamije gukundisha Abanyarwanda kubyandika no kubisoma ariko nyuma izafata n’ibindi bikorwa.
Biteganyijwe ko mu mezi ya mbere bizibanda ku bitabo byanditswe ku Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ariko bikazajya binareba ku zindi ngingo zitandukanye zirimo imibereho myiza na siporo.

Title: Twinjire mu gitabo ‘Mamba Mentality’ gikubiyemo amabanga yafashije Kobe Bryant kuba igihangange muri Basketball
Body:
Umunsi umwe yaravuze ati “Ntacyo ntakora ngo ntsinde umukino, byaba kwicara ku ntebe y’abasimbura nzunguza igitambaro (afana) , haba guhereza amazi bagenzi banjye bari mu kibuga cyangwa kujya mu kibuga nkakina”.
Umunsi umwe yaravuze ati “Ntacyo ntakora ngo ntsinde umukino, byaba kwicara ku ntebe y’abasimbura nzunguza igitambaro (afana) , haba guhereza amazi bagenzi banjye bari mu kibuga cyangwa kujya mu kibuga nkakina”.
Iyo ni yo myumvire ya Black Mamba, akabyiniriro k’umukinnyi w’ibihe byose wa Basketball muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Kobe Bryant.
Izina Black Mamba, Kobe yaryiyise nyuma yo kureba filime ‘Kill Bill’ ya Quentin Tarantino, aho umugore witwa Uma Thurman yashakaga kwihorera ku bagizi ba nabi bashatse kumwica we n’umwana yari atwite. Uwo mugore yakoreshaga izina ry’ibanga rya Black Mamba.
Ni imyumvire yamuyoboye imyaka 20 yamaze akinira LA Lakers ari nayo kipe yonyine yakiniye kuva yakwinjira muri NBA avuye mu mashuri. Yakinnye imikino 18 ya All-Star muri iyo myaka yose, atsinda amanota 33643. Yatwaye ibikombe bitanu bya NBA akinira LA Lakers.
Benshi bakura bafite abo bafata nk’icyitegererezo, ndetse bumva bashaka kuba nka bo ariko Bryant yari yararenze iyo myumvire, ubwo bamwitaga Michael Jordan mushya akabasubiza ati “Ntabwo nshaka kuba Michael Jordan, njye nshaka kuba Kobe Bryant.”
Iyo mitekerereze yamuyoboye mu rugendo rw’imyaka 20 na nyuma kugeza kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020 ubwo yagwaga mu mpanuka ya kajugujugu ari kumwe n’umukobwa we w’imyaka 13 n’abandi bantu umunani.
Imitekerereze yo guhangana kugeza ku munota wa nyuma, yatumye mu Ukwakira 2018 Kobe Bryant yandika igitabo ‘Mamba Mentality: How I Play’ gikubiyemo impanuro, inama n’uburyo yakoresheje ngo amare imyaka 20 akiri igihangange muri Basketball.
Mamba Mentality ni imvugo ikubiyemo kwiyemera no kwiyemeza, bigomba kuranga buri muntu, atari umukinnyi wa Basketball gusa, ahubwo no mu buzima busanzwe kugira ngo ube uwo ugomba kuba we.
Igitabo Mamba Mentality: How I Play, Kobe yacyanditse nk’umurage ku bakiri bato bashaka kuba ibihangange muri Basketball no mu bundi buzima busanzwe.
Ni igitabo kigutwara kikakwinjiza imbere mu bitekerezo by’umwe mu bakinnyi b’ibihangange ba Basketabll Isi yagize, kikakwereka icyatumaga atsinda, amayeri yakoreshaga ngo atsinde, uko yiteguraga umukino n’ibindi.
Muri icyo gitabo cyasohotse mu Ukwakira 2018, imyaka ibiri Kobe Bryant asezeye muri Basketball, hari aho yagize ati “Nakundaga kubuza abantu amahoro, bakumva badatekanye. Ibyo nibyo bituma abantu bitekerezaho, bagakora impinduka. Ushatse wavuga ko natumye abantu batinyuka kuba abo ari bo mu buryo bwiza.”
Ukurikiye imbwirwaruhame nyinshi za Kobe ku cyatumye aba igihangange, ijambo ‘kubuza amahoro uwo bahanganye’ riza kenshi.
Yavuze ko buri mukinnyi wese babaga bari gukina, yamubuzaga amahoro bitewe n’uwo ari we, bisobanuye ko yabanzaga gufata umwanya wo kwiga abakinnyi bagiye guhura.
Yagize ati “Natangiraga kumwigaho nkareba uko yitwara. Najyaga kureba amateka ye, nkanumva intego afite izo ari zo. Nigaga igituma yumva atekanye, ndetse n’igituma yumva adatekanye. Nyuma yo kubimenya, namukoraga icyo nshatse, nkamukubita ahababaza mu gihe nyacyo.”
Mbere gato yo gusohora igitabo cye, Kobe Bryant yavuze ko muri make Mamba Mentality, bivuze “kugerageza ibishoboka byose ukaba wowe nyawe kugeza ubwo nta wundi wowe usigaye”.
Imitekerereze ya Mamba Mentality, Kobe yayisigiye na LeBron James, umwe mu bihangange Isi isigaranye mu mukino wa Basketball.
Mu gitabo cye, Kobe avuga uburyo yigeze gukina mu ikipe imwe na LeBron James bakinira ikipe y’igihugu, Team USA, akabona uburyo yitwara nabi akamuhindura akoresheje Mamba Mentality.
Kobe yagize ati “Intego yanjye buri gihe yabaga ari ukubabaza uwo duhanganye. Ikintu cy’ingenzi njye na LeBron twaganiriye ni iyo mitekerereze yo kubabaza uwo muhanganye. Ndibuka hari ubwo twari turi gukina nabi, naje mu rwambariro tugiye mu karuhuko, mbabaza igituma twitwara nabi. Mu gice cya kabiri, LeBron yakoze ibidasanzwe, yazanye indi mitekerereze yo gutsinda. Guhera ubwo akina agamije kurusha abandi.”
Igitabo cya Kobe Bryant cy’amapaji 208 kiboneka mu nzu zigurisha ibitabo hirya no hino ku Isi no ku mbuga za internet zigurisha ibitabo nka Amazon.
Kobe Bryant wari ufite imyaka 41, yasize umugore n’abana batatu.

Title: Urugamba rw’injyanamuntu rwa Rwabugili, mu gitero cy’Imigogo cyigishije Abanyarwanda uburyo bushya bwo kurwana
Body:
Mu bami bayoboye u Rwanda, iyo bigeze kuri Kigeli Rwabugili buri wese aca akarongo kuko ni umwe mu bami b’indwanyi kabombo u Rwanda rwagize kuva ari umwaka kugeza ku munsi we wa nyuma.
Mu bami bayoboye u Rwanda, iyo bigeze kuri Kigeli Rwabugili buri wese aca akarongo kuko ni umwe mu bami b’indwanyi kabombo u Rwanda rwagize kuva ari umwaka kugeza ku munsi we wa nyuma.
Mu bami bayoboye u Rwanda, iyo bigeze kuri Kigeli Rwabugili buri wese aca akarongo kuko ni umwe mu bami b’indwanyi kabombo u Rwanda rwagize kuva ari umwana kugeza ku munsi we wa nyuma.
Ni umwami wahuye n’ibizazane ubwo yateraga ubwami bwa Nkore muri Uganda, akagenda yitwaje imyambi n’imiheto abo agiye kurwanya asanga bitwaje imbunda maze baramurasa karahava, ingabo ze nyinshi zirahatikirira.
Uburyo yari indwanyi, yatashye agatoki agakubita ku kandi, abigira amayeri maze aza gusubirayo ahakora akantu, imbunda z’abagande zihinduka ubusa imbere y’imyambi y’abanyarwanda.
Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro’’ cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, igitero Rwabugili n’ingabo ze bagabye ku Banyankore b’Abahinda ku nshuro ya kabiri, cyasize amateka ndetse cyitirirwa igitero cy’imigogo, kuko cyasize imirambo myinshi y’Abanyankole kugeza ubwo imwe bayifashisha bambuka umugezi.
Mu gitero cya mbere bagabye muri Ankole kiyobowe na Nyamuhenda wa Kajeje n’ingabo z’Ibisumizi yari atwaye, bazibiranyijwe n’amasasu n’imbunda by’Abanyankole, niko gutabaza Rwabugili aho yari mu bitero yagabye mu Burengerazuba bw’u Rwanda.
Rwabugili n’ingabo ze bitabye Nyamuhenda, ngo baze gukuraho igisuzuguriro cy’Abanyankole ku Rwanda kuko bwari ubwa mbere mu mateka Rwabugili atsindwa n’abanyankole.
Bakoranyije abaturage, abagabo n’abasore ngo bitegure bagabe ikindi gitero, bivaneho icyo gisuzuguriro.
Bakigera i Rutaraka babanje kwitoza uko bazarwana urwo rugamba, mu gihe ingabo zahasesekaye zitegereje izindi ko zihagera ngo bashoze urugamba, nibwo bitoyemo imitwe ibiri, umwe bawitirira Abanyankole, undi bawitirira Abanyarwanda. Barakirana karahava, umutwe w’Abanyarwanda utsinda uw’Abanyankole, bihita biha igihamya ko Abanyarwanda bazatsinda Abanyankole.
Mu gihe bari mu myitozo y’uko bazivugana Abanyankole, Rwabugili yari yatarabukiye mu rugo rwe rwari i Gatsibo, aho agarukiye atangira gushyiraho abagaba b’ingabo b’icyo gitero. Hatoranyijwe Nyamuhenda wa Kajeje n’Ingabo z’Ibisumizi yari akuriye nk’Umugaba wazo ngo bajye kurwana n’Abanyankole bari bafite imitwe itatu itatu y’Ingabo zirimo Imigogo n’ingogo n’umutwe witwaga Inyana w’intwari zarobanuriwe gutoza kurashisha imbunda.
Ubwo Nyamuhenda bamuhaye izina ry’ubugaba rya Kigeli Ndabarasa nk’umukurambere w’ibihangange by’abami b’u Rwanda byatsinze ingoma ya Ndorwa, bamuha n’umugaba wungirije Ruvuzacyuma rwa Semuzigura watwaraga umutwe w’ingabo z’Abadahemuka. Rwabugili amuha izina ry’ubugaba rya Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi, kuko ariwe wabashije gutsinda Abanyoro akabatsinsura burundu ubutazagaruka gutera u Rwanda.
Ibigwi by’abo bami bagirije ayo mahanga, byahesheje u Rwanda ubugabo bwo guhangana n’Abanyankole. Umutasi wa Rwabugili muri icyo gihe yari Kambwa ka Rwakarengwa.
Ntare Rugingiza rwa Migereka umwami wa Nkole, yagerageje kohereza Abatasi benshi ngo bamubwire imiterere y’ingabo Rwabugili yitwaje, maze bamukurira inzira ku murima ko atazazitsinda, bagira bati “Ingabo Rwabugili yitwaje, si abantu babyarwa, ubanza Rwabugili abahinga, akabasarura nk’imyaka! Ikiruta ni uko twagirana imishyikirano tukabasubiza inka zabo, naho ubundi ntituzabakira”
Icyakora Ntare yanze kumva izo nama z’abatasi be akomeza kurasa mu ngerero z’ingabo z’u Rwanda by’ubushotoranyi. Yiringiye imbunda yahawe n’Abongereza, yibwira ko ari we uzifite wenyine, ntamenye ko na Rwabugili yari afite umutwe w’ngabo ugizwe n’abagabo b’inkorokoro 60, barwanishaga imbunda bitwaga “Ibyinigiri”.
Nyuma yo kurushaho gutekereza ku magambo Nyamuhenda yamubwiye y’uburyo barashwe n’ingabo z’Abanyankole bagahitamo kugaruka kugira ngo zitabamara, Rwabugili yahise yunguka igitekerezo cyihuse dore ko yagiraga n’ubwonko bunyaruka mu gushaka igisubizo cy’ibibazo abajijwe mu buryo bwihuse.
Yahise abaha igitekerezo ati “Ndabona muri iriya myuko bafite hari ikintu gishamitseho kimeze nk’ishami ry’igiti bakurura kigakaka, hanyuma bagahita bakura akandi kari mu nsi yaho bakohereza umuriro mu kirere. None ubwo bimeze bityo, niba barasa hejuru, nibajya batangira gukurura kiriya kintu gikaka mujye muhita muryama, kuko nabonye gitinda mu kugikurura, nibamara kuboherezaho uriya muriro bitegura kongera gukurura cya kintu gikaka nabonye kibatwara umwanya, mujye muhita mubyuka n’ingoga mwoherezeyo imyambi n’amacumu’’.
Rwabugili kuba yarise imbunda imyuko, si uko atari azizi, ahubwo bwari uburyo bwo kuzihinyura no kuzitesha agaciro. Amateka y’u Rwanda agaragaza ko icyo gitero cyo mu Nkole cyabaye Rwabugili afite imbunda zigera kuri 60 zari mu mutwe w’Ingabo z’Ibyinigiri. Bityo bakaba nta gaciro yazihaye mu bitero yagabye ku mahanga kuko we yabonaga kuzikoresha ari ukwisuzuguza no gutesha agaciro ubutwari bw’Abanyarwanda.
Ingabo za Rwabugili n’abagaba b’Ingabo zose bari kumwe baba abarwanira mu mazi no ku butaka, bamaze iminsi itari munsi y’itatu bitoza uko bazabigenza.
Umunsi warageze, basatira Ingabo z’Abanyankole, zitangira kurasa nabo bakaryama, isasu ryamara gusohoka bagahita babyuka bwangu, bagatamika imyambi n’amacumu mu gihe abandi bakirangariye mu byo kwambika amasasu mu mbunda no kwizihirwa n’ako gashya kadutse, abandi bakaba baboherejemo urufaya rw’imyambi n’amacumu.
Babikoze rimwe, kabiri, ubwa gatatu babona bamaze kugarika Ingabo z’Abanyankole nyinshi, nubwo hatabuze n’Abanyarwanda bagwamo batari bacengewe neza n’amabwiriza mashya y’urugamba.
Rwabugili amaze kubona ko hari abamaze kumenya ubucakura bushya bw’imirwano, atanga umurishyo w’impuruza, Ingabo ziravunura zigaruka inyuma. Barongera basubira i Rutaraka bajya gusubiramo imigendekere y’urugamba. Bamaze kubona ko uburyo bize aribwo kandi burimo gutanga umusaruro, batangiye gutekereza neza uburyo bakomeza urugamba, ariko nta ngabo nyinshi zikomeje gupfa.
Rwabugili yabunguye indi nama y’uburyo bushya bwo gukomeza kurwana. Yatangiye kubaha imyitozo mishya yo kurasa imyambi bagaramye, ku buryo umuntu yashoboraga gutamika umwambi umuheto awufatiye mu mano ubundi akohereza, ibyo byari kubafasha kuticwa n’amasasu y’Abanyankole kuko bo barasaga hejuru gusa, ku buryo uryamye batabashaga kumuboneza mu cyico. Rwabugili n’abagaba be b’Ingabo, bitoza uwo mwitozo barawunoza neza neza, banawutoza n’Ingabo bari bakuriye, babona ko nta cyababuza gutsinda Abanyankole. Uburyo bwo kurasa “Umugaramirizo” bwinjira butyo mu mirwanire y’Abanyarwanda.
Rwabugili ntabwo yari afite umugambi wo gutsinda Abanyankole gusa, ahubwo yashakaga no kubambura izo mbunda akazitwara nawe akazajya azirwanisha. Yahise abwira Ingabo ze ko bagomba no kwiga uburyo bwakoreshwa ngo babambure ziriya mbunda, atari ukubatsinda gusa.
Nyamuhenda wa Kajeje umugaba w’ibisumizi, yunguka igitekerezo cy’uburyo bamwe mu gihe baba barimo kurasana n’Abanyankole barangamiye imirwano, hatoranywa undi mutwe w’ingabo ukagenda wihishahisha mu byatsi ku buryo bagera ku ngabo z’Abanyankore zikirangamiye imirwano, bakazifata mpiri bakazambura izo mbunda, dore ko muri ibyo bihe habaga ibyo bitero muri Gashyantare 1894, ibyatsi by’umukenke biboneka muri ako Karere k’i Burasirazuba, byari byishimiye imvura y’umuhindo byari byarakuze cyane, ku buryo umuntu yashoboraga kugendamo akambakamba cyangwa se akicaramo ntumubone.
Aho niho bungukiye igitekerezo gikomeye cyo gufata imitwe y’Ingabo irimo abagabo b’abanyambaraga bakagenda bakambakamba nk’ibikururanda bakagera mu rugerero hagati babatunguye, bakabambura izo mbunda.
Uburyo bushya bw’imirwano bwatanze umusaruro mwinshi muri icyo gitero, kuko abatamikaga bagaramye, boherezaga imyambi n’amacumu akica Ingabo z’Abanyankole gitunguro batabona ubarasa uwo ariwe. Abakusha, bagenda babyuka baryama, bahaguruka, bicara, nibo barangaje Ingabo z’Abanyankole noneho ntibamenya ko hari indi mitwe y’Ingabo igiye kubagwa gitumo, indi irimo kubarasa iryamye.
Icyo gitero cyarangiye u Rwanda rutsinze abanyankole, barabica ku buryo bukomeye kugeza ubwo mu kugaruka bambuka, Abanyarwanda bifashishije imirambo y’abanyankole ngo bambuke umugezi.

Title: Inzira y’inzitane n’ubuzima bugoranye umwami Yuhi Musinga yanyuzemo
Body:
Imyaka irasatira 76, Umwami Yuhi V Musinga atanze kuko yatanze ku wa 25 Ukuboza 1944, atangiye mu buhungiro, i Moba muri Congo nyuma yo kwirukanwa mu Rwanda n’Ababiligi, agasimbuzwa umuhungu we Mutara III Rudahigwa.
Imyaka irasatira 76, Umwami Yuhi V Musinga atanze kuko yatanze ku wa 25 Ukuboza 1944, atangiye mu buhungiro, i Moba muri Congo nyuma yo kwirukanwa mu Rwanda n’Ababiligi, agasimbuzwa umuhungu we Mutara III Rudahigwa.
Birashoboka ko Musinga ari umwe mu bami b’u Rwanda bayoboye mu bihe bibi cyane, nta bunararibonye bwo guhangana nabyo afite, ndetse n’ibizazane yahanganye nabyo kandi inkuruzi yabyo atarayigizemo uruhare.
Amateka agaragaza ko Musinga yabayeho mu bihe bibi kandi bikomeye, birimo amahwa n’ubusharire bwinshi, uhereye mu bwana bwe, kugeza atanze.
Yuhi Musinga, ni uwa Kigeli Rwabugili na Nyirayuhi Kanjogera, ni umwe mu bana basaga cumi na batanu Rwabugili yabyaranye n’abagore be bagera kuri 20. Yimye ingoma mu Ukuboza 1896 kugeza ku wa 12 Ugushyingo 1931.
Rwabugili yashatse Kanjogera mu buryo butunguranye, kuko se Rwakagara, yamuzanye ibwami nk’uje kumutura Rwabugili, biza kurangira abaye umwe mu bagore bwa Rwabugili, ndetse w’inkundwakazi kuruta abandi.
Rwabugili yashatse Kanjogera nyuma y’urupfu rwa nyina Murorunkwere, wapfuye urw’akagambane, igihe cyo kumwerera kigeze baraguriza umugore ugomba kweza Rwabugiri nk’uko amategeko y’ubwiru yabiteganyaga, inzuzi zerekana Kanjogera.
Ubukwe bwa Kanjogera bwabaye ahasaga mu wa 1879, bubera ku Ngara za Bumbogo bwa Gasabo ( ubu ni mu Kagali ka Ngara mu Murenge wa Bumbogo wo mu Karere ka Gasabo).
Abandi bagore ba mbere uko ari batatu bari baratesherejwe icyizere no kubeshya bagatuma inzirakarengane zipfa. Nguko uko Kanjogera yagiriwe icyizere yinjira mu buzima bwa Rwabugiri atyo.
Mu mvugo ivunaguye, Yuhi V Musinga wari ufite igisingizo cya Rugwizakurinda ni umwe mu bami b’u Rwanda wahuye n’insanganya mu buzima kurusha benshi, akaba umwami wasuzuguwe bikabije cyane kurusha abandi bami bose, umwami wasimbutse urupfu incuro nyinshi kurusha abandi.
Ni we mwami wa mbere mu Rwanda watunze amafaranga aturutse i Burayi. Ni na we wa mbere wize amasomo azanywe n’abazungu. Yigishwaga na mwarimu Laurent Nduhura amusanga mu ngoro ye i Nyanza. Musinga yumvaga neza igiswahili akamenya amwe mu magambo y’ikidage, ku buryo atari akeneye umusemuzi igihe yavuganaga n’abazungu.
Mu myaka ye 35 yamaze ku butegetsi, mu Rwanda imbere habayemo ibitero 38 by’ingabo zifite imbunda ziyobowe n’abazungu, abarwanyi ari abanyamahanga bahanganye n’abanyarwanda. Ahagana ku ndunduro y’ubuzima bwe, Musinga yaba yarafunzwe incuro zirenga eshatu, muri za kasho z’abazungu i Cyangugu ,i Uvira, n’i Moba muri Congo.
Uko byatangiye
Abatarishimiye uko Rwabugiri arongoye umukobwa wo mu Abega, barateranye bafata umugambi wo kumubuza kubyara umwana wazaba umwami. Umuhungu we w’imfura witwaga Munana yamubyaye ahasaga mu wa 1880 amaze kuvuka bashaka uko bamuroga birabananira, amaze kugira imyaka itanu baramwiba baramutwara arazimira burundu. Ubwo hari nko mu mwaka wa 1883.
Munana bamutwaye Kanjogera amaze igihe gitoya abyaye Musinga. Rwabugiri yamenyeshejwe iyo nkuru nziza y’ivuka rya Musinga ari mu gitero cy’i Minove mu karere ka Masisi, ku musozi witwa Kamuronsi. Hashize igihe gito Rwabugiri yongera kubona inkuru imumenyesha ko Munana yapfuye urupfu rutamenyekanye. Nyuma yaho Kanjogera yaje kuva i Giseke na Nyagisenyi ajya gutura i Mwima wa Nyanza.
Mu mwaka wa 1886 icyo gihe Musinga yari afite imyaka itatu, ba bantu batishimiye ko Kanjogera yabyara umwana uzaba umwami akagira umugabekazi uvuye mu muryango w’Abega, barongera batuma abagizi ba nabi, biba Musinga baramutwara.
Musinga bamushyize mu giseke kinini cyane bamutsindagiramo, ku buryo atashoboraga kwinyagambura. Bamunyurana ku mayaga ya Butare bamujyanye kumuroha mu Kanyaru. Kubera kunanirwa, baratuye bararuhuka, agatotsi kabatwaye haza abajura bavuye kwiba inka. Barabakanze bariruka ya nkangara bayita aho, abo bajura barayikorera bayijyana iwabo, bayipfunduye basangamo umwana w’umushishe. Bamubajije uko yitwa ababwira ko yitwa Musinga. Avuga amazina y’ababyeyi be, babyumvise bagira ubwoba, kuko bumvise ari umwana w’igikomangoma. Nyuma yaho biga ubwenge bwo kujya kubivuga ibwami.
Bagezeyo Rwabugili arabakira, bamubwira ko batoraguye umwana we, bamusobanurira uko bamubonye. Amaze kubyumva abategeka kujya kubibwira Kanjogera.
Kanjogera na we amaze kubyumva yabategetse kujya kumuheka bakamumuzanira. Musinga baramuheka bamugarura i Nyanza.
Nyuma yaho Kanjogera yongeye kubyara abandi bana babiri, umukobwa n’umuhungu, bose barabaroga bapfa bakiri bato cyane. Musinga yakuze ari wenyine nta wundi muvandimwe bavukana kuri nyina, uretse abandi bana Rwabugili yari yarabyaranye n’abandi bagore.
Aha niho agahinda n’uburakari bwa Kanjogera byatangiriye. Kuba yari we mugore muto, umugore mwiza byahebuje, umugore wizewe kandi ukunzwe, akagira abanzi bamuhekuye incuro eshatu zose, byamuteye umutima mubi.
Mu buto bwa Musinga bavuga ko yari umusore w’ingeso nziza, ukunda bakuru be na barumuna be bakomoka kuri se, kandi agakunda abaturage cyane. Ngo yakundaga intore, agakunda umukino wo kumasha, ubundi agakunda ibitaramo by’amahamba, n’amateka ya ba sekuruza. Itorero ry’intore za Musinga ryitorezaga i Nyanza ahitwa mu Kaguri.
Kubera ko abiru nabo babaga bakomeye kandi bazi amabanga yose y’ibwami, bashoboye kumvisha Rwabugili uko Umugabekazi atazava mu bwoko bw’Abega, bituma bemeza ko Rutalindwa ariwe uzaba umwami uzamusimbura. Ibyo yabikoze ku itariki 22 Ukuboza 1885, umuhango wo kumwimika ubera muri Nyaruguru ahitwa mu Ngeli.
Muri uwo muhango wabereye mu Ngeli, hari umuhanzi w’umusizi witwaga Ngurusu wazimije abwira Rwabugili ko ibyo akoze binyuranyije n’amategeko.
Ati “Ntaho byabaye gutsindira umwami umugore uhetse umuhungu wabyaye”. Rwabugili ararakara aramusubiza ati “Noneho si ugusiga ni ukwiterera mu mata nk’isazi”
Koko kera kabaye Musinga yageze aho aba umwami bigoranye cyane, kuko byaciye mu ihirikabutegetsi bwa Rutalindwa ryabereye ku Rucunshu.
Ku ngoma ye yahuye n’ibirushya byinshi, birimo abarwanyije ubutegetsi bwe bamuziza ko yabwambuye Rutalindwa wimitswe n’ubwiru, nawe bikamubabaza cyane kuko nta ruhare yabigizemo.
Ingoma ye yagize ibihe bikomeye byinshi kandi bibi mu mateka y’u Rwanda, kuko inkingi za mwamba zari zisigasiye ubuzima bw’igihugu, zashenywe ku ngoma ye, cyane cyane mu bihe by’Abakoroni b’Ababiligi. Kugeza ubwo bwamuciye ku ngoma ku wa 12 Ugushyingo 1931, nuko azungurwa ku ngoma n’umuhungu we Rudahigwa, afata izina ry’ubwami rya Mutara III Rudahigwa.

Title: Bamurangirwa yamuritse ibitabo bibiri, akebura abakerensa Ikinyarwanda
Body:
Umunyarwandakazi, Bamurangirwa Patricia yamuritse ibitabo bibiri bishya birimo ikivuga ahabi u Rwanda rwavuye n’aho rugeze cyitwa ‘New Rwanda From Hell to Heaven’, na ‘Africanism’ gitanga inama ku banyafurika bashidukira amahanga basize ibyiza biri iwabo.
Umunyarwandakazi, Bamurangirwa Patricia yamuritse ibitabo bibiri bishya birimo ikivuga ahabi u Rwanda rwavuye n’aho rugeze cyitwa ‘New Rwanda From Hell to Heaven’, na ‘Africanism’ gitanga inama ku banyafurika bashidukira amahanga basize ibyiza biri iwabo.
Mu muhango wo kumurika iki gitabo wabereye ku isomero rikuru ry’igihugu ku Kacyiru kuri uyu wa Kane, Bamurangirwa yakebuye abanyarwanda banena ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda, ntibarwigishe abana babo, avuga ko bavangira umurage w’u Rwanda n’Iterambere ry’urwo rurimi.
Bamurangirwa yavuze ko igitabo cye “Africanism” yacyanditse kugira ngo akangurire urubyiruko kwikunda no gukunda iby’iwabo.
Yavuze ko kigamije kubwira urubyiruko ko Afurika ifite byose bishobora gutuma itera imbere, igikenewe ari icyizere.
Ati “Nabwiraga urubyiruko kugira ngo rwigirire icyizere, rumenye ko iwabo nta kihabuze, bamenye ko bashoboye.”
Mu gitabo cya kabiri, New Rwanda From Hell to Heaven avugamo uburyo u Rwanda rwabashije kwivana mu mahano ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ubu akaba ari igihugu cy’icyitegererezo muri Afurika.
Yavuze ko kucyandika byari no mu rwego rwo gushimira Inkotanyi zagize uruhare mu kubohora igihugu no guhagarika Jenoside, ndetse n’ishimwe ku bacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside babashije kurenga ibihe bibi banyuzemo, bagafasha igihugu kwiyubaka.
Ati “ Nashatse uko nshimira Inkotanyi zahagaritse Jenoside n’abacitse ku icumu barenze urwo rwego rw’ibikomere bari bafite ku mutima no ku mubiri bakubaka u Rwanda. Nemeza ko nta muriro urenze ya mezi atatu abacitse ku icumu bari barimo. Ugereranyije kiriya gihe bari barimo, iyo shusho ukayishyira hamwe n’iy’uyu munsi, bakubwiye ko bari mu ijuru nta wabahakanya.”
Mu muhango wo kumurika iki gitabo kandi, Bamurangirwa yagarutse ku gaciro k’ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda, avuga ko ari ururimi rufite amahirwe yo kwaguka ariko rudatezwa imbere uko bikwiriye.
Ati “Mu mahanga ababyeyi bavugana n’abana indimi zo mu bihugu barimo. Muri Kigali ababyeyi bamwe na bamwe bakavugana n’abana indimi z’amahanga kuko abana biga mu mashuri aturuka muri ayo mahanga. Bigabanya uburemere Ikinyarwanda gishobora kuba cyagira kuko muri aka karere nta rurimi rurusha Ikinyarwanda uburemere.”
Yavuze ko mu gihe Abanyarwanda ubwabo batazagira ishyaka ryo gukunda no kuvuga Ikinyarwanda, bizakomeza kukigabanyiriza imbaraga mu ruhando mpuzamahanga.
Abajijwe impamvu we atarandika igitabo mu Kinyarwanda, Bamurangirwa yavuze ko abizirikana, ko abanza kwandika mu ndimi z’amahanga kugira ngo abanyamahanga bamenye ko u Rwanda na Afurika biriho.
Ati “Mpitamo kubanza kwandika mu rurimi rwumvwa cyane cyane n’amahanga kugira ngo batumenye ko duhari kandi dushoboye. Mbanze mbwire rubanda bakeka ko tutashoboye, bakeka ko tudahari.”
Kuri ubu ibitabo bya Bamurangirwa biboneka mu iguriro ry’Ibitabo cya Caritas mu mujyi wa Kigali, na Librairie Ikirezi.
Bamurangirwa amaze kwandika ibitabo bitanu byose biri mu rurimi rw’Icyongereza. Harimo icyo yise “Rwanda Yesterday” avugamo amateka y’u Rwanda, ‘‘Patriotism” kigizwe n’ibisigo biri mu Kinyarwanda no mu Cyogereza yahimbiye Perezida Kagame, icyo yahimbiye Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, ndetse n’icyo yahimbiye Inkotanyi zambuka, “My Mother’s Dreams” agaragazamo uburyo yapfushije nyina akiri muto agacikiriza amashuri ye kandi inzozi ze zari ukwiga.

Title: Ibyo wamenya ku ‘Bitare by’Imihigo’ bivugwa ko Umwami Rwabugiri yabugurijeho
Body:
Mu Murenge wa Kansi mu Karere ka Gisagara hagaragara ‘Ibitare by’Imihigo’ abahatuye bazi amateka yaho bavuga ko ariho Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugili watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1853 kugeza mu 1895 yakundaga kuruhukira ari kumwe n’Ingabo ze zikahakinira ikibuguzo.
Mu Murenge wa Kansi mu Karere ka Gisagara hagaragara ‘Ibitare by’Imihigo’ abahatuye bazi amateka yaho bavuga ko ariho Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugili watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1853 kugeza mu 1895 yakundaga kuruhukira ari kumwe n’Ingabo ze zikahakinira ikibuguzo.
Ibyo Bitare by’Amateka biherereye mu Mudugudu wa Kaburanjwiri mu Kagari k’Umunini. Hagaragara ibimenyetso birimo imyobo yerekana ko habugurijwe.
Umusaza uhatuye witwa Bitorwa Damien w’imyaka 88 y’amavuko, avuga ko amateka y’ibyo bitare ayazi kuko yayabwiwe na Sekuru.
Ati “Ahangaha niho Umwami Rwabugili yaruhukiraga n’Ingabo ze; ibi bisoro mubonaho ni iby’aho zabugurizaga ziruhuka isaha yo kujya ku rugamba itaragera.”
Akomeza asobanura ko muri icyo gihe aho ibyo bitare biri hari ishyamba ndetse ari naho Ingabo za Rwabugiri zambariraga zikahafatira n’amafunguro mbere na nyuma yo kujya rugamba.
Ati “Hari agasozi kari hepfo ahangaha basiganiraga bagiye inama bananirwa kukumvikanaho; Umwami w’u Burundi akavuga ngo ni ake uw’u Rwanda ngo ni akanjye banga kubyumvikanaho, banze kubyumvikanaho rero bakoresheje imirwano.”
Isomo bakura kuri ayo mateka
Bitorwa avuga ko ayo mateka bagenda bayaherekanya kugira ngo aho hantu hatazibagirana. Kuri ubu barahazitiye ndetse ni ho abaturage bo mu Mudugudu wa Kaburanjwiri bakorera inama.
Iyo habaye umuganura ni ho bicara bakawizihiza ndetse bakungurana n’ibitekerezo.
Ati “Iyo habaye inama tuyumvira aha, twaba twejeje amasaka umuganura tukawizihiriza ahangaha.”
Umuyobozi w’Umudugudu wa Kaburanjwiri, Nteziryayo Samuel, yavuze ko biyemeje kuhasigasira uko bashoboye kuko bahafata nk’ahantu hadasanzwe.
Ati “Bitewe n’uko Umwami yarwaniriraga u Rwanda ashaka icyaruteza imbere n’icyahesha ishema Abanyarwanda, natwe tuhafata nk’Ibitare by’Imihigo aho twicara tukesa imihigo twarangiza kuyesa tugasoma ku Ntango y’Amahoro.”
Nteziryayo avuga ko usibye gusabana, bahakorera n’ibikorwa byo gukebura abakoze nabi kugira ngo bikosore.
Ati “Wa muntu watubereye ikigwari tukamunengera kuri ibi Bitare by’Imihigo kugira ngo na we yumve ko agomba kujyana n’abandi. Tuhafata rero nk’Ibitare by’Imihigo yo guteza imbere aho dutuye.”
Asobanura ko bahisemo kuhazitira kugira ngo abantu batahavogera kandi ari ahantu h’amateka.
Iyo hari umuturage wabatengushye akaba ikigwari bamushyira inyuma y’uruzitiro bakamunenga, ubataha yagaruka yikosoye bakamwinjiza.
Ati “Niba tumubwiye ngo kurungira inzu agatinda uwo muntu turamunenga kugira ngo ntibizongere kubaho; akajya inyuma y’uruzitiro agakerakera; uwesheje imihigo akajyamo hariya imbere agasoma ku Ntango y’Amahoro undi akahakura isomo ko agomba gufatanya n’abandi.”
Nteziryayo yemeza ko ibyo Bitare by’Imihigo bibafitiye akamaro kubera ko ibikorwa by’imihigo bahakorera bimaze gutanga umusaruro.
Umudugudu wa Kaburanjwiri uherutse kuza ku isonga uhiga indi yose yo mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo ugabirwa Inka y’Imihigo na Perezida Kagame Paul.
Mu byatumye uhiga indi harimo kuba buri rugo rufite amashanyarazi akomoka ku mirasire y’izuba; bakoresha amasibo n’abakuze mu kugira inama abangavu n’ingimbi ku buryo nta nda z’imburagihe ziharangwa cyangwa ibindi byaha; buri rugo rufite inka n’itungo rigufi byibuze rimwe.
Buri muryango ufite akarima k’igikoni gahinzemo imboga, bafite n’ibiti by’imbuto byibuze bitatu; bose bafite amashyiga ya rondereza; nta mwana n’umwe utiga, buri rugo rufite igipande cy’umuganda; buri muryango ukorana n’ikigo cy’imari.
Nta muryango n’umwe ukirangwamo amakimbirane; abaturage bose bawutuye bafite ubwisungane mu kwivuza; nta mwana ufite imirire mibi kandi nta bana bazerera.

Title: Imyaka 76 irashize Umwami Yuhi Musinga atanze, umugogo we n’ubu waburiwe irengero
Body:
Imyaka 76 irashize, Umwami Yuhi V Musinga atangiye mu buhungiro, i Moba muri Congo nyuma yo kwirukanwa mu Rwanda n’Ababiligi, agasimbuzwa umuhungu we Mutara II Rudahigwa.
Imyaka 76 irashize, Umwami Yuhi V Musinga atangiye mu buhungiro, i Moba muri Congo nyuma yo kwirukanwa mu Rwanda n’Ababiligi, agasimbuzwa umuhungu we Mutara II Rudahigwa.
Birashoboka ko Musinga ari umwe mu bami b’u Rwanda bayoboye mu bihe bibi cyane, nta bunararibonye bwo guhangana nabyo afite.
Musinga yimye ingoma ahagana muri Werurwe 1897, ayambuye mukuru we bahuje se, Mibambwe IV Rutarindwa. Byakurikiwe no kwitwikira mu nzu kwa Rutarindwa n’umuryango we wose amaze kumenya ko yagambaniwe, urwo rupfu rukurikirwa n’izindi z’abari bashyigikiye Rutarindwa. Ibyabaye icyo gihe bivugwa mu mateka nka coup d’etat yo ku Rucunshu.
Musinga yimye ingoma akiri muto, ku myaka 14 gusa, ari nayo mpamvu mu minsi ye ya mbere yayoborerwaga na nyina Kanjogera. Ni imyaka yari iruhije kuko Abakoloni b’Abadage n’abamisiyoneri ba mbere bari bari kwinjira mu Rwanda, bashaka abayoboke mu banyarwanda.
Abapadiri bera n’Abadage baje mu 1900, basanze Yuhi V Musinga amaze imyaka ine ari umwami w’u Rwanda.
Ku wa 2 Gashyantare 1900, abapadiri bera basabye uruhushya rwo gukorera mu Rwanda, ibwami babanza kubyanga ariko baza kwemeranya kuhakorera, gusa basabwa kutivanga mu mikorere y’umwami.
Musinga yabanye neza n’Abadage, yanga urunuka Ababiligi
Musinga yari afite ibibazo bye bwite by’abigumuraga hirya no hino mu gihugu cyane cyane mu majyaruguru barimo n’abavandimwe be bamuzizaga kujya ku butegetsi yishe Rutarindwa.
Igitabo Defeat Is the Only Bad News, Rwanda Under Musinga cyanditswe na Alison des Forges kigaragaza ko Musinga yatangiye guhura n’ibibazo mu 1915 mu ntambara ya mbere y’Isi, ubwo Ababiligi n’Abongereza bateraga ingabo z’u Budage mu Rwanda.
Mu 1915, Abadage basabye Musinga abasore bato bo kujya ku rugamba guhangana n’Ababiligi, ababaha adashidikanya kuko atifuzaga ko Abadage batsindwa, ikindi yumvaga ko abo basore bazaba baratijwe kurwana nibagaruka bazaba bamwe mu bagize ingabo ze.
Mu 1916, Abadage baratsinzwe basimburwa n’Ababiligi, biyegereza cyane abapadiri bera ndetse batangira gusa n’abananiza Umwami Musinga.
Ababiligi bashakaga umubano n’abapadiri bera, bifuzaga ko umwami n’abatware ububasha bwabo bugabanywa, ntibakomeze gukandamiza abakene bari biganjemo abahutu.
Igitabo cya Des Forges kivuga ko “Bamwe mu basirikare b’Ababiligi biyemeje guha abahutu uburenganzira busesuye ku butaka bwabo n’umusaruro wabo. Umusirikare wagombaga kumva umuhutu winubira umutware we, yagombaga kumenya mpamvu yo kwinuba kwe akabikemura.”
Musinga yatangiye kubahukwa
Musinga yakomeje guhura n’ibibazo, bamwe mu muryango we n’abatware batangira kumwitaza kuko bari bamaze kubona ko Ababiligi ari bo bakomeye kumurusha.
Mu mpera za 1916, Rwagataraka umuhugu wa Rwidegembya watwaraga i Kinyaga, yashatse uburyo atabara se wari watangiye kwangwa akanafungwa n’Ababiligi.
Mu kugura se, Rwagataraka yabeshyeye Musinga ko ahishe Captain Wintgens wari umugaba w’ingabo z’Abadage. Ababiligi baraje basaba Musinga kumubaha ariko undi agira ubwoba abaha umuja we. Padiri Huntziger abimenye yabwiye Ababiligi ko uwo yabahaye atari we, bituma Ababiligi bafata Musinga baramufunga.
Nyuma yo gukora iperereza, baje gusanga Musinga arengana baramurekura.
Ibi ubwabyo ryari ishyano, kumva ko umwami wafatwaga nk’Imana mu banyarwanda ahangarwa n’abanyamahanga agafungwa ku kagambane k’umuturage we.
Akababaro ka Musinga, uburyarya bw’Ababiligi
Mu 1917, Ababiligi batangiye kubona ko batahindura ibintu badakoranye na Musinga. Baramwiyegereje bamwumvisha ko niyemera gukorana na bo bazakomeza kurinda ingoma ye n’icyubahiro cye. Bamuhaye impano zirimo imyenda n’imodoka, bamusaba guha amadini ubwisanzure.
Mu kurushaho kumwiyegereza, mu ntangiriro za 1918, Rezida militaire w’Ababiligi i Kigali, Major Gérard-François Declerck yagiye kwa Musinga ngo yumve uburyo asuzugurwa n’Abapadiri bera.
Akababaro ka Musinga kagaragara muri Raporo yanditswe na Oscar Anthème Defawe, umusirikare w’umubiligi wabaga i Nyanza, akaba n’Umujyanama w’Umwami.
Hari aho Musinga agira ati “Mu gihe cy’Abadage, abatutsi bose n’abahutu bisanzuraga iwanjye, buri wese yaranyubahaga n’abapadiri ubwabo baranyubahaga. Ubwo bazaga bambwiye ko bazanywe n’Imana yabo, ko ntawe bazagirira nabi kandi ko batazivanga mu mikorere yanjye."
"Umunsi Ababiligi bazaga, Abapadiri bahinduye imyitwarire. Batangiye kwivanga mu mikorere yanjye n’ibindi bibi bitavugwa. Nubwo bavuga ko kubeshya ari icyaha, bo babeshye abayobozi babo bakuru.”
Musinga yakomeje agira ati “Iyo ngize icyo mbwira umututsi, iyo atagishaka ajya kureba padiri akamubwira ngo ntanyumvire. Iyo ngize icyo nsaba abahutu baturiye Misiyoni kugira icyo bankorera, bajya ku bapadiri bagasakuza ngo babagiriye nabi.
"Ahantu hose nshyize umutware, Abapadiri bashyirayo umukiristu ngo amugenzure. Uwo mukristu agakoranya abatishimiye umutware, hakaba impande ebyiri zitavuga rumwe ku musozi.”
Musinga yanavuze ko ngo umunsi umwe Padiri Huntziger yigeze kumubwira ngo “ Guhera ubu Musinga wamanuwe mu ntera, ni njye mutware wawe. Ntabwo bikiri nka cya gihe ku bw’Abadage […] Yavuze ko njyana abana banjye kwiga iwe ariko ntabo azabona. Yanyambuye imisozi, yanyambuye abaturage banjye, antwara ubutware bwanjye none arashaka no kunyambura abana kugira ngo nyuma bazansuzugure, ibyo ntibizigera bibaho.”
Muri Kanama 1917, Ababiligi bongeye gusaba Musinga gusinya iteka riha abahutu ubutaka bukubye kabiri ubwo bari bafite no kugabanya igihe cy’uburetwa kikava ku minsi itatu ikaba ibiri mu cyumweru.
Umwami ubundi yubahirwaga kuba afite ububasha bwo guhana, kwica agakiza. Mu 1917 Ababiligi bamusabye kujya abanza kubamenyesha igihe agize uwo ashaka guhana, kwica n’ibindi. Mu 1920 bamutegetse kujya abanza kubamenyesha mbere yo kugira uwo agira umutware cyangwa uwo ahindura. Ibyo byari bisobanuye kumwambura n’igitinyiro gike yari asigaranye.
Ababiligi bongeye gusaba Musinga n’abatware kohereza abana babo mu mashuri kuko babonaga ejo hazaza abize ari bo bazaba bakenewe mu buyobozi. Bavuze ko nibabyanga amashuri azajyibwamo n’abahutu n’abatutsi bakennye, akaba ari bo bazayobora mu minsi iri imbere.
Muri Kamena 1918, Musinga yemeye ko abana bajya kwiga ariko asaba ko bubakirwa ishuri ryihariye kuko atashakaga ko bigishwa n’abapadiri yashinjaga kwigisha agasuzuguro.
Ababiligi barabyemeye mu 1919 bafungura ishuri ridashamikiye ku bihayimana i Nyanza, yoherezayo abahungu be batatu Munonozi, Rudacyahwa na Rudahigwa, icyakora Munonozi na Rudacyahwa baje kwicwa na mugiga nyuma.
Umwami yasigaye ku izina
Ababiligi bakomeje gukorana bya hafi n’Abapadiri. Impamvu ni uko mu nzego nyinshi z’imitegekere n’iterambere hari hakenewe abantu banyuze mu mashuri kandi abamisiyoneri nibo bari bafite amashuri menshi.
Abapadiri nabo bagombaga gukorana n’Ababiligi kugira ngo abana barangije kwiga bahabwe akazi muri Leta, babeho neza bitume n’abandi bagira ishyari ryo kugana Kiliziya Gatolika no kohereza abana babo kwiga.
Bamwe mu batware bakomeye n’abatutsi b’ibwami bari batangiye gukorana n’abamisiyoneri. Umuhungu wa Musinga, Rwigemera na nyina Nyirakabuga bageze aho baramucika bajya kwibanira n’abamisiyoneri.
Ibwami hatangiye kubaho kutavuga rumwe ku buryo mu 1924, Musinga yari asigaye ari umwami ku izina ariko ubutegetsi bwose bufitwe n’abakoloni.
Igitabo The White Fathers Mission in Rwanda cyanditswe na Ian Linden, kivuga ko nyuma ya 1924 abakoloni bari bafite uburyo bwose bwo kuba bakuraho Musinga, bahura n’ikibazo cyo kubona umuntu wizewe uzamusimbura.
Abaturage ntibari bakimufata nk’umwami kuko amategeko menshi yavaga ku bakoloni, abayobozi ba Kiliziya ari bo baba hafi yabo kurusha ab’umwami.
Abonye ko amaboko atangiye kumushiraho, mu 1927 Musinga yandikiye Musenyeri Léon Classe amumenyesha ko yifuza kongera kuba inshuti n’abamisiyoneri ariko yasaga n’uruhira ubusa kuko ibiganiro hagati ya Kiliziya n’abakoloni byari bigeze kure ngo hashakwe uzamusimbura.
Mu 1927, Guverineri Henri Joseph Voisin yakoze amavugurura mu mitegekere n’imikorere. Hashyizweho imisoro mishya, uburetwa , imirimo y’amaboko nko gukora imihanda, gutegekwa guhinga ibihingwa bimwe nk’ikawa, imyumbati n’ibindi.
Ibyo bikorwa byaremereye cyane abaturage ndetse bamwe bahitamo guhunga. Jean Paul Kimonyo mu gitabo cye Rwanda un Génocide Populaire, avuga ko nyuma y’ayo mavugurura nibura buri mwaka hahungaga abanyarwanda ibihumbi 50.
Musinga yambuwe ubutegetsi, acibwa mu gihugu!
Tariki 11 kugeza kuri 13 Nzeri 1931, Guverineri Mukuru wabaga muri Congo Tilkens yasuye Musenyeri Classe na Voisin ngo bapange itariki yo gukuraho Musinga.
Saa yine n’igice ku wa 14 Ukwakira 1931 igihiriri ry’abaja cyahagurutse i Nyanza giherekeje Musinga, abagore be batanu n’abana be icyenda na nyina Kanjogera n’abo mu muryango wabo, bajyanwa mu nzu yari yabateguriwe i Kamembe.
Musinga yasimbuwe ku ngoma n’umuhungu we Rudahigwa wari warize mu mashuri y’abazungu.
Yakomeje kuba i Kamembe ameze nk’ufungishijwe ijisho. Tariki 2 Ukwakira 1933, nyina wa Musinga, Kanjogera yaje gupfa bakiri i Cyangugu.
Mu 1939 ubwo hadukaga intambara ya kabiri y’isi, Musinga n’abambari be bagaruye icyizere ko Abadage nibatsinda, bazamusubiza ku butegetsi.
Ababiligi bamaze kumenya ibyo byifuzo bya Musinga, bamufunze inshuri ebyiri i Kamembe, babonye akomeje, tariki 18 Kamena 1940 basinya Itegeko ryo kumwohereza muri Congo mu gace ka Moba, hafi y’ikiyaga cya Tanganyika.
Ageze muri Congo, Musinga yongeye gufungwa n’abaturage ba Congo bakeka ko ashaka kongera kwiyimika nk’umwami ku butaka bwabo. Yakomeje kubaho atariho kugeza tariki 13 Mutarama 1944 ubwo yashiragamo umwuka.
Amateka avuga ko umugogo we watwawe n’Ababiligi, ariko nta gihamya na kimwe cyemeza ko ari bo bawujyanye koko.
Mu 2017, Gakuba Jeanne d’Arc wari senateri yasabye inzego zibishinzwe gukora uko zishoboye ngo umugogo w’Umwami Yuhi V Musinga wajyanwe n’Abakoloni b’Ababiligi ugarurwe mu Rwanda.
Icyakora mu mpera z’umwaka ushize, Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo k’Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda, Ambasaderi Robert Masozera yabwiye IGIHE ko nta gihamya ko uwo mugogo wajyanywe mu Bubiligi.
Yagize ati “Twakekaga ko bafite n’umugogo w’umwami Musinga ariko ntabwo byo babyemeza, natwe nta gihamya tubifitiye.”
U Bubiligi bufite n’ibindi bimenyetso ndangamateka byavanywe mu Rwanda mu gihe cy’ubukoloni birimo n’igisingo (ikamba) cy’umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugili.

Title: Amateka adasanzwe y’Abasigari n’Indara babaye Abanyarwanda ku bw’impanuka
Body:
U Rwanda kuva kera na kare rwahoranye abarutuye kavukire hakaba n’abaruzagamo bashaka imibereho, bikarangira bashimye amaronko ntibazasubire iwabo.
U Rwanda kuva kera na kare rwahoranye abarutuye kavukire hakaba n’abaruzagamo bashaka imibereho, bikarangira bashimye amaronko ntibazasubire iwabo.
N’uyu munsi birakorwa uretse ko bwo bica mu mategeko aho ushaka kuba umunyarwanda abisabira uruhushya yaba yujuje ibisabwa akemererwa.
Mu moko agera kuri 24 y’abanyarwanda (imiryango migari ariyo dusangamo Abazigaba, Abagesera, Abega….), harimo ayisanze yabaye abanyarwanda ku bw’impanuka, nta n’umwe muri bo wigeze abirota.
Abo barimo ubwoko bw’Abasigari n’Indara, bamwe mu bagize inzu izwi nk’Abarera bakomoka ku mukurambere wabo Murera. Ubu babaye abanyarwanda nk’abandi ariko si ko byahoze kuko babaye bo bibatunguye, bavuye mu bwami bw’u Bunyoro (muri Uganda), ubwo ubwami bwabo bwagabaga igitero ku Rwanda, rukabanesha abarokotse bakayoberwa aho baca basubira mu Bunyoro, bakaguma mu Rwanda.
Mu mwaka wa 1378, Ku ngoma y’Umwami Kigeli Mukobanya w’u Rwanda, nibwo u Bunyoro bwahawe amakuru y’intasi, ko mu Majyepfo yabwo hari igihugu cyitwa Rwanda, kirimo kubica bigacika, cyazahaje ingoma z’abami b’ibindi bihugu, ubutaka bwabo kikabwomeka ku bwacyo.
Icyo gihe u Bunyoro, bwabafashe umwanzuro wo gutera u Rwanda rwa Mukobanya kugira ngo ari bwo busigara ari igihangange muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba.
Abanyoro nibo bayoboraga igihugu cyitwaga u Bunyoro nk’uko izina rya benigihugu ribigaragaza, kikaba cyari kimwe mu bihugu byari biherereye mu Majyaruguru y’Iburengerazuba bw’u Rwanda, kuri ubu ni mu Burengerazuba w’igihugu cya Uganda. Ni igihugu cyari cyarazengereje ibihugu bigituriye kibigira ingaruzwamuheto, ndetse cyari cyarabihatse.
Mu bihugu byari mu maboko y’u Bunyoro harimo nk’u Bugande, Bukiri, Bukede, Busogo, Toro na Nkore y’Abahima.
Ku ngoma ya Mukobanya, Abanyoro bateye igitero cya mbere, gifite umugambi wo kunesha u Rwanda, bagasigara aribo baganje. Mu gitero cya mbere cy’Abanyoro bagabye mu Rwanda, bigabanyijemo imitwe ibiri. Igitero kimwe cyamanutse mu Bugara, gica mu Ndorwa y’i Burengerazuba gihinguka mu Buliza cyambuka Nyabugogo ahari urugabano rwa Gasabo n’u Buliza, ugana i Ntora ( Ubu ni mu Murenge wa Gisozi) ahari ingoro ya Mukobanya.
Ikindi gitero cyaturutse mu Ndorwa y’Iburasirazuba, gica mu Ngoma y’u Rweya rw’u Mubali, cyambukiranya i Gisaka (mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba ubu) gihinguka mu Bwanacyambwe, gihawe inzira n’umwami w’u Bwanacyambwe Nkuba ya Nyabakonjo. Abo nabo baje bagana ku ngoro ya Mukobanya.
Ingabo z’u Rwanda zatunguwe n’icyo gitero gikaze zirahanyanyaza ngo zirwane biranga ziraneshwa zirahunga. Abanyoro bakurikiranye Abanyarwanda, bashaka kubanyaga inka mu gihe bambukaga Nyabarongo, bagana mu Nduga. Abanyarwanda, babibonye, bashira ubwoba babifashijwemo n’ingabo z’Abanyenduga zari ziyobowe na Mashira ya Nkuba wari inshuti ya Mukobanya.
Nkuko tubikesha igitabo “Intwari z’imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro’’ n’ikindi cyitwa “Iyororoka ry’Abanyarwanda, inkomoko y’imiryango migari” byombi dukesha Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, ingabo z’u Rwanda zimaze kwifatanya n’iz’Abanye-Nduga, bahindukiranye ingabo z’Abanyoro, barwanira ku Muganzacyaro wa Runda muri Kamonyi . Barazirwanyije bazambutsa Nyabarongo bagaruka mu Bwanacyambwe, bazamuka ku musozi wa Kigali, ari naho urugamba rwasibaniye bikomeye.
Aho urugamba rw’inkundura rwaremeye, kuri ubu ni mu Kagali ka Cyivugiza mu Murenge wa Nyamirambo, mu Kagali ka Nyakabanda II ( cyane cyane ahubatse Stade) no mu Mudugudu wa Akanyamirambo mu Kagali ka Rwesero mu Murenge wa Kigali, yose yo mu Karere ka Nyarugenge.
Ingabo z’u Rwanda zihageze, zacunshumuye iz’abanyoro, zirabica cyane izihonotse zirayoba zibura aho zaje zituruka.
Abanyoro bamaze gutsindwa mu gitero cya mbere, baragiye bitegura ikindi gitero cya Kabiri bagabye ahasaga mu wa 1411 ku ngoma ya Mibambwe Sekarongoro ka Mukobanya. Icyo gitero cya Kabiri cy’Abanyoro cyari kirangajwe imbere n’umuhungu wa Nyabwongo II Buhemu, ariwe bakunze kwita mu mateka :’’ Cwa Rya Nyabwongo”, wari ufite izina ry’ubwami rya ’’ Cwa I Cwamwali’’.
Se wa Cwa ari we Nyabwongo II Buhemu, yari yaraguye mu gitero cya mbere Abanyoro bagabye ku Rwanda mu bihe by’ingoma ya Kigeli Mukobanya. Bagarutse barangajwe imbere n’umuhungu we, baje kwihimura kuri Sekarongoro se Mukobanya, yari yarishe ingabo z’Abanyoro nyinshi.
Muri icyo gitero cya kabiri, Abanyoro bazanye zimwe mu ngabo z’ibihugu byari ibituranyi by’u Bunyoro birimo n’ibyo bwari bwaragize ingaruzwamuheto, ngo bize bibufashe kuza kwikiza u Rwanda. Izo ngabo z’ibyo bihugu zarikusanyije ziyongereyeho n’iz’Abanyoro, zishyika umubare usaga Ibihumbi icumi mu gihe iz’u Rwanda zageraga ku bihumbi bine.
Muri icyo gitero bagabye, batsinzwe uruhenu nk’uko tuzabibona mu gice gikurikira, abasigaye barayoba bayoberwa aho baturutse baza kwisanga baraheze mu Rwanda. Mu bwoko bwasigaye mu Rwanda harimo Abasigari n’Indara, bakunze kwita Abasigi ari nabo bibumbiye mu nzu yitwa ‘Abarera’ bakomoka kuri Murera.
Mu nkuru zikurikiyeho, tuzabatekerereza imigendekere y’igitero cya Kabiri cy’Abanyoro, ari nacyo cyabaye inkomoko y’Abasigari n’Indara.

Title: Gusura Ingoro y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ku Mulindi byahagaritswe by’agateganyo
Body:
Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda (INMR) cyatangaje ko gusura Ingoro ndangamateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu iherereye ku Mulindi byahagaritswe by’agateganyo kubera imirimo yo kuyivugurura irimo kuhakorerwa.
Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda (INMR) cyatangaje ko gusura Ingoro ndangamateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu iherereye ku Mulindi byahagaritswe by’agateganyo kubera imirimo yo kuyivugurura irimo kuhakorerwa.
Ingoro ndangamateka yo kubohora igihugu iri ku Mulindi w’Intwari mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, Akarere ka Gicumbi, Umurenge wa Kaniga, Akagari ka Mukindi, Umudugudu wa Nyakabungo.
Itangazo INMR yanyujije kuri Twitter kuri uyu wa 9 Mutarama 2020 rivuga ko gusura iyi ngoro byahagaritswe by’agateganyo guhera ku wa 7 Mutarama 2020 kugeza undi munsi uzatangazwa.
Rigira riti “Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda kiramenyesha abantu bose ko kubera imirimo yo kubaka no gutunganya ingoro y’amateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu iherereye mu Karere ka Gicumbu ku Mulindi w’Intwari, iyi Ngoro idasurwa guhera ku wa 7 Mutarama 2020. Tuzabamenyesha igihe izafungurirwa.”
Iyi ngoro iherereye ahahoze ibiro bya FPR Inkotanyi, irimo n’indaki Perezida Paul Kagame yakoreshaga mu gutanga amabwiriza igihe yari ayoboye urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu hagati ya 1990-1994 .
Umuyobozi wa INMR, Masozera Robert aheruka gutangaza ko imirimo yo gusana ingoro ya Mulindi yari ikenewe kuko nta bice bifasha mu kumurika intambara y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu yari ifite.
Yagize ati “Yari ikeneye kongererwa ubushobozi kuko yari ikennye ibikorwa bifasha kumurika amateka kandi mu kuyubaka, tugomba kwizera ko dusigasira amateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu”
“Imirimo yo kubaka ibikorwa bifasha kumurika nirangiraa muri Kamena uyu mwaka izaba ari igicumbi cy’amateka yose y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu guhera mu mizi kugera irangiye kandi mu buryo bwimbitse.”
Masozera yasobanuye ko mu kwagura iyi ngoro hazongerwamo ibyumba byihariye byo kumurika ayo mateka bizaba bifite uburyo buyasobanura nka filimi mbarankuru ikoze mu majwi no mu mashusho.
Bizaba binarimo amakarita agaragaza inzira n’uburyo byifashishwaga mu kuyobora urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, ibikoresho byifashishwaga mu rugamba n’ibindi bikoresho bisobanura ayo meteka byakozwe n’abahanga mu by’ubugeni.
Biteganyijwe ko nyuma yo kwagura iyi ngoro izaba ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu bari hagati y’ibihumbi 120-50 buri mwaka, ikinjiza arenga miliyoni 150Frw.
U Rwanda rufite ingoro umunani z’umurage w’u Rwanda ziherereye mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu. Umwaka ushize Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’umurage w’u Rwanda cyagaragazaga ko ingoro ndangamurage zisurwa n’abantu 272 636, barimo Abanyarwanda 78%, zikinjiza miliyoni 310 643 966 Frw.

Title: Imvano y’igitutu cy’u Burayi na Amerika ku Rwanda ubwo Habyarimana yacudikaga na Koreya ya Ruguru
Body:
Intambara n’ibitutsi, ibisasu kirimbuzi no kwigerezaho niyo makuru benshi bazi aturuka muri Koreya ya Ruguru y’umugabo w’igisunzu, Kim Jong Un.
Intambara n’ibitutsi, ibisasu kirimbuzi no kwigerezaho niyo makuru benshi bazi aturuka muri Koreya ya Ruguru y’umugabo w’igisunzu, Kim Jong Un.
Iyo Koreya isa n’iyitajwe n’ibihugu kuri ubu, yabaye inshuti ikomeye y’u Rwanda ku butegetsi bwa Perezida Habyarimana Juvénal mu gihe cy’intambara y’ubutita kugeza ubwo Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’u Burayi zari zimurabye ivu, bikamusaba amayeri ngo atabizira.
Habyarimana yashatse gukina amayeri Amerika n’u Burayi, bamuha gasopo
Ikibazo cyo kutavuga rumwe kwa Koreya ya Ruguru n’iy’Epfo cyo mu 1948 ubwo zacikagamo kabiri, cyakomeje gukururuka kigeza mu 1973 ubwo Habyarimana yafataga ubutegetsi mu Rwanda.
Nk’umuntu wari ugiye ku butegetsi vuba, yagombaga gushaka ibihugu by’inshuti ariko agahera ku bitari bisanzwe bifitanye ubushuti bwa hafi n’u Rwanda, kugira ngo inkunga iva hanze yiyongere.
Koreya ya Ruguru yari ishyigikiwe n’ibihugu by’u Bushinwa na Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abasoviyeti, iy’Epfo ishyigikiwe n’u Burayi Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Ibihugu byinshi muri Afurika byari byarahisemo guca umubano n’ibindi bikoresha Communisme ari nacyo gice Koreya ya Ruguru yabarizwagamo kugira ngo ba shebuja b’i Burayi na Amerika babirebe neza, hato badakoma rutenderi ingoma zabo zigahirima.
Leta ya Habyarimana yashakaga ubufasha no kwimenyekanisha mu mahanga, yatangiye kugenda rwihishwa ikorana n’ibihugu bikoresha Communisme, dore ko muri ibyo bihe byatangaga inkunga itubutse kandi itariho amananiza menshi nk’ayo Amerika n’u Burayi bashyiragaho.
U Rwanda rwatangiye kwiyegereza Koreya ya Ruguru, nayo irarukundira umubano uratangira.
Tariki 15 Mata 1974 mu Rwanda haje itsinda ryo muri Koreya ya Ruguru riyobowe n’uwari Minisitiri wungirije w’ububanyi n’amahanga, Chun Nyung Soo, ryakirwa na Perezida Habyarimana.
Icyo gihe Radio Rwanda yatangaje ko Koreya ya Ruguru yemeye gufasha u Rwanda mu bijyanye n’amahugurwa y’urubyiruko, kubaka inzu mberabyombi y’urubyiruko n’ibindi.
Radio Rwanda kandi yavuze ko iryo tsinda ryashyikirije Habyarimana ubutumwa buvuye kuri Perezida, Kim il Song wa Koreya ya Ruguru.
Inyandiko z’ibanga za Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda zo muri ibyo bihe zashyizwe hanze n’urubuga Wikileaks, zigaragaza ko Koreya ya Ruguru nyuma yaje no kwemera guha imyitozo urubyiruko rw’ishyaka MRND ryari ku butegetsi, gutoza abasirikare ibijyanye n’akarasisi n’ibindi.
Uruzinduko rw’intumwa za Koreya ya Ruguru mu Rwanda rwaje mu gihe Koreya zombi zari mu biganiro byo kwiyunga ariko bigatambamirwa n’ibindi bihugu bikomeye.
Abasesenguzi icyo gihe bavugaga ko Koreya ya Ruguru nta gihambaye yashakaga ku Rwanda kitari ijwi ryarwo mu Muryango w’Abibumbye.
Habyarimana icyo gihe yabwiye itsinda rya Koreya ya Ruguru ko u Rwanda rufata ikibazo kiri hagati ya Koreya zombi nk’icy’imbere mu gihugu gikwiriye gukemurwa hatajemo ukuboka kw’amahanga.
Umubano w’ibihugu byombi warakuze, ndetse Koreya ya Ruguru ifungura Ambasade yayo i Kigali.
Mu Ukwakira 1976, inyandiko z’ibanga za Ambasade ya Amerika zigaragaza ko Habyarimana afatanyije na Ambasade ya Koreya ya Ruguru, bashyizeho Komite yiga ku kongera kwiyunga kwa Koreya zombi. Inama yabereye mu nyubako z’uwari uhagarariye Koreya ya Ruguru mu Rwanda.
Iyo komite yari igizwe n’abajyanama muri MRND, Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe Ububanyi n’Amahanga muri Perezidansi, abo muri Minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga n’abandi.
Iyo nama yabaye buri buke ngo Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa MRND wafatwaga nk’umuntu wa kabiri ukomeye mu butegetsi, ajye mu ruzinduko i Pyongyang.
Iyo komite yashimwe cyane na Djeun Yeung Oun wari ushinzwe ibikorwa muri Ambasade ya Koreya ya Ruguru i Kigali, aho yavuze ko gushyiraho iyo komite bizongera ubushuti n’umubano mu by’ubukungu w’ibihugu byombi.
Nubwo u Rwanda rwakoraga ibishoboka byose ngo rushimishe Koreya ya Ruguru, byakorwaga mu ibanga rikomeye ngo ibihugu bya Amerika n’u Burayi bitabimenya.
Ibanga ryaje kumenyekana!
Mu 1976 intambara y’ubutita yari irimbanyije. Gufatwa n’abanyaburayi cyangwa abanyamerika ucuditse n’ibihugu by’Uburusiya, u Bushinwa n’abakorana nabyo, byari icyaha kitababarirwa.
Ibihugu bya Amerika n’u Burayi biciye muri Ambasade zabyo i Kigali, byaje kuvumbura ko u Rwanda ruri mu bushuti bwihariye na Koreya ya Ruguru.
Ubwo hari hashize iminsi Komite ishyizweho ndetse n’Umunyamabanga wa MRND avuye muri Koreya ya Ruguru, Ambasaderi w’u Bubiligi yahamgaje Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda, amusaba ibisobanuro ku mubano wihariye uhari na Koreya ya Ruguru.
Ambasaderi yamubwiye ko ababajwe no kuba u Rwanda ruri kugendera ku icengezamatwara rya Koreya ya Ruguru no guhengamira ku ruhande rumwe, avuga ko u Rwanda rukwiye kumenya neza inshuti z’u Burayi n’umwanzi wabwo.
Wikileaks igaragaza ko Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda yatunguwe, aryoshyaryoshya u Bubiligi, avuga ko umubano uri hagati y’u Rwanda na Koreya udakanganye.
Yavuze ko u Rwanda rushyigikiye kongera kwihuza kwa Koreya zombi, gusa yemera ko kuba barashinze komite yiga kuri icyo kibazo ntibazanemo Koreya y’Epfo kandi nayo biyireba, ari amakosa asabira imbabazi.
Yijeje u Bubiligi ko umubano w’u Rwanda n’icyo gihugu ndetse n’ibindi bihugu by’i Burayi na Amerika utazangizwa n’iryo shyirwaho rya Komite kuko icyerecyezo cy’ububanyi n’amahanga bw’u Rwanda bakizi neza.
Ambasaderi w’u Bubiligi yavuze ko yifuza kubona inyandiko z’ibyo Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa MRND yavugiye muri Koreya ya Ruguru, kugira ngo bemeze koko niba nta kindi cyihishe inyuma y’uwo mubano udasanzwe.
Habyarimana yasuye Koreya ya Ruguru ahasiga amacumu, ahabwa umudari
Ibihugu by’u Burayi na Amerika bimaze kwihanangiriza u Rwanda, rwagabanyije amarere ariko rukomeza kubana na Koreya ya Ruguru kuko yarufashaga muri byinshi.
Tariki 7 Kamena 1978, Habyarimana yahagurutse i Kigali agiye mu ruzinduko rw’iminsi icumi muri Koreya ya Ruguru no mu Bushinwa.
Yahagurutse ku kibuga cy’indege i Kanombe aherekejwe n’abantu 70, bagenda mu ndege yatanzwe n’u Bushinwa ya Boeing 107.
Uretse kuba uruzinduko rw’iminsi icumi rudasanzwe ku mukuru w’igihugu, bwari n’ubwa mbere Habyarimana agiye hanze aherekejwe n’abantu bangana gutyo, nkuko inyandiko za Ambasade ya Amerika zibigaragaza.
Habyarimana yakiriwe neza muri Koreya ya Ruguru no mu Bushinwa. I Pyongyang yakiriwe n’indirimbo za MRND zaririmbwe mu Kinyarwanda n’abana bo muri Koreya ya Ruguru.
Bivugwa ko Habyarimana yasigiye Perezida Kim Il-Sung amacumu nk’ikimenyetso cy’umubano mwiza, na we agororerwa umudari uzwi nka Order of the National Flag. Amacumu Habyarimana yatanze ari mu nzu ndangamurage yiswe International Friendship Exhibition, irimo impano Kim Il-Sung na Kim Jong-il bagiye bahabwa n’abanyamahanga.
Nyuma y’iminsi icumi, tariki 17 Kamena 1978, Habyarimana n’abo bari bajyanye bagarutse mu Rwanda.
Ageze ku kibuga cy’indege, yavuze ukuntu yashimishijwe n’umuhate w’Abashinwa n’Abanya-Koreya n’uburyo bamwijeje inkunga itubutse bazaha u Rwanda.
Icyo gihe Koreya ya Ruguru yavuze ko igiye kwihutisha umushinga wo kubaka ingoro y’urubyiruko no guhinga umuceri kuri hegitari 200 mu Rwanda.
Banatanze inkunga ijyanye n’imodoka zirekura amajwi n’amashusho zigenewe urubyiruko ndetse n’iz’Ikigo cy’amatangazo ya Leta, Orinfor.
Mu 1979, Koreya ya Ruguru yahaye u Rwanda ibijyanye n’intwaro za gisirikare imbunda zo mu bwoko bwa Howitzers, n’imbunda nini zishobora guhangana n’ibitero byo mu kirere.
Uwo mwaka kandi Koreya yemeye gufasha u Rwanda mu mishinga irimo uwo kubaka ikigo cy’amashuri cyakira abanyeshuri 400, kubaka ibitaro n’uruganda rw’ibireti.
Umubano w’u Rwanda na Koreya ya Ruguru warakomeje kugeza mu 1994 muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Nyuma yo guhagarika Jenoside, umubano w’u Rwanda na Koreya ya Ruguru wabaye nk’ukonje uretse ko n’ijambo rya Koreya ya Ruguru mu ruhando mpuzamahanga ryasaga nk’aho ntaryo, kandi intambara y’ubutita yatumaga ibihugu byiremamo udutsiko nayo yari yarahosheje.
Tariki 18 Kanama 2010, Kim Jong Il wayoboraga Koreya yoherereje ubutumwa bw’ishimwe Perezida Paul Kagame amushimira kuba yongeye gutorerwa manda ya kabiri ku majwi 93 %.
Ibiro Ntaramakuru bya Koreya, Korea News Services (KNS) byatangaje ko Kim yifurije ishya n’ihirwe Perezida Kagame ndetse ko yizeye iterambere ry’umubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Guhera mu 1994, nta mubano ushingiye kuri za ambasade ibihugu byombi bifite.

Title: Bamurangirwa agiye gusohora ibitabo bibiri birimo igikebura abanyafurika abategereje amakiriro mu mahanga
Body:
Bamurangirwa Patricia, Umunyarwandakazi uba mu mahanga, agiye gusohora ibitabo bibiri birimo icyo yise “Africanism” gikangurira urubyiruko gukunda Afurika no kwigirira icyizere.
Bamurangirwa Patricia, Umunyarwandakazi uba mu mahanga, agiye gusohora ibitabo bibiri birimo icyo yise “Africanism” gikangurira urubyiruko gukunda Afurika no kwigirira icyizere.
Bamurangirwa w’imyaka 69, amaze kwandika ibitabo bitanu. Bibiri ateganya gusohora birimo icyo yise “Africanism” na “New Rwanda From Hell to Heaven” akazabimurika ku itariki 16 Mutarama uyu mwaka.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Bamurangirwa yavuze ko igitabo yise “Africanism” cyangwa “uburwanashyaka muri rusange ku mugabane wa Afurika” yacyanditse kugira ngo akangurire urubyiruko kwikunda no gukunda iby’iwabo.
Yagize ati “Ni igitabo nanditse ari ugukangurira urubyiruko muri rusange, bigirire icyizere, bakunde iwabo, ndetse kandi na bo ubwabo bibuke kwiyubaha, bikunde ko ari beza ku mubiri, bamenye ko ubwenge babufite, ntibagire icyo bakeka cyangwa uwo bakeka wabaruta ku buryo ubwa ari bwo bwose kubera ko ari bo; kandi bamenye ko muri Afurika iwabo ntacyo babuze, bareke kurarikira ahandi hanze y’umugabane wacu.”
Bamurangirwa yavuze kandi ko iki gitabo yacyanditse kugira ngo kiburire urubyiruko rufite imyumvire yo kujya mu bihugu by’abazungu bizeye kuhakirira.
Ati “kubera umubare munini w’urubyiruko muri Afurika bafite iyo myumvire, ari abo nahasanze n’abahansanze, nasanze ntabona ukundi mbwira abana bacu kugira ngo bigarure, biyemere, bakunde aho bari, bamenye ko ari heza kandi ntacyo habuze.”
Indi mpamvu yateye imbaraga Bamurangirwa kwandika iki gitabo ni uko hari abandi bafite imyumvire nk’iyo yarafite mbere y’uko agera bihugu byo hanze y’umugabane wa Afurika, ngo abone ko ibyo yatekerezaga atari byo.
Yavuze ko ibyo benshi bakeka ko mu bihugu by’i Burayi na Amerika haba ubuzima bwiza, baba bibeshya kuko akenshi bajyayo bagakora akazi gasuzuguritse gahari, bahembwa amafaranga y’intica ntikize.
Bamurangirwa avuga ko ubwe azi benshi bagiye bagenda bazi ko bagiye gukira, bikarangira babayeho ubuzima bubi, bakagira isoni zo kugaruka iwabo.
Yavuze ko hari icyizere cy’uko imyumvire ibihugu bya Afurika byasigiwe n’ubukoroni yo kumva ko bikennye kandi ntacyo byakwishoboza, yahinduka ariko mu gihe urubyiruko rubigizemo uruhare.
 Ati “Twebwe nk’abirabura batwumvishije ko iwacu turi abakene natwe turabyakira. Kugira ngo tuzabyigobotore, ni byo bizakunda ariko ni urugendo rurerure ruzatangirwa n’aba bana bacu, abana babyiruka badukundiye n’ubwo bitoroshye twabigeraho.”
 “Inama yanjye ni uko bankundira nkabuhagira ubwo bukoroni bubarimo nkashyiramo ubundi, kuko urugendo ruracyari rurerure. Ntabwo byahita bishoboka ariko intangiriro yo irahari ntabwo twahita tuvuga ngo nta cyizere.”
New Rwanda From Hell to Heaven” cyo yagikomoye ku iterambere yasanze mu Rwanda ubwo yahagarukaga mu mwaka wa 2016, ubwo yari amaze imyaka isaga icumi atahakandagira.
Yavuze ko iterambere ry’u Rwanda ari igihamya ko Afurika yatera imbere ishyize hamwe.
Kumurika ibyo bitabo ku mugaragaro bizaba tariki 16 Mutarama 2020 mu isomero rikuru ry’igihugu ku Kacyiru guhera saa kumi n’imwe.
Nubwo adafite amashuri menshi, ngo ntibimuza kwandika ibitabo kubera ko yegera inzobere muri uyu mwuga zikagenda zimugira inama.
Iduka ’Waterstones’ niryo mu Bwongereza rimufasha gusohora ibitabo rikanabishyira ku isoko.
Mu Rwanda ibitabo bye biboneka mu maduka y’ibitabo, Ikirezi na Caritas, ndetse n’ababishaka bashobora kubisanga kuri interineti. Ibi bitabo bibiri yasohoye bizajya biboneka mu isomero ry’igihugu.
Bamurangirwa amaze kwandika ibitabo bitanu byose biri mu rurimi rw’Icyongereza. Harimo icyo yise “Rwanda Yesterday” avugamo amateka y’u Rwanda, ‘‘Patriotism” kigizwe n’ibisigo biri mu Kinyarwanda no mu Cyogereza yahimbiye Perezida Kagame, icyo yahimbiye Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, ndetse n’icyo yahimbiye Inkotanyi zambuka, “My Mother’s Dreams” agaragazamo uburyo yapfushije nyina akiri muto agacikiriza amashuri ye kandi inzozi ze zari ukwiga, “New Rwanda From Hell to Heaven” avugamo uburyo u Rwanda rwahindutse nyuma ya Jenoside. Igitabo cya gatanu ni icyo yise “Africanism” twabavwiyeho byinshi.
